title: Fantastic Place to Stay in Manhattan
text:
My wife and I stayed here from August 21st to August 24th.  Absolutely amazing property and top level customer service.  The concierge greeted us with bottled water when we checked in and asked how he could be of service.  We explained to him that we were trying to check in early as we arrived at 9:30AM. Although they had no rooms available, he had a bellhop take our luggage to storage so we could explore the town.

The hotel is brand new and is completely amazing.  Lots of cool memorabilia on the walls and the customer service is top notch.  My only complaint is that the rooms are a little small but I guess that is expected in NYC.  An awesome stay to say the least and my wife and I will be looking to stay at other Hard Rock properties when we travel together and with family.

Stay away from the NYY Steakhouse.  Completely overpriced and a terrible atmosphere.  We walked in on a Monday night and were the only couple in the steakhouse.  We asked to see a menu and when we saw the prices we got up and left.  An 8 oz. steak was $60.00 USD and a baked potato was $15.00 USD.  NO THANKS!

** Just so you are aware, the hotel charges $45.90/night for a resort fee which they claim is for use of their in-room coffee maker, wi-fi and fitness facilities.  You should be able to opt of the resort fee if you choose not to use any of the facilities but you can't.  The charge is extremely pricey but is right up there with everything else you get charged for in NYC.

title: Can’t go wrong!
text:
What a lovely hotel. Literally a few steps away from the centre of everything in Time Square. So close to the action, yet so peaceful. It was a pleasure to return to the hotel each day after exploring the city. Small bijoux room but well equipped with a modern and stylish interior. Very comfortable bed,  Good WiFi, nice cocktails at the rooftop bar.

Would have given 5 stars for my experience except for the following points. - If you are a tea drinker like myself bring your own bags as only coffee drinkers are catered to in the room. We had to request slippers to the room. I celebrated my 50th birthday during my 4 night stay and not even so much as a happy birthday wish from anyone or even a HRH note even though I informed the person at check in that that was the reason for my visit. Felt very impersonal. All said, I would definitely return to this hotel and would definitely recommend it.

title: Excellent Hotel an sehr guter Lage
text: Für New York geräumige Zimmer (24 m2) leider sind die Fenster nicht „schalldicht“ und so hat man relativ viel Lärm von aussen. Auch wurden die Zimmer immer sehr sauber gereinigt. Das Frühstück ist sehr gut (noch nie so gute Pancakes gegessen) und reichhaltig. Die Preise sind halt NYC, das muss man akzeptieren. Milton unser Kellner beim Frühstück war sehr zuvorkommend und aufmerksam. Ein sehr guter Gastgeber.

title: Beautiful hotel in the hear of Times Square
text: We tried for the first time the Hard Rock Hotel in Times Square. We had an amazing time. The lobby and all the common spaces are clean and beautiful. We had friends who stayed at another nearby hotel and were amazed by the design and look of the hotel. We had 2 rooms : 1 studio suite and 1 double queen. Both beautiful and very clean. Beds were very comfortable. And, for New York City, the size of the rooms was impressive. We had happy hour with a total of 7 people in our studio suite and we had plenty of space. The room service was also very fast. As an example, the staff would warn us that it could be longer than usual given the time of the day only to be at our door within 2-3 minutes. The gym was also state of the art. Definitely worth it. We will come back.

title: Great hotel in Times Square!
text: This was our first trip to New York. We booked the Hard Rock Hotel as we wanted to stay in Times Square and all the reviews we read of the hotel were fantastic. We were not disappointed! We upgraded our room so we had a good city view and we were also impressed at the size of the room. (We got married during our trip to NYC so having a good sized room was helpful when it came to having people come in for hair and makeup!) I had forgotten to pack my steamer so was impressed to find a good quality steamer in the wardrobe! One thing we thought we may have during our stay was a lot of noise considering the location of the hotel. It was a compromise we were happy to make but there was no need - we found our room to be very quiet and comfortable. (The pillows were especially comfortable!) Housekeeping were excellent - our room was absolutely spotless throughout our stay. The staff at the hotel are all very friendly and cannot do enough to help ensure you have a great stay! The Sessions bar/restaurant was excellent and we thoroughly enjoyed the live music. The only slight disappointment was the RT60 rooftop bar. Gorgeous views but they seemed to have run out of a lot of things so choice was limited on the occasion we visited. Sessions seemed far better stocked! Wouldn't hesitate to book this hotel for future trips to NYC, we had a great stay!

title: Cool vibes for music aficionados and central NYC sightseeing
text: I stayed this past week at Hard Rock NYC with my sister and we loved our experience there. The place has a cool as cucumber nice vibe and energy to it in design, relaxed ambiance, and outlook, and is especially fun with all the original rock paraphernalia (jackets, guitars, dresses) from iconic rock stars from all decades, including Beyonce, Aretha Franklin and Gene Simmons. We felt positive energy and attentiveness to our needs from all the staff, including the concierge, restaurant staff and housekeeping. Special shout out to Milton our breakfast server and Anita F. The location could not be more convenient to all the iconic sightseeing attractions of NYC like Times Square, Broadway shows, the MOMA museum, Rockefeller Center and Radio City, as well as the subway and other key mass transit hubs like Penn Station and Port Authority. We also love the unusual special feature that Hard Rock hotels have with the option to have an electric guitar or phonograph system with albums sent to your room for special listening pleasure. Ideal for music aficionados! My only criticism would be that our room was listed as two queen beds, but the beds seemed more like doubles. Room was super clean and as the hotel is a new build, everything felt fresh. Fantastic stay!

title: My personal thoughts
text: This hotel is just.. AMAZING!!!! I don’t think I’ve ever been treated and felt so cared for at a hotel. All the people who work here will care for you and help you whenever. I have never been to such an amazing hotel in my entire life. 100/10 go NOW

title: A Gem in the Heart of Times Square
text:
It takes a lot to give a five-star review, and the Hard Rock Café Hotel in New York City deserves this star. Everyone’s friendly and welcoming manner made us feel immediately at home. The bellhop picked up bags from the Uber, ran ahead, and held the doors open for us. This royal treatment did not end there; the concierge was just as friendly in checking us in. We arrived at 11 AM, and we were luckily able to get an early check-in. 

Surrounded by so many restaurants in the Times Square area, we did not get to experience dining at the Hard Rock Hotel. Instead, we ventured out to eat at nearby restaurants—so many incredible options around the hotel. The hotel itself is immaculate; what stood out the most for us was how delicious the lobby smelled. There’s an immediate air of sophistication when you step in from outside the street. The best feature for us in our room was the shower with beautiful golden fittings against white marble tiling, perfectly lit and pristine. 
I highly recommend the Hard Rock Hotel in New York City for its incredible beauty and decor, top-notch service, and unobstructed views of Times Square.

title: Hard Rock NY is amazing.
text: The rooms are very comfortable.  I slept amazingly.  I can not say enough about how helpful the staff was to sharing information I needed to get around.The entertainment was fablous. Enjoyed live music each evening. The location is centeral to eveything I needed. I was able to walk everywhere.

title: Natty Light service Guinness Pricing
text:
My key card stopped working every time I left the room. The first time, I was sent to the back of the line of people waiting to check though another guest with a question about their key card wasn’t required to wait. When I finally reached the front of the line, I was told rather loudly it was because my Amex had been declined. They ran it again. No problem. They gave me new keys. 

Concerned because there was no reason why there should’ve been a problem with my Amex, I called American Express. There had been no declined charges. I was annoyed, but whatever. Until I went out, came back, the key card worked to get me up to my floor, but yet again did not work in my room. So I’m at check in again requesting a new card. This time I tell them last time I was told it was because of my Amex, but Amex had no record of that. According to this clerk, there were never any issues with my Amex and they don’t know why I was told that. They issue a new key card, and I’m able to get upstairs. Except the same thing happens again. And again. It’s not until the night before I check out when I’m freezing, tired, and just used my rescue inhaler from running around trying to get a working key card they offer me a manager. I’m checking out tomorrow. What’s a manager going to do for me now after such gross incompetence? Tell me for the dozenth time not to carry my key card next to my cell phone? Coincidentally, my daughter’s keys didn’t work in the door either, except I was already in the room to let her in. They did, on day four of my stay, say they would send someone up to look at the card reader on the door. It took four days for it to occur to someone this might be an issue.

title: Great Location, Awesome Staff, Comfortable Rooms
text: From the super friendly and helpful staff to the perfect location, this hotel was top notch.  The rooms were a good size and comfortable.  We did not experience any street noise as we have at other hotels.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and felt safe here. This will be my first choice on any return trips to NYC.

title: Easter in NYC
text:
The Hard Rock staff received us with warmth and helpful information when we checked in. 
Our room on the 23rd floor was generously sized, very clean and quiet! Considering the superb location on Times Square this was a surprise. 
Breakfast was plentiful. 
Would use this hotel again.

title: Thumbs Up!
text: My stay at the Hard Rock Hotel New York was great.  The room was very comfortable, the staff very friendly, and the convenience of going next door to the office was worth its weight in gold to me.  I was also impressed with the welcome amenities and the quality of the bath products.

title: Rock on
text: Love the attention to detail with the rooms. Not a usual occurrence to be able to have a guitar for your stay. Staff is friendly and accommodating. Sessions waiters remember you. My ASD son loves this hotel. Can’t wait to return on our next New York City trip!

title: NYC Hard Rock Hotel Rocks!!!
text: Beautiful hotel. The room was very clean, the bed was very comfortable. The Sessions restaurant in the hotel has excellent food (especially their pancakes & cheesecake)! The staff from the front desk to room service was very courteous and helpful.

title: Amazing Stay
text: Staying at the Hard Rock Hotel New York was amazing. It was our first time. Didn't realize we would be on walking distance to a lot of things. Shaun Panchoo and his wonderful staff was always professional, friendly, helpful, courteous, and provided a warm and safe environment.

title: New York experience to repeat!
text: Modern hotel, extra-comfortable beds, cleanliness, live music, room facilities (coffee maker, iron, “real” hairdryer). You have $20 a day to spend at the bar or restaurant, they charge extra but it's a nice touch!

title: Good proximity
text: Convenient but need improvement for staff's kindness and the restaurant food quality. Compare to any major luxury hotel chain like Marriott or Ritz, I couldn't find the best experience even if it's the similar amount you would spend during the stay.

title: Great hotel!
text: An excellent stay. Hotel close to everything and the service was great. While breakfast is a bit limited, Milton at the restaurant always put a lot of joy into his job and was very helpful. Very comfortable hotel and a very convenient store on the first floor.

title: New York break
text:
Hard Rock is a great hotel, wonderful
 and helpful staff. Very clean and different from the run of the mill standard chain of hotels. Concierge is great and all always find you what you need. Check in and out fast and efficient, hotel is also safe and secure. Great location in centre of Manhattan.

title: Great location with average service
text: There is probably no better location in NYC. The hotel is very clean and nicely maintained with cool design. Unfortunately, unlike other Hard Rock hotels, this one is not easy going and as welcoming as the others. Strict  adherence to process vs common sense. And you get the feeling everyone at the door or reception is an actual star that feels bothered by guests. Doors are not opened, luggage not delivered. Too busy watching their phones or talking to each other. Check-in is highly efficient but you don’t feel welcome. Food and drinks are of a high quality but lack variety. Very good housekeeping and nice gym.

title: Recommend highly
text: This place was in the middle of everything and the staff, atmosphere, food, room and everything about the hotel was superb!  I brought my granddaughter for her 16th birthday and it was perfect for her and she was impressed!  Great Job Hard Rock !

title: Return Visit - Great Hotel - Perfect Location
text: This is my second stay here and will be my go to hotel for NYC.    Newer hotel with high end amenities at a reasonable rate.   Both on-site restaurants and room service are very good.   Staff is friendly and accommodating and rooms are large for NYC standards and very clean.   Love the rain shower!!   Highly recommend!!

title: Comfortable with fabulous location
text: Apart from a very noisy and unstoppable room fan, we liked the atmosphere and comfort of this beautifully located hotel. Breakfast was lacking a buffet, was not well organized and slow, but the bar and music were perfect.

title: Great Experience
text: Incredibly clean, very comfortable bed and friendly staff. Tub was excellent for soaking after a long day. Good location for Times Square and walking to Broadway shows.  We would definitely stay here again.

title: Great Location
text: Excellent location in the heart of Times Square, brand new hotel with very comfortable rooms and bedrooms, great staff, if you are a first timer in NY this is the place,  near to brodway theaters, only a block away from tour busses and a few blocks from central park.

title: Spring Break in New York
text: This is a beautiful modern hotel with clean and nicely appointed rooms.  Everyone we encountered on the staff from the doormen to the front desk to housekeeping were friendly and attentive.  Times Square is right around the corner and  Fifth Avenue is a few blocks away.  Great location.

title: Great Hotel
text: Great location for Times Square - friendly and helpful staff - great rooms - typical hard rock themed - music played throughout hotel lobby restaurants and elevators nice touch - will stay agin when revisiting

title: Top Notch Accommodations
text: This property was impeccably clean, comfortable, safe with modern decor. It was quiet and walking distance to most attractions. The staff members were polite, friendly and quick to offer assistance. You won’t be disappointed if you select this property.

title: An exceptional hotel
text: All the staff is really friendly, they make you feel at home. The rooms are small but very nice, comfortable and pleasant. The hotel has an excellent location, it is a few meters from timesquare, near the MOMA, it has metro stations very close, it is also a few blocks from central park. I loved!

title: Great new hotel in a very central location for sightseeing
text: Really enjoyed my stay at Hard Rock Hotel NYC, location was great, new hotel, spacious rooms, friendly and efficient staff - food was very good and the bar on 34th floor was great - balcony on TS side had heaters and was fab to sit outside and experience the atmosphere - would highly recommend and would definitely stay again.

title: Great Location, Steps Away from Times Square.
text: Hard Rock quality! Perfect location. You can find better dining and breakfast options around. The warm welcoming is amazing like other Hard Rock locations. The shop at the hotel is too small, but there is another Hard Rock Cafe within 600 meters.

title: overrated, small and rude staff
text: not worth the money. the only good thing is location but the staff is rude and every time you walk in the hotel you get stopped by staff to see if you stay there or not very unwelcoming and unhelpful wouldn’t recommend

title: Great location for exploring the city
text: We visited NYC for a 50th Birthday. We had two rooms for three of us, the rooms allocated were next to each other which was perfect and we stayed for 4 nights. The hotel is immaculate, new and modern. It’s in a great location and can highly recommended if you want to be close to Times Square. The small amount of food we had at the hotel was good, expensive but good.

title: Great location, nice hotel
text: It’s situated right in time square.  Walking distance to some popular places in midtown Manhattan.  Very clean.  Restaurant is very nice.  The only issue in our room was the sink that doesn’t drain fast. Other than that, it was a very stay!

title: HR ROCKS!
text: i loved my visit!  I loved the bar and bartenders!  The warm nuts were delicious.  The concierge was amazing!  The food wasn't the greatest but the staff was amazing.  The room service (fries and fish sticks) was a bit too salty.  I will  be back to HR NY.

title: Hard Rock NY is a Jem in the heart of the city
text:
Clean Modern cool hotel in the center of the city. Great place for any traveler.
Staff and amenities are good. RT60 cool roof top bar. Want to come back in the summer.
Sessions restaurant was good with good food and good drinks.

title: Stay at Hard Rock Hotel NY!
text: The service was excellent at this location. The employees answered my questions and concerns quickly. They replied quickly to services that I needed done. An excellent hotel with excellent staff! I will definitely be coming back to this location.

title: The hotel far exceeded my expectations.
text:
New, cozy and comfortable hotel, very clean and stylish. Great location and very nice atmosphere. We upgraded to a junior suite for our 5 night stay during the Christmas season. The room, 3201, was very quiet on the 32nd floor and in immaculate condition, well equipped, comfortable and finished to a very high standard with a nice corner view of Times Square and Avenue of the Americas. It had a very good Lavazza coffee maker (very important for Italian guests) for a real Italian espresso, lots of USB ports, a large smart TV, a large desk and a large comfortable bed. I really liked the beautiful bathroom with a large walk-in shower and separate bathtub.  From the beginning of our 5 night stay, everyone was extremely nice and helpful. The location is perfect for walking to some of New York's most famous attractions and just steps from Times Square and Rockefeller Center. Great ambiance at the RT60 Rooftop Bar, due to time constraints I didn't eat or drink, so I can't rate it, although others seemed to enjoy the ambiance at the bar.   We really liked the character of the hotel. We would definitely stay there again.
Highly recommended for those looking for a very good and trendy place to stay in Times Square.

title: Hard Rock Hotel
text: The breakfast menu was standard, but presented in a vibrant way. Overall, the hotel has a fun, rock vibe. It is not an overly crowded hotel and is in a convenient location in midtown. The rooms are a little small for the price, but the bathroom is nice and spacious.

title: Perfect Stay for my Demographic
text:
I had a very satisfying experience with my stay at the Hard Rock. Every single staff member with whom I interacted was the epitome of professionalism and friendliness. The upgraded room that I was assigned had a view to Times Square, was larger than the NYC average, was decorated with an 80's vibe yet modern and tasteful. The quality of the furnishings was exceptional and the room in pristine condition. The shower stall was commodious and the fixtures were top grade. The refrigerated drawer was handy and I enjoyed the espresso from the Lavazza capsule coffee machine was delicious. 
I loved the vibe at RT60, the rooftop bar. Staff were proactively friendly and attentive, especially Diego and Troy. I enjoyed the Wagyu and pork belly sliders, but I found the truffle oil fries to be overpriced, dry and rather bland. However, the lemonade mocktail concocted by Diego was surprisingly tasty. All in all, a very satisfying stay.in a great location.

title: Beautiful Comfortable Modern in the Heart of Times Square
text: This is a world class hotel, in the heart of Times Square, Very clean, very well appointed, although an in room microwave would be a great addition, and the fridge a little cooler, but other than that, an Amazing room. We had a balcony that we used a lot, with a great view and nice place to be outside. The RT60 was a fun and hip bar on the roof, and the Lobby bar, was awesome. We had great service and we will definitely be back.

title: Nice but waste of money
text: Just got back from a five night stay first off the hotel is in the Heart of times square so great location . On arrival we was hit with a five hundred dollar bill partly for the service charge that were expecting after reading some reviews for a gym that I was not going to use and really bad coffee pods in room use the shop next door really friendly guy  great two dollar coffee and for a deposit for damages that we have been told we will get back this week. Hotel it self is very nice lots to look at inside live music on the second floor bar  area in the evening's which was  lovely we only visited it twice unfortunately the bar staff on both nights were not very friendly had to walk to the bar myself and ordered drinks which is OK but not in a five star hotel that is charging twenty dollars for a glass of wine. Roof top bar was OK nice view of times square .   Rooms are nice beds are fantastic the door staff never open doors speed more time chatting to each other. All in all hotel was nice if your going to spend time in it but a waste of money if your going to be out and about and just need somewhere to sleep lots of good hotels that was much cheaper.

title: Enjoyed it
text: Beautiful rooms… friendly staff… awesome memorabilia and a great location if you’re going to Broadway or 30 Rock. Sessions had good food and vibe. Only drawback: front didn’t explain the destination fee benefits when I checked in and I don’t think they applied the food & bev credit correctly when I left. But I’ll def be back.

title: Above and beyond staff
text: Had a wonderful two night weekend stay. Great location allowing easy access to all the Times Square sites.  Walkable to several subway stops. The best part was the actual stay in the hotel. Their staff is just over the top with kindness. Would be a reason to pick this location over all the other options.

title: Customer Service
text: It was an amazing experience visiting the Hard Rock Hotel. It started from the second we walked up to the building with an amazing Doorman David “The Roots”. He was extremely helpful and very nice. He informed us of everything the hotel has to offer and even gave tips about the city. He made us feel very welcomed each time we left and came back from touring the city. Definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the city.

title: QUE NO TE PASE A TI....!!!!!
text:
La experiencia en el Hard Rock Hotel, reservado a través de Booking, ha sido totalmente decepcionante, porque literalmente, destruyó mis vacaciones.

Me bloquearon el costo de la habitación en la tarjeta de crédito, más 700€ en seguridad (según ellos), sin previo aviso. Esto me dejó sin acceso a mi propio dinero durante todo el viaje, creando una situación bastante complicada y totalmente innecesaria. Además, intenté pagar para desbloquearla y no me dejaron. Luego, intentarón cobrarme 1.000 dolares más!!!! Una locura.

Me parece un abuso y una falta de consideración hacia el cliente. Estas prácticas no son de recibo y espero que se tomen medidas para que no vuelvan a ocurrir. Definitivamente, pensaré dos veces antes de reservar de nuevo en este hotel o a través de esta plataforma.

Y, habitaciones enanas.
Sin vistas.

Espero que mi experiencia sirva para que otros viajeros estén alerta y reconsideren sus opciones antes de hacer una reserva aquí.

title: NYC Birthday Weekend
text: Check in was quick & easy;  we were able to get in early (10am) and she upgraded us to a bigger room. We have stayed here 5 or 6 times, every time has been better than the last. We were in NYC celebrating my daughters 11th birthday and she had a blast sightseeing and we walked to the MJ Broadway show (fantastic!) took about 8 min to get there. There's a bodega right next door as well as a pizza place, yum! I'd like to personally thank the guys downstairs, Rob, Jonathan and Joel for always making us feel welcomed and always willing to help whether it be with directions or in getting a car or with our bags. Also, would like to thank Dante up at RT60 who took the time to make sure we made it back to our room safely after a late night at the rooftop. Service at Sessions was good, really enjoyed the live band Thurs night Soundscapes with Greg Banks. Only had 1 rude interaction with a team member at the rooftop and I can't remember his name. We missed the almond croissants and macarons you used to have in the Rock Shop....hope you bring those back....or at least make it available at Sessions or room service. Thank you again for a wonderful weekend, location & safety is everything. We'll be back in June!

title: Birthday in NY
text: The whole Experience was magical.  We were walking distance to all the attractions. We had a view of Times Square from our balcony. Our room was beautiful and small but lovely and clean- Rock on Bruce Springsteen (Theme). Little Italy Pizza is next door and Delicious. From checkin to checkout the staff were all super kind and inviting. We saw Hamilton and it snowed-Be Still My Heart! This experience could not have been more perfect on my birthday. The hotel had so much more to offer but we stayed out in the city the whole time. Next time we hope to dine in and enjoy the live music. Until next time, Thank you

title: A great birthday for myself and my son
text: We visited for a birthday and we were treated really well with cakes and cards in the bedrooms and cakes and candles in the bar when we ordered lunch. The housekeeping team do an excelled job and are very polite, Daniel Gomez was on hand for any questions and even kindly extended our room for a late check out. A lot of people mentioned that the hotel is not for children but o found it very family friendly and accommodating.

title: NY Février 24
text:
Excellent emplacement. Le Rockeffeller, Summitt, Empire State, Moma et Central Park sont à moins de 15min à pieds. Génial!
La chambre et la salle de bain ne sont pas très grandes mais l’essentiel y est!
Le seul petit bémol concerne le restaurant.. le choix sur la carte n’est pas énorme, le service est assez lent (en tout cas le soir où nous y étions) et il se situe un peu au milieu du lobbying.. il’ n’est pas très accueillant.. nous n’avons jamais été tenté d’y prendre en verre pour nous détendre..

title: SURPRISING GEM
text: Unexpected high class quality of everything, best shower in New York, Food was amazing and staff made extra effort to accommodate my dietary needs..luxury bed linens and high end coffee maker in room. Large rooms with comfortable seating area.

title: Never again
text:
Horrible stay which started with check in.  My reservation could not be found. Simple inconveniences like this can sometimes be overlooked but the staff was cold, unfriendly and borderline rude. After I waited in the lobby for 30 mins until they could find my reservation, someone came out and flatly “apologized” for the inconvenience with zero expression. The front desk staff was also borderline rude and I was grateful to not have to deal with them again for the remainder of my stay. 

The room was quite small which is not unusual for NYC I suppose. The shower pressure was nonexistent. The outside noise was excessive and we could hear our nextdoor neighbors snoring. Not yelling or even speaking- just sleeping. Wouldn’t stay here again.

title: Rude Manager can change the entire experience!
text: I stayed for 1 night. I woke up in the morning with red bug bite marks on my neck. After reporting it, the maintenance staff came quickly to check the room, and explain next steps. The housekeeping manager was very kind and provided us with trash bags for our suitcases, alcohol pads and cream for my neck. When I asked for the manager, he never gave us his name and he was rude. He said, a company would come tomorrow to check the room and he would send a report. He also said,  what else do you want me to do”. He refused to look at the bites. I only know his name was Frank because when I asked he handed me his card and walked away. He was so nasty but he was not a representation of the amazing other staff members.

title: 4 nights stay
text: Amazing!  beautiful hotel. we had a great stay, all the staff are polite, helpful and very professional. The hotel is in. A perfect location right in the centre of everything. Our room was kept beautifully daily and the staff just can not do enough for you. 5* all round !

title: Best hotel in NYC
text: Everything about the experience of staying at the Hard Rock Hotel is top notch. Everyone is incredibly friendly and helpful. I have stayed here twice now and both times the rooms have been very clean, comfortable, and spacious (king room first stay and two queens second stay). The overall atmosphere is outstanding!!

title: 4 day new york trip
text: Fantastic hotel with relaxing atmosphere. Within walking distance to attractions and times Square. Friendly staff. Comfortable room. Food was Amazing. Roof top bar has live dj with chilled atmosphere.Would definitely recommend the hard rock hotel.

title: Nice experience
text:
Nice, well and noiseless situated hotel.
Very good and professional concierge service.
Friendly and nice people working at the Hard Rock Hotel Shop. We will definitely come back next time with my husband!

title: Excellent location and cleanliness
text: Excellent location (The hotel is practically on Times Square, there is a pizzeria and market next door) and cleanliness. On the downside, some employees are impatient in speaking in a slower and more explanatory manner.

title: A wonderful stay
text: A great location and really helpful staff. The building is beautifully designed and accessible. Our stay was very central and felt very safe even at night. Sessions bar, concierge and laundry / cleaning service were all great.

title: Excellent
text:
Everything was great and everyone were helpful and friendly. Loved no matter what time no staff member seemed tired or frustrated. Everyone handled things very professionally.
We all used the venue next door in the basement. Everyone there were polite and courteous too.

title: Great hotel, beware of additional charges
text:
Great location and majority of the staff were helpful and friendly. Room was very clean and in good condition. 

We took advantage of the surprise upgrade offer and the room was amazing. However we were over charged on leaving the hotel. Beware of the additional charges!

title: Hard Rock Hotel NYC
text: We absolutely loved this hotel.  It was very clean, all the staff we met were helpful & friendly. The Sessions bar was very cozy and the music and cocktails were great.  It was footsteps from Times Square but you definitely did not feel like it was noisy or crowded in any way.  We will definitely be back!

title: Great place to Stay
text: Perfect location, clean, friendly, and safe. I fully recommend this hotel if you are staying in Times Square. Its in the middle of everything, no need for your car, you can walk everywhere. relaxing and fun spot to stay.

title: Vibe & Location
text: If you’re looking for a hotel in the heart of Time Square that has top notch restaurants and bars already located inside with live music, this is the spot. Rooms are nice and the rates are worth the stay.

title: NON darei 5 STELLE. Da lavorare sui servizi
text:
Sono stata con la famiglia 4gg a Febbraio 2024. Scelto per la nomea del Brand hard rock e il tema musicale. POSIZIONE eccezionale in Times Square a due passi da tantissime attrazioni. Metro vicinissima. L'hotel è carino anche se entrando non c'è una vera hall da 5 stelle, ma un piccolo ingresso. reception al piano superiore con due banchetti attaccata alla zona bar che sa poco di grand hotel.. Siamo arrivati verso le 1615 e 3 stanze su 4 non erano pronte nonostante il check in sia alle 15. Non si sono neanche preoccupati di offrirci un caffe dopo 12h di viaggio. Siamo dovuti rimanere in attesa per piu di mezz ora. Personale non direi tanto gentile e problem solving. La stanza superior piccola , ma carina, letto molto comodo interni moderni e nuovi. Tuttavia nonostante ti chiedano 400$$ di cauzione il frigo bar è vuoto e nella mia stanza comunque NON ERA FUNZIONANTE cosa che ho capito sapessero già ma si son ben guardati dal dirlo e nel caso effettuare uno sconto sulla tariffa. Non sono stati in grado di risolvere e sono rimasta senza frigo. La pulizia lascia a desiderare. La polvere nell'armadio non è mai stata rimossa. I pigiami mai piegati e gli accessori bagno  cuffia doccia o kit beauty x un solo ospite.
ATTENZIONE a chi patisce i rumori la notte. E' perennemente acceso il ventolone nelle camare ed emette un rumore fastidioso molto forte in continuazione e pare non sia disattivabile .Dicono obbligatorio dal covid....non saprei non mi è mai capitato in alcun hotel. Ho dormito sempre con i Tappi.
peccato perchè nonostante la posizione in piena Times Square dall'esterno non si sentiva nulla, dunque ottima insonorizzazione.
Anche il secondo giorno siamo rientrati verso le 16 e le stanze non erano ancora state rifatte; solo dopo sollecito.
Bello il rooftop al 34p anche se dalle 18 non sono ammessi under 21 e se qualcuno viaggia in famiglia non è bello lasciare i 18enni in camera.

title: NYC 4 Day Trip
text: Nice clean, tidy hotel with roof top lounge. Quick lift service. Relaxed atmosphere in a busy hotel. Central location for sightseeing and theatre land. Plenty nice friendly bars within short walking distance.

title: Not happy at all
text:
Not welcome at all at the arrival…the check-in was a mess and the room wasn’t ready after my 12 hours-flight.
Not happy about the welcome-kit in the room, not happy about the cleaning very late in the afternoon while I just wanted to take a shower. Not happy about the roof garden never available and finally not happy about the barman.

title: If you think your parking your own car, think again!
text: I was misled by the parking situation. I was charged $85 for parking and was informed that if I needed my vehicle, it would take 45 minutes to retrieve it and would have to pay $85 to park it again. I was informed that I could not use the stairs or I could get trapped because I didn’t have an employee badge. I was billed when I made my reservation and again at check in with a substantial difference in price. I was informed by the hotel staff at the front desk that my deposit would be returned the next day and I have not received it. Sessions is the restaurant inside the hotel and the taste was unfriendly to my pallet.

title: New York City
text: We really enjoyed our visit to the Hard Rock Hotel in New York City.   The hotel was very clean and the location was amazing.  We loved the how close we were to many of the city attractions and the ability to walk everywhere from the hotel.  We will definitely be returning.

title: On point
text: The service is excellent staff is on point well trained in customer services and handled the guests well, the check out process can use some work they rush us out each time we stay at the location even we are paying over 1k night on NYe I had stayed last week as well same situation rushed out to check out

title: Hard Rock New York Hotel - The BEST hotel in NYC
text:
We had a great experience! The hotel is location is PERFECT! 
The hotel vibes are SO special and amazing.
The food and beverage well served and exceptionally delicious.
The room is beautifully decorated and very pleasant.

title: Didn’t live up to expectations
text:
My husband booked this hotel as a surprise for my 40th. Having previously stayed at the one in Orlando we were looking forward to it. Unfortunately it didn’t live up to expectations. 
The staff didn’t explain anything about the resort charges, she said the credit card was last a holding payment. I would have used a different card if she’d told me and do you really get $20 f&b credit a day? 
I was told if I would like a kettle to the room to phone down. I did this and after an hour I went down the reception to request again, it was sent up that time. 

Sometimes it just felt like we were an inconvenience rather than a guest at a 5* hotel. It really did ruin my 40th birthday. 
Shout out to the housekeeping team though! Fantastic! 

Oh and no one told us how to use the elevator either. Luckily some guests told us that one!

title: Broadway
text: a perfect location to see a show and to have dinner at the hotel or many options within a couple of blocks. The room was a cool experience. Food at Sessions was very good. Hotel Staff is attentive and helpful.

title: 5 stars, but would not go back!
text:
Great location, complemented by professional, helpful staff from beginning to end. I had one of the better hotel breakfasts (excellent yogurt parfait) in a long while.
Room was quite nice, although a bit dark - that would have been a problem for a longer stay. Shower and bathroom were excellent. Why would I not go back? I had never stayed at a Hard Rock hotel before - for me it was too "Las Vegas-ish". Perhaps I should have known better.
If that is not an issue, Great place in NYC at a very competitive rate.

title: Unfriendly employees
text: This was our second stay here and we much enjoyed it the last time, but this time was not as much of a success. We felt extremely unwelcome basically from the second we got out of the car and into the lobby.We were on the 7th floor with 2 queen beds.  Enjoyed the room itself. The bed and shower were nice. Although the view we had was unfortunately not scenic whatsoever as we were looking down onto the rusting roof of other buildings. Lastly ordered $25 continental breakfast for room service my last day of my stay to use my $20 credit i was informed of and when i got my itemized receipt it was not discounted in fact i paid $43 for it. Would not recommend.

title: Worth the experience but breakfast to avoid.  Better options around.
text:
Absolutely amazing. Nothing to point. Comfortable bed, wonderful shower.
The only thing we didn’t enjoy was the breakfast. Staff rude, you cannot seat wherever you want. Overpriced menu. Good location. Couple minutes away from stores and restaurants.

title: Perfect Manhattan Hotel
text: We had a fantastic 4 night stay at the Hard Rock Hotel Times Square.  Extremely comfortable rooms, wonderfully friendly staff, beautiful bar and restaurant.  The bed was very relaxing, we had great sleeps each night.  Air con was quiet, in fact the room was extremely quiet. Highly recommend

title: Hotel novo super bem localizado
text: Ficamos no Hard Rock por uma semana, café da manhã bom, hotel tem a localização mais privilegiada da cidade, do quarto viamos a Times Square. MUITO limpo, chuveiro bom, água e café à vontade no quarto. Atendimento muito bom, com destaque para o Milton que serve o café da manhã com muita simpatia.

title: The best!
text: This is my favorite hotel in Times Square!  Perfect location, quiet but with energetic vibe at the same time, excellent and efficient staff and accommodations, super clean, the most wonderful fragrance throughout the hotel, I love it and always look forward to coming back to my room!

title: Fantastic nights stay here
text: Only a flying visit for one night due to changes with our flight. We’ve stayed at hard rock hotels in Europe (London before it closed & Ibiza) and this hotel is amazing. Just off the main chunk of time square & 4 mins walk to Rockefeller centre. The staff are so so so kind and friendly! We checked out of our previous hotel and came to the hard rock to drop our bags off as it was around 2/3 hours before check in, the guys at the concierge said we should go up and check in on our room and see when it’ll be ready. We did and they let us check in straight away! They also noted it was my birthday two days before and sent up some birthday cupcakes :) the room was comfortable and very clean. King room with a balcony - our balcony had views of Times Square. The next morning we asked when checkout was, as our tv was showing 12pm. The front desk said it’s usually 11am but they are more than happy to honour the 12pm which gave us some breathing space to be able to figure out how to get to jfk as it was our first time in NYC. Checkout was smooth and easy. Would definitely stay here again!

title: Poor service
text: Very bad experience in this hotel with reception staff and one of the conceriege staff. Not helpful and rude. Will not be going back to stay in this hotel. Hotel is in a good location in Times Square.

title: Gran lugar
text: Muy buen hotel excelente servicio los cuartos super limpios y nuevos con muy buenos acabados me gustó mucho. La ventilación del cuarto que tienen, genera mucho ruido y esa no la pueden apagar es independiente al ac, es un detalle poco molesto para los que no estamos acostumbrados

title: Small rooms, with a mix of bathroom in the entrance
text: Hopping to receive more from this kind of hotel. Especially from the experience part. Rooms are very small and the concept of geting in the room through the bathroom could not be embraced by all. Internet is working fine, quality of sleep is good. Breakfast is a little bit expensive compared with what they offer. People are smilling in the reception but they are not willing to help you with any exceptions. A very rigid approach.

title: Small rooms and the bar on top floor was never open !
text: Small rooms and the bar on the top floor was never open . Very hard to get served on 2nd floor especially if you sit in area that’s not designated as a bar service area which is ridiculous . Cupboard space is very small so we had to live out our suitcases

title: NYC Stay - perfect location, excellent staff
text: All the bartenders at Sessions were excellent.  Security was present and felt safe on arrival every time.  Hotel's location was great to all the events we had scheduled - Gallaghers, Central Park, Rockerfeller, MoMA, show at Lena Horne, Nocello, del Frisco's.  Only had to take a cab to Chelsea Market.

title: 5 estrela
text:
Gostaria de parabenizar o atendimento do Sr Sandro, incrível serviço, junto de muita simpatia e profissionalismo. 
A comida também estava incrível.
Super recomendo o local para quem esteja visitando a cidade, decoração incrível e muito agradável o ambiente.

title: Great room for price
text: It was in an excellent location, rooms were spacious for NYC rooms. My only 2 negative comments were that the pillows were way too soft and that the coffee maker did not work in the room, it would just leak out. But for the price and location, I will definitely be back!

title: Hard Rock Hotel Bartenders are as classy as it gets!
text: We came to the Hard Rock in Times Square for the first time 2 weeks ago. We decided to come back to New York for a birthday this weekend. When deciding where we would stay…Hard Rock Times Square was a no brainer because of the bartenders (funny, I know- but seriously they are amazing). When we were here 2 weeks ago…Neilyn, Antonio and Jeremy were so kind. Not to mention - they make the best drinks (especially an espresso martini). They gave us dinner recommendations, and even helped us figure out what to do for NYE. So needless to say…we came back because of how kind they were. These guys truly go above and beyond to make their guests feel at home. Not sure we will ever stay anywhere else when we visit now!

title: Enjoyed our stay!
text: Excellent accommodations, service and location! Close to key sites without being right in the center of Times Square. Now our preferred hotel for mid-town stays. Highly recommend the Hard Rock Hotel NYC!

title: Great
text: Great hotel, great staff, great location and pretty big rooms for it being in New York. The room was cleaned to a good standard each day and the amenities are fantastic. Not a single complaint. Would definitely recommend to anyone!

title: Excellent option!!
text:
Although the hotel is near Times Square and that could be something to think about the crowded of the zone, when you are in the hotel you feel safe and everything is so nice.

The arrival could be a challenge if there are closed streets, police doesn’t care if you want to make a left in the 48th street.

title: Simply amazing!!!
text: I loved my stay with Hard Rock NYC!!!! Great location with minute-walk from the most known places, like Times Square and 5th Avenue!!!!! Great food and service. The bedroom was cleaned every day and we received a special gift with candies, chocolate and a great bottle of champagne because we were there on New Year's Eve!!!! I recommend to anyone and I really want to return!!!

title: NYE The Hard Rock Way
text: Everyone knows that NYE in Times Square can very challenging , but what I can say is that the Hard Rock was amazing from the time we checked in to the time we checked out. From all the employee's to the room , food and beverages everything was on point and not a beat was missed!!!!. Thank You Hard Rock

title: Hard Rock NY Rocks!
text: As a 25+ year Hard Rock enthusiast, I am often critical of my experiences.  Hard Rock  New York was fantastic and accommodated all of our needs.  Position right in Times Square, I had easy access to everything I wanted to see.  Thank you!  I'll be back!

title: Very nice and central place
text: Central and new area in the middle of everything.. Service could be more personal and should be oriented towards the concerns of the customers. The people at RT60 love their job and made our time really nice!

title: 8 Day Stay
text:
New York a fantastic place to visit. Hotel is in an excellent location, 1 minute from Times Square, with plenty of restaurants and dinners nearby.

4 adults in a room with 2 Queen size beds? Overall a great room but realistically not much hanging or drawer space for your clothes. Room quality is good. Room cleanliness excellent. 
Found breakfast service was slow and fell below expectations. Despite enjoyiong our stay, would probably try another hotel for a change.

title: Barista scortese ma si mangia bene
text:
Abbiamo mangiato bene, ma il personale ( in particolare il barista) è stato super scortese, ci
aveva cacciato dal locale perché non avevo il passaporto con me. Ma da quando c'è bisogno di un documento per mangiare? Ovviamente lui pensava fossimo lì per bere, e noi ovviamente gli abbiamo detto che volevamo mangiare e accomodarci quindi per pranzare.
Alla fine ci siamo rivolti a un'altra cameriera che in modo davvero carino ci ha accompagnato al tavolo e senza problemi abbiamo mangiato un buonissimo cibo.

title: Terrible. Lying and deceptive experience.
text:
I’ll keep this brief as I don’t want to waste a moment more of my time with this classless, thieving, lying outfit.

Booked 2 rooms, very small, smelt of smoke and incredibly noisy despite being on the 28th floor. This is a new hotel but basically a facelift of an old one. 

After one night, we decided to cut our losses and request  to check out early, we had 3 nights remaining. We were happy to forgo the cost of the 1 night of the day we checked out because of the 24 hour notice period. Also there we were given no viable option of other rooms as hotel was at almost capacity and we needed 2 rooms together  We booked through a third party so their advice was to claim the other 2 nights back through that party. Long story but the conversation was later denied by the hotel, no refund had been given and to boot my son left an expensive shirt in the hotel when checking out and when I went back to collect it, guess what … no record. 

The common areas of this hotel are quite show stopping and you’d be fooled to think this is a cool establishment by the photos etc, but trust me , aside from one lovely staff member , this place is all fur coat and no knickers.

Oh went to the rooftop bar too, rude obnoxious staff! Asked for a mojito, apparently New York doesn’t ‘do’ mojitos.

There are plenty of other hotels to choose from , maybe visit the bar in the lobby as it’s kinda cool to see the memorabilia but certainly I would never recommend staying at this place.

Sincerely annoyed!

title: Hotel and events
text: New years Eve was really bad organized, hotel staff told me they were not in charge of the event and that the event was OVERBOOKED by the event planner!! Disappointed to now that the Hard Rock Hotel in NY doesn’t has experience organizing events…

title: Fantastic hotel great location
text:
Such a great base to get around NYC,
Lovely hotel with great interiors and staff.
We stayed in a 2 x double bed room as a family of four.  room compact but beautifully appointed.
Ate at sessions - food was great.

title: Très bel hôtel correspond à un vrai 5 étoiles
text: Digne d’un 5 étoiles ! Très belles prestations. Seul bémol très proche de Time square donc beaucoup de monde mais ça n’enlève rien à la qualité des prestations de cet hôtel. Belle expérience ! Je conseille

title: Great location....poor service
text:
We stayed here as a couple for 5 nights mid December. Firstly, I would say the location of this hotel is fantastic! Really convenient for Times Square, Rockefeller, Fifth Ave and there are a number of subway stations within minutes of walking. 
We got checked in by Jose, who was by far the most pleasant employee we came across. 
Our room was beautiful and really spacious, clean and the views were lovely! We couldn't hear too many sirens, but I don't understand why people would book such a central hotel and then complain about sirens?! Didn't bother us at all! Bed was very comfortable and slept really well.

The reason why we didn't give this hotel 5 stars was because of the service by staff at both the lobby bar and the RT60 rooftop bar. The chap on the front desk of the RT60 (young guy, wears jewellery) was so unpleasant to deal with and was more interested in speaking with his friends than greeting us just stood around at the desk waiting to be seated (with a reservation). When we were seated, a number of staff walked past us with no offer of a drink. We asked if someone could take our order who said they would send over server to us.....still waiting....ended up going to the bar and getting our drinks there! bye bye tip!
The next evening, we went back and the same guy on the front desk was so unwelcoming and we cut our visit short and didn't both wasting anymore time there because of the poor service.
We also had a drink after a full day of sightseeing in the lobby bar, again waiting round for ages for someone to come over and ask us for a drink, despite us sitting on the seats right on front of the bar & no one else around! Ended up going up to the bar again and ordering drinks. There were 2 people folding napkins on the desk to the side with people waiting for drink orders- didn't make sense. We did not go back here.

Overall it was a pleasant stay. Expensive, but that's NY! Rooms are great but service needs fine tuning.

title: Well situated, but not for families
text: The hotel couldn’t be better situated, close to a lot of major attractions. The rooms were clean and small, but hey, it’s New York so we expected small. We were on the 23rd floor, but we still heard the constant honking and sirens outside, which did disturb sleep. We were with our two teens, who decided to check out the other floors to gets pictures of the memorabilia, but when they went to the 35th flood, the elevator brought them downstairs where a security guard entered and told them they shouldn’t have gone there, and isn’t allowed. The guy actually escorted them back to the room, and they were so traumatized by how he spoke to them that they refused to go anywhere alone after that. It would be have been nice to be told if a floor is off limits, instead of treating two teen french girls like they were criminals. Also, if you use their parking services, please be aware they do park your car far away, in another hotel’s parking. They actually left our car in the street for 24 hours, then moved it, and it took them an hour and a half to get it back to us once we checked out.

title: Great City Spot
text:
Super fun hotel right in the heart beat of NYC. Great walking to sites and restaurants. 
The hotel itself is fab. NY Rockers memorabilia everywhere. Staff was SO attentive from the door men, to security, the managers and especially the bar tenders. 
Would definately repeat the stay.

title: Sei notti perfette
text: Ho passato la settimana di Natale e devo dire che sono pienamente soddisfatta. Albergo nuovo con camere non grandi ma decisamente confortevoli, letto comodissimi come anche i cuscini, pulizia ineccepibile fatta sempre in tempo per il rientro del pisolino pomeridiano. Macchina del caffè Lavazza con quattro capsule al giorno, servizio per me graditissimo. Unica pecca il frigo bar che non funzionava e quindi vuoto, e la mancanza di un servizio navetta da e per l’aeroporto. Consigliato

title: Hard Rock Christmas Vibes
text:
I chose this property because my son and nephew LOVE this chain. It was perfectly located in Times Square 1.5 blocks from the tree and had great finds near by like Max Brenner,  coffee shops and more. 

The lobby/ Sessions was beautifully decorated . Sessions had overly priced food but breakfast was truly delicious and the cocktails were really good. 

Rt 60 missed the mark for us, though cool concept , to me, roof tops are special with good views and seasonal flair. Stayed true to Hard Rock brand but not to NYC. Nothing holiday about it and missed opportunity to jazz up the terrace for Christmas. Sessions had cozy domes for that purpose.

The room was as expected in NYC , cramped. Limited room to unpack ( double queens). The beds and linens were comfortable and very clean. The bathroom was cramped with no towel hooks but had good very products. Fridge was not working . TV had streaming which was appreciated for the teens.

Our biggest complaint was the room smell ( like dog)  secondary was the lack of working elevators. 

Overall we did really enjoy it and the kids were very happy. I think that for the value of the price, location and overall vibe of this hotel most guests will find it great for a short trip. If staying longer is opt to spend more for more space. 

Note I didn't find many kids here. The double room is the only option for four and you can't be on the rooftop with kids past a designated time . For teens it was perfect but for little kids you may find it challenging to travel with stroller / pack and play etc.

title: Best stay
text: Had the most amazing stay and this will be our go to from now on when we come to New York, especially at Christmas. Attention to detail in all areas of the hotel, from the bar to the rooms, is second to none, and we couldn’t you asked for a better location. Even better that at night you hear no noise you almost forget you’re in Times Square. ;Anyone moaning about the security deposit etc. clearly didn’t take the time to look on their website, where it states all of this). Looking forward to returning already!

title: Ideal location and  beautiful hotel
text:
The hotel is ideally located just off of Times Square and a short walk from the Rockefeller Centre. The room was a good size, spotless with an extremely comfortable bed. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the food from the restaurant was beautiful and very reasonably priced. 
I would highly recommend this hotel and will definitely return.

title: Not what I expected
text: Firstly, I want to emphasize the importance of attention to detail. Guests expect a high level of service when they spend their hard-earned money on a hotel stay. Unfortunately, I experienced some issues during my visit that left me disappointed. Finding leftover food from a previous guest in my room was unpleasant, and dealing with plumbing problems was frustrating. Additionally, I booked two rooms, it is expected that the adjoining room is giving to me however they moved my children to a room that had no adjoining doors and they gave my adjoining room to another family. It was uncomfortable having strangers staying next door, especially considering their noisy children disrupted my stay.

title: Ci tornerei
text:
Ottimo albergo nuovo, una menzione speciale per la pulizia accurata, capsule di caffè Lavazza ogni giorno, il resto nulla da dire, bello con un rooftop molto carino. Caro, ma direi che considerando la media degli alberghi newyorkesi ci sta.
Consigliato

title: Comfortable and enjoyable stay!
text: A great location 2 mins from Times Square, very clean, friendly, and excellent service. Rooftop bar is lovely and food is well priced and good. The only thing I would highlight is fairly typical of New York I think  - room size for a family is quite tight in a Double Queen Deluxe which is supposed to be appropriate for four people. I do however fully recommend it as a hotel to stay in and would happily go back.

title: Great place to stay
text: Excellent location just off time square, close to everything. Lovely modern hotel, great if you like music memorabilia. Room was a good size and comfortable with everything you need. Reception and lobby staff couldn’t have been more friendly or helpful.

title: Item lost out of room
text:
We stayed here for 7 nights, end of November to beginning of December. 
The hotel it’s self was nice and the location was good, however after a few nights Of being there I noticed my Victoria secret pyjama bottoms were missing (worth £70). I mentioned it to reception three times and on the third occasion they looked in lost and found, they brought out someone else's pyjamas to me. I told them they’re not mine, so they said there is nothing else they can do, they can’t find them. Obviously after spending a considerable amount of money to stay at this hotel, I was not happy.

title: Excellent stay at the Hard Rock Times Square
text: This place has an excellent location and is friendly and clean with really comfortable rooms and great food.  An added pleasure to your New York experience.  It is close to Theaters, Rockafeller Center, Fifth Avenue, and not too far from Central Park.  Everything else is a short subway ride away.

title: Best hotel in New York
text: The staff and all employees were beyond helpful and knowledgeable and me and my family will definitely be booking here again. The restaurant is probably one of the best restaurants I’ve ever been to as well.

title: The worst hotel experience ever!!!
text: If you're looking for an over priced award winning run around this is the place to waste your money.  The staff will lie to your face with a smile.  Don’t bother with reservations, doesn’t matter anyway.  Asked to see a manager who couldn’t be bothered.

title: Good but needs 5 star service to go with it..
text:
The hotel is well located and modern.
The rooms are beautiful and comfortable.
Breakfast is quite expensive for what it includes.
Ryan and Michael's concierge service was great.
The service provided by the front office manager was terrible.
In general the service provided by the staff needs many improvements.

title: Fantastic hotel in a superb location
text: We stayed 4 nights in the Hard Rock Hotel, it was in a fantastic location, easy walking distance to everywhere we wanted to visit, the hotel was spotlessly clean, staff were friendly and helpful, our room was a good size with comfy beds, great shower, views from our room, we didn't eat in  the hotel but they do food, drinks and music, would highly recommend.

title: Shower head fell on head
text:
Had terrible experience, the shower head fell onto my head. I have epilepsy and it was dangerous what happened. Management did not even care. Emailed a few times and never came back to them. Stayed all over the world from - 1 star hotels back packing to the best hotels, and this even though pretends  to be 5*

Just be safe and don’t book!

title: Pictures in the internet are fake
text: The room had nothing to do with the description in the internet. The photos are fake! No bath tub, the suite is a single room.For a new hotel bad room conditions. (broken shutters) The only highlight was the bar and breakfeast area.

title: Great
text: This hotel is a great place to stay. Everyone is kind and pleasant. Rooms were clean and very quiet.  Hallways and common areas all clean!  Can’t say enough good things about this stay. This will be my go to hotel from now on.

title: Hotel was a pleasant surprise
text: We stayed at Hard Rock in Dec 2023. The hotel was a great surprise. It was modern and clean. The ambience was awesome. Amazing lobby bar/restaurant. The rooftop bar is also amazing. Seemed like a popular spot for non-guests as well, but was not crowded. The food at Sessions was great. The staff are all very friendly. The rooms were modern and clean. The layout is a little weird with how you walk into the sink area of the bathroom. Space saver but awkward. Find for 1 person, might be odd for a couple. The room is small but was very comfortable. It has the essentials. It was great that you could close the door to the bedroom and the toilet room for a bit more privacy. Really have zero complaints. I often stay at Four Seasons, St. Regis, JW, but they were way too $$ this time of year. This hotel was no less satisfying for a weekend stay. And the location was very central.

title: Christmas Trip
text: Staff was inappropriate and MIA most of the time therefore not worth the money to stay here at all. I have stayed at many other hotels in Times Square and can confidently say to others to spend your money elsewhere!

title: Very expensive for what it is
text: Go to one of the HR restaurants if you want the Hard Rock experience. The hotel is very expensive for what it is - better and cheaper alternatives available in the center of NYC. Bar/restaurants are average. Food experience nothing like the restaurants.

title: FABULOUS STAY
text:
Location excellent for all amenities, check in faultless and staff welcoming and professional. 
The hotel is beautiful and spotless, bar area very nice and breakfast choice very good. Rooms are very clean, well presented with all the necessary amenities including toiletries and coffee making. We booked  3 rooms for our party of 6 via British Airways, the only downside is the €40 per night 'city tax' which is extortionate!!!!
All in all a great stay and would HIGHLY RECOMMEND

title: Trip of a lifetime
text:
NY at Christmas is a different experience. 
We went as a family for my mums 60th and the location of the hotel as well as the theme, entertainment and rooftop bar was a great addition to the holiday. 
The doorman were great when the police shut the street stopping our car to the airport from entering. They ran ahead and got the cars attention and took our bags down the street using a trolly dolly. Without there help we may have not see the car due to how busy it was. Fantastic service!

title: Holiday December 23
text: Clean and comfortable rooms . Friendly and helpful staff. Very noisy in rooms from the street. Very expensive for food. Not a fan of gender neutral toilets. Sessions was great for a drink and the rooftop bar was great also. Great base as close to everything.

title: Good location, very clean with friendly staff
text:
I would recommend this hotel to people who don’t want twin beds and tea making facilities.
Clean, friendly, comfortable beds, good location. Expensive resort charge for a bottle of water in the room each day.

title: Great Hotel - Perfect Location
text: I stayed at hotel for 4 nights and was extremely pleased with the facility, staff, etc..   Hotel is very close to everything in Times Square and also has great restaurants, etc. on site.   Hotel is pretty new and has very high end guest rooms -- loved the rain shower.

title: Great Xmas in NYC
text: Great hotel right in the hearth of Times Square. If you want to be in the thick of it then this hotel is perfect. Large rooms with good showers and enough space. The bar and social areas are very good. We ate breakfast one day. The food and service were very good.

title: Hard Rock? Soft Rock!
text:
We were so disappointed with this hotel. 
First impressions were good but the hotel didn’t have any soul. 
It was let down by certain members of staff who failed to be friendly but one waiter who was amazing and gave us a welcome was Milton who was wonderful and greeted us most mornings. Why aren’t the staff all like this???

title: Perfect location. Clean. Comfortable.
text: I stayed at the Hard Rock for five days. I was visiting New York for all things Christmas. This was the absolute perfect location. Steps from Time Square, the Radio City Music Hall Rockettes and Broadway shows. Walkable to Rockefeller Center, Macy’s, Christmas windows on 5th Avenue, the ballet at Lincoln Center and the diamond district. If you don’t like to walk the subway is just a block away. The hotel itself was extremely clean. There was a room cleaning service and fresh towels and water in the room every day which after covid I have not in many hotels. The staff was welcoming and kind. The room was plenty big for two of us especially considering we’re in New York! I will be staying here any time I travel to New York from now on!

title: No sound isolation between rooms
text:
Location is great, service excellent. Food is very average. Prices are very high.
I would not mark this hotel as 5 star. Rooms are nice, cleaness is great but the biggest problem is sound. You can hear everything from the hallway as well as the neighbours. As if there is absolutely no sound isolation.
A Hard Rock hotel shouldnt allow this. No peace in rooms and no privacy.
We have been to many 5 star hotel in NYC but this one we wont visit any more!

title: Not worth the money
text:
The hotel was really mediocre at best. 

1) the bed was extremely uncomfortable, almost unbearable. I could barely sleep on it. 

2) the staff were not very friendly (other than the people who provided a greeting when you walked in, they were very nice)

3) they did nothing about a very uncomfortable situation that caused a huge issue our last morning. There was a man in a room next to us who was screaming at someone in the room with him from literally 7am until we decided to just leave early becauSe we couldn’t take it anymore (10:30) - it was so loud and angry we couldn’t even sleep Through it. 

The price was exorbitant which is fine that’s New York, but there are plenty of other hotels around that are worth the price of the stay.

title: Excellent all around!
text:
Great location. Excellent staff. Luxurious rooms. High floors have stunning views. The lobby restaurant offers excellent food prepared to your request with an atmosphere of European élégance. 
We always stay here.

title: Lovely New York
text: This hotel is the perfect base for a great stay in New York. It’s so close to Times Square, the subway and the bus tours. Our room was spacious enough for 2 with plenty of hanging space for clothes. A nice touch to have bottles of water each day and a coffee machine to use if needed. We absolutely loved our stay here & the staff working here. Would highly recommend.

title: Hard rock with a soft heart🎸❤️
text: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this brilliantly located hotel. The hotel itself is immaculately, kept with a modern and luxurious feel. The rooms, although on the small side are absolutely adequate, and the beds are super comfy. All the staff that we met were extremely friendly professional and very accommodating. Our housekeeper was absolutely superb. We could not fault any service we received ,All in All. Our experience was top-notch. Thank you very much hard rock Hotel, Mr and Mrs Simmons room 2408.

title: Terrible, frustrated and grossed out
text: Service was terrible.  Food was very late.  Our wine was not served until the end of the meal.  And this was asking for our wine twice.  Waiters did not care.  Food was gross.  Should have walked out.

title: un hotel bien placé
text:
C'est un hotel dont les chambres sont grandes et agréables, l'hotel est bien placé, original et l'accueil trés correct.
C'est une valeur sur malgré quelques rares et peu importants  désagréments.
Il peut êtr recommendé sans problème si le quartier vous plait.

title: Times Square Experience
text: Nice hotel in great location in the heart of Times Square making it easy to walk to most attractions. Hotel is well run, the room was nice, I did not like the $40 'residence fee' on top of the booking charge. Is this unique to this hotel or a US thing?

title: Best Hotel I've stayed in
text:
Staff were so helpful before I even arrived. Great communication and helpful with a request.
Hotel was immaculate. Staff very friendly. Beds really comfortable. Air conditioning perfect.
Room size was great. 2 queen beds. We had 4 suitcases and there was loads of room. Mine slid in next to the bed and my niece against the wall near the table area. Not in the way at all. 
Little banquette and chair with a table. Good lighting options. Black out blind. Water and coffee topped up daily. Quiet rooms, good sound proofing. Even if it got busy there was no problem getting a lift. Had them to ourselves mostly (and it was Thanksgiving) We got the guitar for our room for fun. I arranged champagne and strawberries for the room, which I obviously paid for. But the help in arranging this was so good. A list of other items they could arrange was emailed and I had at least 3 different people email.to confirm or ask if I needed more help. 
The bell man weighed our cases for us as my niece was worried. 
Doorman so friendly. Even housekeeping were so smiley and asked how our stay was. I think it's a great choice. I would say it's the best hotel I've stayed in. Not a single bad thing to say about our stay.

title: Honeymoon
text:
We recently stayed at Hard Rock Hotel New York for our honeymoon and were very pleased with our stay. The staff were fantastic and our room was beautiful and clean. The concierge staff were very helpful and knowledgeable. Both check in and check out were fast and relatively easy. We enjoyed having drinks at Sessions in the hotel - the vibe was so cool. 
We can’t wait to return one day!

title: Great hotel in an excellent location
text:
An excellent hotel in a great location. 
The hotel is in the perfect location for exploring New York, close to the public transportation links and lots of local restaurants to choose from including the on site restaurants.
The staff are friendly, the rooms are spotless.

title: Excellent Hotel
text: Hotel is in a great location to explore NYC, just off times square and in short walking distance to Rockerfeller Plaza, Saks and Bryant Park. Subways are nearby and plenty of shops. Also very close to all theatres. Nothing is too much bother for the staff, and was able to leave our luggage there after checking out until we had to leave for our flight late afternoon. I would definately stay here again

title: Great hotel and location
text: The Hard Rock New York is in a great location. The staff is great and super helpful and friendly. Rooms are not big but very comfortable. Additional drawer space would be a big plus. Overall, it’s a great place to stay!

title: Thanksgiving Visit
text: We booked this trip to watch our daughter in the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day parade. The location, hotel, amenities, staff were all excellent. While we visited friends at other hotels, The Hard Rock Hotel was always neat, calm, welcoming, and we all felt like we were coming “home”. I was thankful we made such an excellent choice for our stay. Highly recommend this property for your stay no matter what brings you to the heart of the Big Apple.

title: Hard Rock Don't CARE
text:
WE'RE really disappointed
Came to New York on special business trip
Still at the hotel, and they really don't care.
Don't believe all the hype
Better in a premier inn ...UK guests would understand.
Hope they sort as some staff are exceptionsl

title: Thanksgiving place to stay
text:
Staff was friendly and helpful.  Bell service staff was the best! They held our baggage after our check out time to allow us to have a great experience in the city before leaving for home.
Very close to Thanksgiving parade route and to Times Square. 
Rooms were clean, but a little small.

title: Wonderful Stay
text: We stayed for the week of Thanksgiving. Location is great between Rockefeller Center and Broadway. Rooms are clean and spacious. Beds and pillows were very comfortable. Restaurant had good food and the staff is very nice.

title: Good experience
text: When I came to this hotel again, I was waiting and really looking forward to seeing the server Julia Roessman from the Sessions Restaurant on the 2nd floor. I'd love to see her back again the next time I come here.

title: Very poor service
text:
I am stayed at the Hard Rock hotel New York for 2 nights and was very disappointed with the service in fact there is no service.

The bar was closed so I couldn’t even get a Diet Coke. The restaurant was also sold out by people who are not even staying at the hotel so no hotel food for me.. I reported this to the Manager and to be honest she did not care and didn’t even offer to get me 2 Diet Cokes. It’s not the fact she couldn’t get me the drinks it was her attitude.

On check in my card was not charged correctly and was told she had forgot to charge the destination fee and taxes so she has to get a calculator to see what additional money they wanted and I had to insert my card again and even though she apologised it was not really acceptable. 
The room has no fridge and the air conditioning will not go below 69f and the room is very hot.
A very over priced hotel with poor service and there are much better hotels in NYC in this high price range. I gave this hotel a try and it was a mistake.

Your advertisement also does not inform a guest the $75 room credit does not include taxes or gratuities so if you use the credit you have to spend more money to use it which is very deceiving.

title: Avoid if you want service
text:
This place has illusions of grandeur and guests that are as common as muck but think they are the Royalty.
This is a hotel that has no service and a management that couldn’t care less about satisfying its guests.
This is a hotel that is charging over $500 a night on Thanksgiving that decides to close the bar at 9pm ,so can’t get a drink.
The $20 destination fee is a joke as can only be used when bars are open and I wanted a drink then not the next day.
And also tax and gratuity are added to the $20.
The rooms are small with no fridge just a cooler that wouldn’t cool a bottle of water in a month!
I would not recommend the hotel to anyone as everyone that works here has a bad attitude and I am always calm when speaking to any Hotel employees.
But sadly they could not satisfy my needs with 2 diet cokes so had to go out to McDonalds for a drink!
Hard Rock Hotel New York is an overpriced joke of a hotel.

title: Great hotel, service and location
text: Everything was really good. Great service, perfect location and freshly done interior. If you want to stay more quietly in NY, Hard Rock is not the place. You are living in the most central part. Slightly too small space for the two suitcases.

title: Be positive, this is the right hotel for you and your family.
text: Sometimes when you're taking your family on vacation it's hard to know if the place you are staying is really as nice as the pictures or if it's in a good spot, or if it will have all the things you need. Trust me when I tell you, be positive in the hard rock. This hotel will only help to make your vacation more memorable.

title: A great trip and a return visit definitely on the cards.
text:
A first time visit to New York and for me a good hotel is the base that you need for all trips and luckily this hotel matched the brief in every way. By the time we had arrived Christmas was in full swing and I don't doubt that Thanksgiving would also be dutifully celebrated in style too.

The hotel is Stylish, modern, friendly, relaxing, super clean and I guess everything you'd expect of Hard Rock. I love Hard Rock cafe just for the memorabilia and the hotel keeps this up as well with notable examples from Rhianna, Bob Dylan, Bon Jovi, Bowie to Sammy Davis Jnr and John Lennon. 

All of the staff from the bellhop staff to reception, to waiters and bar staff - both main bar and Floor 34 were excellent and ready if they needed to be. Drink choice was good and the food was great quality and a good quantity as well.

Location was really convenient and literally 100-150m from Times Square and it was nice as it was just off of the main strip, so any excessive noise was reduced, apart from the howl of the fire engine siren which to be fair nothing could drown that out!  

A big shout out to the concierge Renaldo Moore who was professional and friendly in every way both prior to the arrival and during the stay. I made contact about  5 wks. before to arrange for additional room amenities to be added and over the course of this a good set of options were presented to me, I was then able to explain what I wanted and how I wanted it to be set up and then when we arrived it was delivered as expected. There was a small issue, no fault of his, but he dealt with it really well and he and the respective manager made up for the inconvenience. He also helped out with some directions for the subway to Brooklyn so we could walk back over the bridge and these were spot on too.

As a family we will be back to NY and after my HR hotel experience, I know my first port of call before booking the flights.

title: Nice, new hotel in the heart of the city
text: This hotel is sparkling new and a great addition to the hotels of NYC.  The only other hotel I’ve stayed at was the Marriott marquis so this will be my basis of comparison.
