Hard Rock appears much smaller…and is maybe a half block off the main center area.  The location was great and the staff were very pleasant and seemed always available if you needed anything.  The room was clean and well appointed although the modern light system was somewhat confusing at first.  The elevators ran pretty well and never seemed to be a problem getting one.   We attempted to borrow a guitar but it never came only to see it sitting there behind the desk at checkout.  I don’t know how many they have.  It’s a great idea but realize they may be in short supply.  The unity member benefit credit was not fully explained at check in that the daily benefit would not accrue.  This was also not credited when we went to check out.  We needed to ask.

title: Rock Solid Hotel
text: Great hotel that gives you everything you need when you're staying in NY. Location is super convenient to everything imaginable. Staff is great, rooms are better. My new go to place. I've lived in New York most of my life and have stayed in numerous hotels since I've left. This is certainly on the top of my list. GO !!! You won't be dissapointed.

title: Perfect stay- worth the money!
text:
Absolutely perfect stay!  Sure, New York hotels are expensive, but since there’s no way around that, choose wisely!  Hard Rock exceeded my expectations and delivered a wonderful travel experience.  

Rooms are spotlessly clean, beds are comfy and bathroom is well appointed. Easy and efficient temperature control, and room is spacious by NYC standards.  Zero wait for elevators.  Food is delicious and a cut above what you might expect.  Hospitality is great- I felt like a valued guest as soon as we walked in.  Every staff member was amazing but special mentions to:
Brittany and Chris at check- in
Kirt in Security
Gabriel in the gift shop
Zavier and Julio in the restaurant 
Demitri at RT60
Ariadne in Housekeeping

title: Great New Hotel in the Thick of Times Square
text: A very nice hotel. Well designed and decorated.  For New York the rooms are fantastic. Staff is top notch.  Overall, a great experience. Can be a little noisy since you are right in the middle of it all.

title: Just Awesome
text: Couldn't have asked for better I spent a lot of time looking at and reading hotel reviews before I booked. I made perfect choice the cleanliness service comfort and location were perfect ! I would definitely stay there again

title: Conveniently Located and Clean, Comfortable Room
text: Hotel was conveniently located to Time Square and other NYC sights.  Room was clean and there was enough room for the three of us.  Bed was comfortable.  Decor in room  was a nice subtle nod to music industry.  Fridge in room was put to good use.   Plenty of hot water and good water pressure.  Walking distance to Penn Station.

title: très bien situé
text:
très bien situé près de la 7e avenue 
juste immense bar au dernier étage 
la chambre est grande bémol douche et wc fermé et lavabo dans le couloir bizarre comme conception ?? il y a des jeux de portes coulissantes pour s isolés heureusement ??
ne prendre le petit dej hors de prix 
vous avez des boulangeries juste à côté qui le font très bien et pour 10 dollars ( au lieu de 40 ? )
belle hôtel

title: Amazing experience
text: I recently stayed at a hotel in NYC as a birthday gift for my husband, and it was an amazing experience. We stayed in a superior room with an incredible view of Broadway and Times Square. The hotel's location was perfect, and the service was exceptional.

title: Great Stay
text: The staff is incredible. So friendly and helpful. Hotel and rooms are very clean. Location of hotel could me have been more convenient to Times Square, theater district and Rockefeller Square. We will stay here the next trip to New York.

title: We loved our stay
text:
We really enjoyed our stay. Hotel is glam and high quality thought out, very clean too.
Beds are so comfrey, literally one of the best hotel beds ever. The rooms are really well done, we had a Queen quad, 2 adults and 2 kids. The rooms are compact but I hear this is the norm in NYC. 
Staff were very friendly. Food and drinks in the bar were on the pricy side but where isn’t in NYC. 
Would defo recommend this hotel.

title: Clean and comfortable
text: First experience with a Hard Rock. The location can't be beat. Surprised by how quiet it was inside. Rooms were huge for NYC, and very comfortable. Daily room service appreciated. Would return in a heartbeat!

title: Impressive
text: Very impressed with this hotel.  It was really beautiful and clean.  The staff was incredibly helpful and accommodating.  My husband got to play with a guitar (for free) that was delivered to his room.  We are planning to stay here again next time we are in NYC.

title: A great hub for Times Square.
text:
Beautiful hotel with nicely appointed rooms and helpful staff. 

Location was central which is a blessing and a curse, expect to be able to reach all of the main sights quickly from this hub but also expect to hear everyone honking their car horns which appears to be some form of non verbal often very verbal communication in this city. 

We upgraded our room to a superior room but this seems to have been a waste of time and the view from the room was poor either way. 

Hotel is lovely tho and I slept very well getting a comfortable nights sleep but my partner struggled to get a good nights sleep with all of the ruckus. So long as you’re happy to appreciate the noise the hotel is a very nice place to stay.

title: Location, room, service ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
text:
My 2 teenage daughters and I stayed here in July and I have been telling everyone how amazing this hotel is, so thought it was time to do a review. 

The location is perfect! It is just off Times Square and an easy walk to the Rockefeller Centre but very quiet and felt like a haven from the busy city. The room was clean, modern and a good size for the 3 of us. We upgraded to a high floor/city view which wasn’t really worth the money but it didn’t affect the stay. There are plenty of lifts and we didn’t ever have a long wait (not always the case in NY). 

The BEST thing about the hotel is the amazing staff. Check in  was friendly and easy. The restaurants were great and staff so lovely. When it was raining, the doorman just gave us an umbrella as we walked out (he did it  so nicely without us even asking). Everyone made us feel welcome and looked after. 

I have saved the best until last… the concierge team were our guardian angels! There was terrible storm, our flight leaving NY was cancelled and we couldn’t get another one for 3 days. I found a flight leaving Washington that evening but had to get there within 6 hours. The concierge team found me an amazing car and driver. Packed us in safely with plenty of water for the journey and weren’t phased by my stress. They really were the best team ever! Thank you. 

We will definitely be staying again.

title: Hotel maravilhoso
text: Amamos a hospedagem no hotel Hard Rock, além da localização perfeita, o hotel é lindo, confortável, com ótima acústica nos quartos, e a equipe muito atenciosa. Voltaríamos com certeza, fomos muito bem acolhidos. A academia também é excelente

title: great service
text: I participated in a conference held in AC on both Wednesday and Thursday. Despite not being a VIP guest, Carolina, the woman at the reception desk, made me feel like one. She assisted me with a quick check-in, allowing me to bypass the lengthy line, as I was running late for a meeting. Grateful for her help!

title: Worth it but expensive food and drink
text:
Nice hotel very friendly staff can't do enough to help you. Room was cleaned everyday. Nice shower. View was good we had a 22nd floor room. The only down points where the food and drinks prices, I think they think of a price and charge it stupid expensive shame they don't give discount to people who stop in the hotel....
Had to pay a residence fee of $48 per day not sure what they pays for seems a little expensive to me

title: Great stay but beware of taxes
text: Lovely comfortable hotel in a fantastic location! My only advice is to be aware of taxes. We knew we had to pay $40 taxes per night but when looking on the website it states that $20 of this can be used on food however this is not the case! Also they take a large security deposit at check in which you are not told about.

title: Nice Experience, Ideally Located
text: B/c of our events in NYC, my daughter (8) and I stayed at the Hard Rock.  It was ideally located near Times Square and we were able to walk to our concert and Broadway show the next day.  Times Square is not my favorite place in NYC, but the Hard Rock was clean, smelled wondeful, and our room was very nice and clean.  We felt very safe and all the staff members were very friendly.  I know it is expensive, but comparable to other hotels in the area, it was an ok price.  There is a Chipotle right next door, it is close the M&M and Hershey store, and there are two ice cream places nearby, obviously this was a kid centered visit.  If I had to stay in Times Square again, I would definitely consider the Hard Rock.  It was a nice respite in the chaos of that area.

title: Great choice in a great locaion
text: We spent 6 nights in Hard Rock Hotel and enjoyed every second. We upgraded to a Studio Suite which was well worth it. For a New York Hotel the rooms were huge and the experience from first to last day was amazing.

title: Gabriel, Thank You! Perfect Broadway stay
text:
Gabriel went above and beyond to make our stay very memorable.  Above and beyond!  
We booked through American Express and received some perks but it is the people working there, including porter and bartender, make all the difference.  You should consider it especially if you are in town for a Broadway show.

title: Top Location in NYC
text: Top located, next to Times Square and Broadway, top design, special for fans of rock music. Not far away from Rockefeller Center and 5th Ave, Central Park, Bryant Park and other sightseeing attractions.

title: Not coming back.
text: Room doesn't match description nor pictures, bad service in bar, extremely noisy room could hear everything from outside. Getting a tea at 11 pm on such a hotel shouldn't be a problem. Very fast check in and check out. Overall will not come back.

title: Amazing Property!
text: This is by far the nicest hotel in Times Square and one of the nicest hotels in the city. The rooftop bar is incredible and the overall vibe is great due to the extremely friendly staff, the music programming (live and recorded) and the overall quality of the furnishings and memorabilia that is on display throughout the hotel. Phenomenal value for a hotel of this quality.

title: Lovely hotel
text: The hotel is lovely very clean and spacious rooms . The staff were friendly and attentive and although it’s just off Broadway and Times Square . It’s very quiet at night we were however on the 24th of 34 floors so that possibly helped. Like all places in New York drinks and food are expensive. But we enjoyed our stay

title: Hard Rock Hotel NYC
text:
We stayed as a couple in a Superior King Room for a week in October 2023.
The hotel is ideally located close to Times Square and Broadway. Nice modern boutique hotel.
Friendly and accommodating staff. The room was modern, clean and well appointed.
We had good meals and breakfasts at Sessions restaurant, where we had a friendly greeting from Milton our waiter who made sure we were happy with our meals and stay at the hotel.

title: Good but bland
text: The hotel was very clean, well presented and well maintained. For a Hard Rock venue it was a little bland. The team were fine but none of them went over and above or made any effort with our children at all.

title: Hard Rock Cafe Hotel NY in October 23
text: Excellent location, access to diners and broadway is perfect, rooms are of a good size and clean for a highly populated area. The room charges you need to be aware of, and the local NY daily hotel taxes at $40 US per day need to be considered.

title: Great location
text: The location is great. the service too. The regular rooms are a little bit small but comfortable, however they could improve restaurant and bar options, limited items on the menu and it's very difficult to get a table at RT60.

title: Misrepresented the food and drink credit
text: I was told at arrival that I had $100 of food and beverage credit as well as an additional $20 a day (for $40) through Amex. I asked for a paper copy of this and was told there is no paper printout of the benefit. After the visit I was charged my $48 breakfast because apparently it was actually a $100 food and beverage credit. They only applied $92 of my credit even. The check-in person was WRONG and told me the incorrect information and Hard Rock did not wish to give me the credit for this.

title: Location and room great.
text:
First the bad.. check in was fast and easy enough but we were not informed of anything… like how to use the lift. You have to scan your card to be able to go to any other floor.. we sat in the lift going up and down without opening doors for 5 minutes until someone else got in and told us what to do.

The second - you are in the heart of the city, near Times Square , it is busy and a lot of traffic. Noise at night is immense with sirens and car horns until the early hours.  Kept us up on the first night but we did acclimatise. 

Apart from that, rooms are clean and beds soft (if you like a soft bed). The feel of the hotel
Is great, and cannot fault friendly staff and cleanliness throughout.  Prices are steep but, you step in to New York and soon realise this is the norm.

Would I go back, yes….

title: Average stay - $$$$$
text:
My partner and I recently stayed at this hotel for 6 nights in a superior king size room. This hotel is in a fantastic location and we upgraded to a city room for $50 which provided us with the views of Times Square steps. The room was nice and clean with a very comfortable bed. 

However, from the moment your hotel experience starts it feels somewhat like a money making scheme. Yes I understand it’s a business but this takes it to another level. For instance, we spent $3200 on the room and they then said we had to pay another $600 for the deposit. This wasn’t made clear in the initial booking or at the check in desk when they took $3800 from the card without saying. What if we didn’t have the money for this, would we have been turned away? Further to this, there is a compulsory $40 dollar fee per day which is added to your account, it’s okay though $20 is for credit which cannot be rolled over so has to be spent on the hotel each day. Not only this, the room service is ridiculous. My partner and I would generally use room service however, there is a $5 dollar set up fee, 18% gratuity fee and that’s before you’ve even ordered or purchased anything. This was somewhat disappointing and meant we often just brought food to the room where required. 

All in all, a nice hotel with some nice staff and attractions. But the above $$$$ issues makes it a no for me in the future.

title: Don’t let this hotel pass you by…
text: Went to take my niece to visit the Fashion Institute of Technology and extended our stay. You would think it’s not for those who despise Times Square (me), but it was a haven in the craziness. Outstanding staff and service. Clean, comfortable rooms. Excellent bar area and rooftop bar. Also, guitarists?  They will loan you a guitar!!

title: Great Location
text: Great hotel, good location. Has a rooftop bar but check availability. We were told no booking needed for residents but you do. Drinks are crazy money. Staff are great and rooms are clean and modern. We upgraded to a city view but wouldn’t bother again. Not much to see as surrounded but other buildings.

title: Disappointing experience, price did not match the quality
text:
Poor service, little care for the client. I was informed of a discount when checking in, to use in the restaurant. I dined there a few days and confirmed again that the discount would be applied. At checkout, they refused to apply the discount. I emphasized that the information was given everytime, by different people, and they said that information was not relevant, as no one would confirm what I was saying.

Food was low quality, and poorly executed (heavily salted). I sent back two out of four meals because it was burnt. Ordered a cappuccino, was brought with cold milk.
For a premium hotel, it was very disappointing. I do not recommend
The one positive remark were the employees at the door, that were quite friendly

title: Segr traurig
text:
Bewertung nur für den Shop..Personal sehr nett, aber das hat es noch nie gegeben, das ich kein Shirt in meiner Größe XL gefunden habe.. Bin vorher noch NIE ohne was zu kaufen aus einem Shop raus..und weil ich diese Hotel Shirts noch nicht habe, wären es wie meistens gut 300$ geworden.. 
.. Das finde ich sehr mies...NICHT EIN SHIRT 😪

title: Hotel with great vibes and fantastic location
text:
Hard Rock hotel New York has such a great vibe as soon as you walk in with it high ceilings. The location was perfect for us, sandwiched between Times Square and 6th Avenue we had best of both worlds and 2 different subway lines. Walk one way and you are in the hustle and bustle of Times Square, walk the other and you are by Rockefeller Centre and 5th Avenue. Walking distance to many attractions as it was such a central location in Midtown.

The hotel itself was vibrant, clean areas and memorabilia everywhere to keep you entertained. A well equipped gym, a place for yoga, restaurant with great food. There is a rooftop bar but we didn't go as we had a child but it seemed to be popular.

The room was smaller than we expected hence the 4 rating. We had a room with 2 double beds as there were 3 of us but the room itself was small when you factor in 3 suitcases. Although a room for 4 people, it was only set up for 2 people and only 2 chairs allowed by the table which meant someone was left out. 

Despite the small room, overall, we had a very good stay. The staff were attentive, friendly and knowledgeable.

title: Concierge
text: Big shout out to Abby our concierge at the Hard Rock NYC. He is such a gentleman, supper friendly, kind, patient and knowledgeable. He would plan our days out nicely. show us where to go on the map & give wonderful recommendations. He was so helpful and without him our trip wouldn’t be the same.   Massive thank you from London.

title: NYC One hell of a town
text:
This campus is about a year and a half old, the location could not be better for the theatre goer and the subway is a block down the street.
The rooms clean and comfortable, with a fridge and coffee maker in the room.
The  a must to have a cocktail or a bite to eat. The roof top bar is the perfect way to end you day in Manhattan.

title: Family of five - fantastic
text: Fantastic location and service - Milton was wonderful - shared top tips and really looked after our family of five. Food was excellent for family but expensive - everything is expensive in NYC though! Rooms very clean, beds comfy and surprisingly quiet through the night for the location. We will be back.

title: Refreshing Hotel in Time Square area
text: I usually stay away from Time Square hotels but was her for business and didn’t have a choice. The Hard Rock hotel is a refreshing experience and has me reconsidering staying in TS in the future. It’s upscale not cheesy, rooms are very well appointed. Nice and friendly staff. Lovely rooftop lounge. A winner all around.

title: Lisa, Lexi & Austin Wilson
text:
Property was terrific 10/10
Came in from Pittsburgh to celebrate my 60th Birthday, then headed to JFK for international flight. Just wish we could have had more time to spend at this wonderful property! Would love to come back soon …

title: Hard Rock Hotel New York
text: Fantastic room. After reading the reviews I picked this hotel and was so glad that I did. Very clean and pretty. Not huge but terrific. Hotel staff were great. Great location, near Time Square and walking distance to the theatre.

title: Location was perfect, beautiful hotel
text: Would stay again, location was central to restaurants and shopping. Walkable to so many options. Bed and pillows were comfortable. Room nicely decorated. TV channels were good. Breakfast via room service was good and timely.

title: Bom hotel em Manhattan
text: Excelente atendimento, pessoal atencioso e cortês. Há pessoas que falam português na recepção e no restaurante. Hotel novo, confortável e limpo. Localização ótima, perto de teatros, restaurantes, lojas, metrô, e de fácil acesso a pontos turísticos.

title: Excelente!
text: Hotel incrível, muito bem localizado! Mesmo sendo muito próximo a times square, não ouvimos barulhos nenhum. Camas super confortáveis, a limpeza feita mais de uma vez por dia com reposição de toalhas, águas e gelo. Atendimento do Gabriel superou as expectativas. Ele deu várias dicas de lugares para visitar, maneiras de chegar, passeios que não valem a pena… enfim, foi sensacional!

title: Amazing hotel
text:
We love everything about Hard Rock Hotel New York ! :-) The way the hotel is designed, the amazing ambiance and atmosphere, the cleanliness, how beautifully it is maintained and of course the wonderful staff. 
The hotel the perfect place for a great stay in New York - centrally located just next to Times Square. The hotel has soundproof windows, which means that you can enjoy the central location, without all the noise. :-)
If you want to stay at a fantastic hotel with easy access to everything in New York City, Hard Rock Hotel is the best place to stay.

title: Amazing hotel
text: Perfect location,  hotel is first class. Rooms large for NYC, bed huge & comfortable, great bathroom and massive TV and cute sitting area. RT60 bar was great, gets busy book a table.  Staff brilliant , defo recommend.

title: Exceptional Stay with a great staff at The Hard Rock
text: Exceptional Stay. Friendly and helpful staff. Very convenient location. Incredibly walkable. This is a new hotel in wonderful condition with fantastic design. Quick and convenient elevators. Staff was incredibly quick to respond to requests for ice each day as there are no ice machines to keep the halls quiet. Right in the heart of Times Square but just a few steps on a nice quiet block for a convenient walk to the more crowded spots. We walked to 4 different theaters for shows and Central Park. All within 5-15 minutes. Request a guitar or turntable and vinyl in room for more fun! Right across the street from the James Earl Jones Theater for Gutenberg. Tip- surprisingly exceptional and delicious pizza two doors away at Little Italy, Ice cream shop and convenience store right there, too are both great and we visited each multiple times. Would return any time. Stayed in October with mild weather. Highly recommend.

title: En el centro de Manhattan
text: Habitaciones modernas, muy limpias y cómodas camas. Situación inmejorable, aislamiento acústico y el personal es realmente amable. La terraza tiene unas vistas increíbles y hasta las 18h se puede subir con menores de edad, a partir de esa hora se convierte en disco- pub y está prohibido.

title: Mentem sobre o tamanho das camas
text: As camas não são queen size, embora eles vendam como sendo. Existemoutros hotéis na Times Square com cama queen de verdade e até mais barato que o Hard Rock. Eles mentem na hora de vender. Cobram por cama queen size e não tem. Depois dizem que não é possível fazer upgrade. Para mudar o quarto (para King size, que deve ser a Queen Size na verdade) querem cobrar mais USD500 a diária.

title: Best hotel in NYC
text: Exemplary Customer Service.  Great location, 4 blocks from our theater and easy walk to Central Park.  Valet parking was fantastic.  ALL staff were friendly and made us feel welcome. Breakfast while we waited for the car was perfect timing.

title: Wonderful Hotel
text: Great central location, super clean and tidy, friendly staff and very comfortable bedding. I would definitely choose to stay at the Hard rock hotel again when visiting New York. My husband and I really enjoyed our stay!

title: Incredible experience in Times Square
text: Perfect location. Lobby, restaurant and rooms are just wonderful. Rooms are very good looking, so original and new! Very confortable bed and large bathroom. I spent a very nice time at the Hard Rock Hotel.

title: Our stay at the Hard Rock hotel
text: We stayed for five nights at the HR- hotel. It was an excelent stay. The hotel is at a great location. The room was excelent. Even though we had a standard room everything was there, comfortable bed, great shower and clean! Staff was very friendly. We certainly come back to this hotel in the future!

title: All that glitters isn’t gold
text: The rooms are clean and nice and valet staff are fab but beware if you have a continental breakfast included in your package. Make sure you know what this entails as you will be charged for all extras even though you weren’t told what you were entitled to.

title: Excellent Hotel
text: Hard Rock in New York is an excellent hotel … super clean, good amenities, excellent costumer service…. The staff is very friendly and they give you options to upgrade rooms… coffee shop and restaurants are very good..

title: Great stay at Hard Rock Hotel
text: We had a wonderful stay at the Hard Rock Hotel New York. I was finding it difficult to choose a hotel in New York because there were so many variable reviews and I didn’t want to travel somewhere only to regret my choice. NO REGRETS CHOOSING HARD ROCK HOTEL. This hotel was worth the money, friendly staff, spotlessly clean, well designed and quiet rooms, comfy bed and great shower. It really was a great place to stay and wonderful to retreat to after a day of exploring the city.

title: NYC Theatre district
text: Holiday fun with ease. Close to all the theatres, Times Square, and transportation . Hotel was hip, beds were comfortable, showers were hot. Service was great, room service was delicious. Close to amazing pizza and ice cream.

title: Hard Rock Midtown
text: A pleasant surprise in ever way. The room was very comfortable. The bed and shower was fantastic. The meals at sessions were amazing. Try the sea bass.  The staff were sometimes a little slow to react to requests like ice in the room. Half the staff were 10/10 the other half were 5/10

title: Excellence
text:
Fabulous stay at the HR.

Checking in and out was easy and quick with delightful ladies on reception - they are a credit to the hotel.

The room was excellent with an amazing bed. Room service and cleaning was attentive and perfect.

The roof top bar was a wonderful attraction to unwind and have a nightcap or to start the evening off with a cocktail. Drinks were pricey but compared to the other bars in New York in retrospect; we realised it’s the going rate.

I loved the Hard Rock & especially their staff providing the services.

title: Beautiful hotel with enthusiastic staff and great rooms!
text: We booked this hotel as a pre-cruise hotel for our cruise to Canada on the NCL Joy. Our cruise was delayed for 24 hours by the hurricane, so a 1 night stay turned into 2 nights.  The Hard Rock is very new and very beautiful.  I had originally booked a studio suite, but we were upgraded to a Platinum Suite.  The Platinum Suite was spectacular with an entry hall, powder room, dining room and living room and separate bedroom with a massive bathroom with huge walk-in shower and separate tub and two sinks.  WOW!  This hotel is so close to Times Square that you can see Times Square from your window, but there is no noise from the street below.  The staff was enthusiastic and helpful.  The concierge suggested some great restaurants that were close by and we really enjoyed our 2-night stay!

title: Christmas at The Hard Rock Hotel NYC
text:
So we have booked to stay here for Christmas 2023. Being our first time visiting NYC, I contacted the Concierge to ask for recommendations for our visit and for Christmas Day Dinner.
Wow exceptional customer service received from Michael. If the customer received so far Is anything to go by this has made us so much more very excited to be staying at the Hard Rock Hotel.

title: No coração da Times Square!
text: Próximo ao Rockfeller , MMs, escadarias da Times, Junior’s , Applebees, teatros da Brodway em minutos de caminhada. Quinta avenida a poucos metros. Apple. Maravilhoso. Funcionarios super atenciosos. Durante a noite escutei as portas baterem mas nada que um protetor auricular nao resolva!

title: Avoid. Will keep your deposit
text:
I paid a $400 deposit on 26th Aug. for our stay at Hard Rock and a whole month later I still have not received my deposit back from them, despite chasing them. 

There is no sense of urgency or care from Hard Rock when you contact them. They just don’t care about holding onto your money. I’ve read some reviews that they have never got it back - I hope I am not in this category but it seems Hard Rock, New York are thieves. 

Clean & modern room.

title: Muita magia em se hospedar no Hard Rock Hotel NY
text: Um lugar luxuoso, imponente, bem localizado ao lado da Times Square, com muita segurança, um aroma delicioso na entrada do hotel que rememora boas recordações. Quarto e banheiro limpos, funcionais, academia maravilhosa com equipamentos novos, e maçãs deliciosas disponíveis

title: terrible customer service
text: don't go tot the roof top bar, they were throwing people out with the short notice and allowing others to stay telling us only friends of the cereal manager can stay as long as the want. It is overall terrible customer service, unfriendly staff. When I asked the front desk if I can extend one more night because my meetings got postponed, they said they don't do that and that I have to call 800 number. I moved to a different hotel.

title: Very nice hotel
text:
The hotel is very nice and the location is good near times square and the subway. Many restaurants around.

You feel very comfortable in the hotel, the rooms are nice and very clean. 

The view in the rt60 has a good view and the drinks good

title: Hard Rock Hotel, really does rock!
text: The customer service was amazing. I unfortunately left my mobile phone in an Uber and the reception staff went above and beyond to support me in tracking it down. I could not thank the night staff enough for their help and even letting me use their personal phones when my international number didn't work. I wish I took their names at the time but I hope they are able to get rewarded somehow for their assistance. The rooms were also lovely and the rooftop bar has amazing views and drinks! 100 out of 10 for this hotel. The only downside was that we had to leave sooner than we wanted to! Hope to be back here soon. Thank you once again Hard Rock Hotel, you really do rock!

title: Great hotel, perfect location!
text: We really enjoyed the Hard Rock NYC.  It’s right in the middle of Times Square so easily accessible to everything.  The shower was fantastic.  In the common area, mixed sex bathrooms were a little weird but not a problem- just a little different. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would definitely book there again!

title: Very friendly and welcoming
text: The staff make the hotel special, at every point.  Helpful, efficient, welcoming, going the extra mile.  The hotel itself is nice, practical, you get what you pay for with some extra little benefits.  My son had a guitar in his room throughout our stay which he loved.

title: Muy buen hotel en una muy buena ubicación
text:
Un buen hotel muy bien ubicado si vienes a visitar Nueva York. 
Como es habitual en Nueva York, el tamaño de la habitación un poco justo.
Las instalaciones, así como la limpieza y la comodidad de las camas muy bien.

title: Quarto confortável porém pequeno
text: Nota 4/5. Gostamos do quarto, foram 3 pessoas em um quarto com duas camas queens. As camas eram confortáveis. O quarto não era tão espaçoso como imaginavamos, prometia espaço para 4 pessoas mas 3 adultos eu ja considerei apertado. Pouco espaço para colocar malas grandes. Tem mais de 1 restaurante no hotel, tomamos café da manhã e a comida é boa, porém um pouco mais cara do que os diner que você encontra na rua. Unico motivo da nota ser 4 foi porque o banheiro era muito pequeno. Pouco espaço na bancada para utilizar e o chuveiro era MUITO escorregadio, não tinha nenhum tipo de protetor no chão, completamente liso e em contato com sabão escorregava demais, escorreguei varias vezes durante o banho.

title: Simply perfect
text: Perfect staff, Nice place to stay, clean, safe and quiet. Close to subway. Lobby staff very pleasant and helpfull. A great adress in Manhattan. Be carefull about RT60 booking. It’s quickly complete. Nice view at thé RT60

title: Perfect near Time Square. Rooms great for business. Service excellent. Food is tasty
text: This property is in a great location with the right amount of amenities. The service upon checkin is very pleasant and professional. The room design is perfect for business travel or young couples  it may be a bit cozy for families. The food quality is very good and the menu selection makes you feel like you’ve had a good NY experience.

title: Outstanding Stay
text: Location was perfect for our needs. Staff was over the top friendly and accommodating. Rooms were clean, bed super comfortable. Lunch was delicious, coffee shop was very convenient. Steak restaurant was closed the night we were there so we at at DelFrisco's next door which was good, not great. I will definitely stay here again in the future.

title: Everything was fabulous 🔥
text: from outside the front door you feel at home, the people at the front desk are really nice, the room is really clean, modern, smells good. My favorite part is the roof top, he has nothing to complain about❤️

title: Great hotel, incredible facilities and location, but some areas of development
text: The location, food, friendliness of staff, evening entertainment are great. The facilities are incredible our room was great. The pieces that let it down for us were the fact it was our honeymoon and were offered a free bottle of champagne upon checking in. We were thrilled! This was not expected. After 3 more queries over over 4 night stay it never transpired after being reassured each time. This was disappointing. I would have also liked to receive an invoice at check out, or information before booking, rather than having to call up later and ask about the additional tax and residence fees as this added a significant amount onto our holiday.

title: Great Location and Hotel
text: Excellent hotel close to all the major areas.  This was our third visit. Staff is very friendly, helpful and accommodating checking us into a front side end room that we like. Sessions, lobby restaurant, is a real plus! Have eaten there a few times and the food is very good and the service is excellent.  Great option to get in and out and on you way, not having to look for somewhere to eat.  Also, the lobby bar is a great place to relax when you come back from your day's journey before going to your room.

title: Friendly and great location
text: Hard Rock New York is in the centre of Times Square, the staff cant do enough for you and the service is second to none, rooms are exceptional and comfy. R60 bar very stylish and great vibes , its walking distance to most attractions including rocker fellow centre and Central Park , 2 min from subway where you can travel almost anywhere ,

title: Hard Rock Hotel NY
text: Top hotel in a great location. Would highly recommend. Staff were exceptional and couldn't do enough. Rooms have good facilities and are to a high standard. Cleaned daily. Good memorabilia throughout. 1 block away from the subway metro. Will stay here again next time I visit NY

title: Hard Rock Rocks!
text:
You get what you pay for , this hotel is not cheap but is worth every penny they charge.
Staff were fantastic all round, hotel was visually stunning and immaculate.
We never actually saw the cleaner but they did a fantastic job on our room every day and everywhere else.
Everyone was super friendly , bar was awesome , to be fair some of the cocktails were not the best id had but i am fussy in that respect.
Never ate their as have eaten at the Hard Rock many times and just wanted something different everyday because the location was so good you are literally seconds from whatever you want to eat.
Absolutely will stay their again most likely at Xmas as I would wager they do Xmas great at this place.

title: Great Stay in Time Square
text: This was one of the best hotel stays I have had in a very long time. The hotel is beautiful, clean, and accommodating. The staff is helpful, friendly, and knowledgeable. Shout out to David (Bellhop(?) not sure of the title), he knows how to treat a customer. His customer service skills should be bottled and administered to every new employee. The location couldn't be better. Wil stay here again and again.

title: Hard rock
text:
Locale enorme , a Times square , servizio molto veloce , porzioni abbondanti ed aria condizionata come se non ci fosse un domani.
Per il resto hard rock classico.
Ottime e super copiose le ribs di maiale.
Buona la selezione delle birre. 
Prezzi nella “norma” newyorkese

title: Good quality but a little soulless
text: Quality of room was good - clean and spacious, we had a room with 2 Queen beds. Location is very central, close to Times Square and not far from Rockerfeller. Staff are friendly enough but you don’t feel they are that interested really. Restaurant on 2nd floor was very disappointing - long wait time for drinks and food.  Roof bar was pleasant though kids can only visit between 4-6pm.

title: Loved our stay here
text:
Excellent staff!  Friendly and helpful from the moment we arrived until we drove away. Easy check in and out. Nice rooms. We didn’t try the restaurant so I can’t comment on that. The rooftop bar was meh.  
We would stay here again, close to lots of things, you can walk to and through Central Park. Broadway and Times Square nearby but not too close. Try it you’ll like it

title: I like it all
text: Location location location and the hotel is very comfortable we stayed for 7 nights it’s very convenient and I like the tub it save my foot every night I like it all I will come back see you next time

title: Fabulous Hotel
text: Hotel very well located for visiting the sights. Bedroom was lovely & clean & so quiet for a hotel so close to Times Sq. Beds very comfy. Breakfast was lovely. Staff very attentive & friendly. We’ll definitely return to Hard Rock Hotel. Highly recommend!!

title: Best Hotel In Manhattan, NY
text: Hard Rock hotel is probably the best hotel in Manhattan, NY. Almost everything from staff to the rooms are top notch. There is a NYY steak, an amazing steakhouse for family dinners. The area of the hotel couldn’t be better. There are many museums and tourist attractions, such as the M&M store. Definitely a 10/10!

title: DNA's NYC Hard Rock Hotel Experience
text: Hotel staff was very welcoming, very knowledgeable, provided superb assistance and guidance, made me feel greatly appreciated. Room was very clean with a unique and pleasant aroma. Breakfast was also very good, though a bit pricey - but service was also great! Hotel staff understands and knows how to go out of their way to make you feel welcomed and appreciated. Phenomenal experience!!!!

title: Great location!
text: Great location, nice sized rooms, very clean and wonderful staff! Just a block away from Times Square, close to restaurants and shops. Centrally located. Super cool vibe and decor if you are in to music.

title: Bella zona, look di impatto ma servizi non all'altezza delle aspettative
text:
Albergo di impatto come tutti gli edifici di midtown Manhattan ma servizi appena nella media, non all'altezza delle aspettative. Quando siamo arrivati alle 16 la stanza non era pronta e alle 20 abbiamo aspettato mezz'ora per entrare. Un altro giorno non avevano fatto la stanza nonostante avessimo tramite SMS (come da loro richiesto) avvisato che potevano entrare.
L'impressione è che ci sia poca attenzione e poca cura per le esigenze del cliente. Francamente se tornassi sceglierei un altro hotel vista la disponibilità di strutture nella stessa zona.

title: Localisation parfaite
text: Localisation idéale pour visiter Manhattan. Personnel très sympa et les chambres, pas très spacieuses (mais on est à New York..), offrent tout le nécessaire avec une literie de bonne qualité. Roof top à éviter (mauvais rapport qualité-prix).

title: Super séjour
text:
Très bon hôtel très bien situé entre la 7e et 6e avenue.
La chambre est très belle ainsi que la salle de bain, tout est neuf.
De plus l'hôtel est très sympa ambiance musicale partout.
Le concept de l'hôtel est très orignal avec des objets d'artistes.

title: A great choice in NYC
text:
We stayed four nights at the HRH in NYC. The location is great as a base for 5th Ave, Rockefeller, Times Square and within walking distance of Central Park, the Empire State Building and Grand Central. 

The room was modern and stylish, well furnished, spotlessly clean and the service was excellent. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again. Our children loved the hotel.

title: Second stay at Hard Rock
text: We love staying at this hotel.  Clean, friendly, nice amenities. Bell staff and security was extremely helpful when we left an item in our room.  They retrieved it and were able to get it to the airport for us in time for departure.  Extremely grateful for their kindness and service.

title: Bel hotel bien placé
text:
Second visite à cet hôtel, cette fois dans une chambre avec lit jumeaux. La chambre donnait à l'arrière de l’hôtel ce qui la rend particulièrement calme (mais du coup on perd la vue). La literie est toujours top, l'hotel toujours aussi joli. Joli coin douche/WC. 
Emplacement idéal pour visiter time square et remonter sur central park

title: Stellar customer service
text: Stellar customer service and very clean. Loved going up to the roof bar and enjoying the view. Only thing I was  disappointed with is I take a roll toiletry bag with a hook. There was no place in the bathroom to hang it or my clean clothes. I did hang it on the towel rack in front of the sink but it was dragging on the floor. I made due

title: Mitico …
text: All’hotel attribuiscono chi 4 chi 5 stelle … non è un 5 stelle …  si trova tra la 7 Avenue  e la 48 street … Times Square … posto incasinatissimo ma stramitico perché, a piedi, raggiungi le migliori “attrazioni” in pochissimo tempo … Personale carinissimo, “stradisponibile”, camera confortevole, unica pecca manca il frigo bar … I Bar al 2 piano e al 34 piano ottimi, personale professionisti … la nostra camera non affacciava sulla 48 street ma sull’interno … vista non “idilliaca”. Musica sempre anche negli ascensori … cimeli di rock star del presente e del passato ovunque … MOLTO CONTENTI !

title: Great location
text: Everyone in the hotel is more than accommodating. So helpful storing bags, providing coffee, water, and directions. Definitely stay here again. Perfect location for today show, And beacon theater. Great dairy free ice cream next door.

title: Disappointed!
text: Gorgeous hotel in a great area. All aspects of the hotel is clean and well maintained. However this hotel is NOT family friendly! We were travelling with our two teens and would have liked to come back to the hotel at night after hectic days and had a drink and chilled out… especially on the rooftop! But no children allowed only between 4-6pm! Nowhere for us to have a drink at night as a family! Housekeeping continually came to our room at 5pm, majority of the time when we had returned to shower and change for dinner and they would ask us to wait in the corridor, really not convenient, why were they not coming in a morning when we were out! The room was booked for 4 people, we had 2 of everything…. 2 robes, 2 towels, 2 wash cloths, 2 coffees, 2 cups and 4 coat hangers! There is absolutely no where to store your luggage, we had 4 suitcases on the floor and has to step over them constantly! And we had an awful view out of our window of a building site. We booked through a travel agent who told us we had breakfast for 2 included in the price, the hotel however said none of us were entitled to breakfast when we arrived!! We were flying back to the UK and leaving the hotel at 3pm, I asked if we could possibly pay for a late checkout (checkout is at 12pm) and they said yes I could for £250!!! £250 for 3 hours!!!! This holiday was booked 12 months in advance and we were all very excited about staying at the hard rock hotel, which had cost us a LOT of money… we were very deflated and extremely underwhelmed! A lot of money to see the lobby, reception and our room!!!!

title: NY Metallica trip
text: Great hotel, great location, staff were fantastic, loved every minute of it bar the one thing. There were no hard rock songs played in the entire 6 days of being there! Suggest a name change on NO hard rock hotel!!

title: STOP! You found the perfect accommodations
text:
Everything about this hotel is positively pleasing. From the aesthetically pleasing atmosphere to the cheerfully accommodating staff. 
This hotel is so very well managed and maintained from A-Z! 
My first visit to New York, expectations were more than met. 
Thank you for your kindness, comfort and the many helpful staff members. Shoutout to the bartenders on second floor 🫶

title: Great hotel near key sites. Great staff and rooms.
text: Love the hotel.  Very helpful and accommodating.  Was attentive and did a great job getting us last minute tickets to 2 shows. I would stay there again and would recommend it to anyone.  Safe and close to transportation.

title: Best hotel stay in NYC!
text:
From the moment we approached the building and throughout our short stay, staff were extremely friendly and helpful. My daughter and I stayed in a King room and the overall layout of the room was fantastic. I especially liked the barn door feature between the actual bedroom and bathroom areas. It allowed my daughter to continue to sleep when I was up early and in the shower. The cleanliness of the room and the entire hotel was also outstanding! 
The overall vibe of the hotel was beyond our expectations as well. True to any Hard Rock establishment, everything throughout the building was music-themed. Even the tiny details in our room made me smile, such as the gold guitar pick on the wall next to the door where the privacy latch rested when not in use and the "B-side" label on the extra roll of toilet paper. At the end of the hallways on every floor is an image of a musical icon as well as related memorabilia in a glass case. My daughter and I took the stairs from the 33rd floor down to the 5th floor, stopping on each floor to see who was on the wall. It was like being in a museum! 
I would definitely stay here again and will most certainly recommend this hotel to my friends and family!!

title: a stylish and luxuous stay
text: Great location, great standing with stylish decoration et very comfortable rooms, and the personnel is absolutely efficient and charming. Breakfast hugely too expensive (but there are great diners all over Times Square).

title: Awesome Stay at the Hard Rock Hotel New York!
text:
Our first time in New York was fantastic and the Hard Rock Hotel New York was fabulous.  I am extremely picky regarding the places I stay and the accommodations at the Hard Rock New York did not disappoint.  

The room space was very tight which means next time we visit we'll need to upgrade to a suite for a little more space.

Overall, it was a great experience.

title: Rockin’ Visit to the HR NYC
text:
This hotel rocks (pun intended)! I read reviews and researched before visiting NYC for first time in 6 years. Manhattan’s newest hotel (open 1 year) did not disappoint. The hotel is beautiful and very clean. The staff was fantastic. Every staff member was friendly and helpful, genuinely interested in enhancing our visit. Shout out to Milton in Sessions, our daily breakfast friend and server.

The location is great-1 block off Times Square, 2 blocks to 5th Ave shopping, 1 block to Rockefeller Center and an easy walk to nearby theaters. Great grocery store right next door.

Hotel was extremely quiet despite being at the center of NY’s action packed mid-town.

As far as the city, we never felt unsafe. NYC was clean and friendly. We walked Times Square day and night without any incident or trouble. No signs of lingering Covid masks rules or lock downs. 

Great trip made even better by this new gem of hotel. We even ran into A list celebrity guests on the elevator. We will definitely stay at the Hard Rock on future trips. 

Rock On!

title: Awesome Hotel
text: Location, staff, cleanliness, felt safe, Just an awesome hotel! We definitely would stay at this hotel again (if we go back to New York). The location was very close to Time Square, Broadway and Subways. Just fantastic!

title: Better hotels in same area
text: Beautiful property in a good location for first timers to New York but lack of attention to detail, continuous inconveniences and poor customer service is what downgrades this hotel. I suggest the W hotel or Intercontinental instead

title: Great hotel however not good when travelling with Children.
text: Hotel was Morden and clean however I was travelling with another family with children and we found there was no real place to socialise where children where allowed, the sessions bar closed early then children are not allowed in RT60 after 6pm so you have no where to just relax with the family. Was also moved from our table so they could set up for breakfast as soon as they stopped serving drinks. Was made to feel inconvenient which is a shame because the a hotel is stunning.

title: Excellent all around
text: First of all Rolando took care of above and beyond. He works in room service and was always friendly and courteous. He took care of all our needs and we highly appreciate and thank him very much. The front desk and housekeeping was always great. Our overall experience was great and highly recommend that you stay here

title: Worth the stay. Perfect location. CLEAN, friendly staff, and great rooms.
text: We were visiting for a concert. This location is perfect for any visit. We were able to walk almost everywhere. It was nice to come back to our rooms, drop any goodies, and head back out. The staff was perfection.

title: A 5 star must stay or visit if in NYC!
text: This is my 19th trip to the city and this Hotel is outstanding! Staff are helpful, and friendly.  Room is superb!  Location is excellent. Music everywhere! Genuine memorabilia everywhere & a vibrant, energetic vibe!  Highly recommended for sure

title: Best Hotel Service in NY
text: From Top to Bottom, some of the most pro-active and friendliest staff in my travel experience. They work as a team and go beyond the call of duty. Never felt so welcome and our entire family grateful for the value they added to our NY experience!

title: Top
text:
séjour de 10 jours  excellent 
Super emplacement en plein time square , personnel jeune et sympathique 
Rooftop au top
Les chambres sont de bonne taille  et très propre 
La boutique où l’on peut prendre un café est également très sympa 
On reviendra !!

title: Great NY experience
text: We traveled with 9 customers to this property and it was an amazing experience. They enjoyed the friendliness, that it wasn’t a standard “business hotel” and the amenities including location was great!

title: Best experience!
text: Wow amazing hospitality! Starting from the Door Man Miguel to the Roof Top staff!! Miguel greeted us and made sure we knew where everything was! Drinks and apps were the most delicious at the Roof Top! Special shout out to Ian and David who were amazing while shopping at the Hard Rock Store!! Most definitely will return!🥰

title: Excellent spot near Times Square
text: Fantastic stay at a perfect little spot. Close to everything we wanted to see and visit. The Hotel was clean and up to date. The staff were amazing and even welcoming to our little dog Charlotte. Would book again!

title: THE place to stay in NYC!
text: This was my first time staying at a Hard Rock location. I am loyal to another brand but  something told me to give the HRH a try even if it was more expensive. Best decision ever. My family of 4 enjoyed the HRH experience. Every single employee we encountered was extremely friendly and welcoming. From the valet, baggage, front desk , coffee shop, concierge (Abby had the most calm spirit about him) , 2nd floor lounge area to the cleaning crew. Even the security was kind and accommodating! All of the staff wqs so friendly & acted like they wanted us to be there. That meant a lot to me. The hotel itself is lovely. Very pristine, new. Love the nod towards the 50 years of hip hop with the pictures all around! The room was small but I expected that in NYC. Very clean and modern. GYM is top notch.  Lots of celebrity sightings as well. Rooftop was a cool vibe. Location of this hotel is fantastic. So close to everything! This is the place to stay.  And we can’t wait to come back. Special acknowledgement to Miguel in valet & the guy from Jamaica. Top tier customer service. And Antonio in the lounge.

title: We had a blast, fun hotel and location
text: The theme of this hotel is wonderfully executed, plus it's very well appointed and has a great location for attending Broadway shows. Great rock and roll artifacts throughout. Comfortable, well-appointed, modern, fun. We loved it.

title: NYC REVIEW FROM FLORIDA CUSTOMER
text: Do not get a connecting Classic room. We can hear everything from the room besides us and also from the hallway. We had no room to even open our suitcases. The Valet parking is a rip off. We were told $85 a day. After 5 days an attendant says, Do you know every time you take your car out its $85. Who charges a person $85 every time you get your car? We changed to a Studio Suite on our 5th day and that room was great space. The hotel is clean and very nice staff.

title: Great stay!
text: Definitely recommend this hotel .  Clean nice room, staff are nice and helpful. They sent a bottle of champagne to my room on my birthday, they really know how to make you feel welcomed from the moment you arrive.  Location is great too.

title: Best hotel
text: Very nice nice hotel in the heart of NY,colse to subway close to Rokefeler Center,Central Park,min away from Time Squere,also hotel room is very clean nicely furnished with a lots of woander memorabilia on hallways option to dine a nice roof top bar.... you will have a good time pleasant time in this hotel.

title: Excellent Getaway
text: Was such a pleasure staying at Hard Rock. The staff were exceptional, and the hotel accommodation was inviting. The rooms were clean and beds comfortable, making it a fun time with the children. Thanks!

title: Mid-Week stay in July
text: Great location. I was worried that the proximity to Times Square would make the room noisy, but this was not the case. Great facilities, everything is clean and well-maintained. Friendly staff. We have a small child with food allergies so we weren't able to take advantage of the food/dining options, so I can't really comment on those. But overall a great hotel in a perfect location - highly recommend!

title: Central, clean , friendly
text: We had a great time at this hotel. Would highly recommend. The hotel is centrally located near Times Square and within walking distance to many other attractions. Staff is very friendly and knowledgeable. We enjoyed our stay at Hard Rock NYC

title: Fabulous New York Hotel
text: Loved this hotel.  Spent 3 nights 20-23 July on a Broadway break.  Couldn’t beat it for location as so central.  I had a classic King on 16th floor which was a decent size with everything you’d need.  Amazingly comfortable bed I slept brilliantly and one of my fave bathrooms I’ve ever had in NYC.  The rain shower was perfection and plenty space to move about.  Never ate so can’t comment on food but coffee maker great and 2 bottles of water in room daily and any at reception if you ask.  Any staff I encounter were lovely and helpful.  As a solo traveller I felt perfectly safe.

title: Family trip vacation
text:
Very please with our stay 
I never write any review before but this time my family very happy and enjoy the stay at Hardrock hotel. 
The staff made us feel very welcome especially the cleaning staff clean our room everyday we very surprised and please with it even our kids wrote a thank you notes to them. 
Very happy and will be back.

title: Great stay
text:
We enjoyed every second of our stay ! The rooms are very comfortable, the staff was great and very helpful and the hotel location is ideal for visiting Manhattan by foot.

We Also liked their rooftoop, which once again was a first class expérience (both the food and the view).

title: Really good hotel
text:
Really good experience staying at this hotel . We had interconnecting rooms which was why we chose the hotel as we were travelling as a family of 4 . The rooms are small with not alot of storage but you expect that for NYC. The beds were so comfortable and the room spotlessly clean .  
We absolutely loved the roof top bar and the lobby bar was also really good - we had a couple of drinks there every day . 
The bar staff were exceptionally warm and welcoming . 
Location wise it’s close to the action in a busy area but so calm and tranquil once you go through the doors .

title: Amazing customer service!!
text:
We had a great stay at the Hard Rock Hotel New York. Although all of the staff were very nice and accommodating, I want to acknowledge and give a huge Thank you to Mariann at the front desk and Rob the doorman. Marianne was very kind, helpful and knowledgeable with all of our questions. Rob went above and beyond providing exceptional customer service from helping with transportation to storing our bags till we were ready to head to the airport. You have a gem in Marianne and Rob. We highly recommend this hotel and would definitely stay here again with that kind of customer service. Thank you, Marianne and Rob!

The hotel was beautiful and rooms were clean, comfortable and quiet. The location was great!

title: FABULOUS!!
text:
Great hotel with the loveliest of staff.  The reception and the Concierge were so friendly and helpful.  The Concierge made our stay.  The entrance is stunning with an Alicia Keys dress and all over there is information about artists, their guitars and their clothes.  The shop and cafe is excellent for clothing, jewellery and coffee.  Their macaroons are sublime....bubble gum flavour was a favourite with our 16 year old grandsons.
The rooms are spotless and well appointed.
The hotel is well positioned for all the fun places to visit.
Thanks for making us welcome.

title: A surprising resort experience in a NYC Hotel
text: Was a great surprise to spend 2 days at this hotel, it felt as though I walked into a resort.  Staff were friendly, food and drinks were good and the room was comfortable and efficient. We spent more time in the hotel then out of it the 2 days we were there

title: En el centro de todo, pero...
text: El Hotel esta céntricamente ubicado, en el medio de todo, en Times Square, con lo bueno y lo malo de eso, quizás es una zona más para los que visiten la ciudad x 1era vez, es un hotel nuevo de buen diseño, las habitaciones son modernas, y limpias, la suite que tuvimos es suficientemente amplia para lo que es New York, cama cómoda, escritorio, cafetera y agua de cortesía diaria, los amenities eran justos pero buenos, con lugar de guardado un poco justo especialmente para largas estadías, el baño era amplio con ducha y bañadera separadas, las variedades  de comida en los restaurantes del hotel eran limitadas y más aun en sus horarios de atención, especialmente para personas de otras nacionalidades y costumbres que solemos cenar más tarde, el personal era amable, lo malo fue el ruido exterior debido a obras que se estaban realizando en las calles frente al hotel fue imposible descansar 7 de las 9 noches que nos alojamos  ya que taladraban durante la noche y durante el día también había obras, y eso que estábamos en un piso muy alto, entiendo que esto podría no sucederle a quienes viajen en otra oportunidad, cambio de habitación no fue posible xq lo único que nos ofrecieron fue habitaciones de menor categoría en la parte trasera del hotel, sabemos que New York es ruidosa pero viajamos todos los años y nunca nos paso esto, mi calificación no fue mala porque entiendo que no es responsabilidad directa del hotel y porque Amerissa Pelobello  hizo lo posible para mejorar nuestra estancia ocupándose personalmente y a quien le agradecemos sus atenciones.

title: MOTHER DAUGHTER NYC MINI VACATION
text: i would stay at this hotel again.  perfect location! the room was small but extremely clean and sound proof - the staff was so very friendly and always smiling and we felt so welcomed.  the doormen were always smiling. we would stay here again. it was wonderful!!

title: Amazing Stay!
text:
Hard Rock New York is one of the best hotels I’ve ever stayed at! From the moment you arrive, the teams welcome is just unbelievable. They really go out of their way to make your stay memorable. 
Food, drinks, amenities, the venue, everything is outstanding. 
Few names to mentions that made my stay even better; manager Mike, manager Alex, Pedro, Abby at the concierge desk, they are all Superstars! 
Thanks for everything. 
Love all, serve all!

Chef Sandor

title: Great stay, nearly everything was excellent
text: I stayed here with my 18 year old daughter, for 10 day, 1st to 12th July 2023. Overall the stay was seamless, hotel was very clean, and pretty cool surroundings. Staff courteous and friendly. Only area that didn't really work for us was the rooftop terrace, as can only be used between 4 and 6.

title: Amazing hotel 100% would recommend
text:
Hotel was amazing; clean, modern, friendly.

Rooms are amazing extremely comfortable and clean.

The staff are very accommodating and are more than happy to help.

The best hotel I have ever stayed in!

Please be aware of the resort fee: $40 per night and they take a $500 deposit on this but is worth it: receiving unlimited bottles of water and coffee, good free internet access to the gym

title: Wonderful experience
text: Great location, friendly staff, and extremely clean. Rooms were a decent size for a family of four. Perfect place to stay when visiting NYC. The front desk and concierge were very helpful and went above and beyond. Very nice vibe in the hotel as well. 100% recommend.

title: Just ok….
text: I booked the Hard Rock after reviewing many Hotels in Times Square and I settled on the Hard Rock thinking it will blow my socks off, but that didn’t happen. This was my first time in New York and we were celebrating our 30th wedding anniversary, I had emailed the hotel with regards to this but I didn’t get a response, so i thought no big deal, So when i checked in i told the front desk we were super excited to be at the Hard Rock and this was a very special occasion for us…and though I didn’t expect them to roll out the red carpet or anything, but we got nothing/nada. Now i know NY is expensive and i expected that but this hotel was honestly NOTHING special in my opinion. We thought valet was 75/ night it was 85/night which is completely ridiculous and there is no in or out privilege! We paid approx 950 usd for two nights, which I learned was not worth it. On the positive the room was clean and the door men were nice, but it did take them over an hour to get our luggage to our room, we had to call down and ask where it was or it would have taken longer. Overall we were not impressed we will not be coming back nor would i recommend this overpriced with poor service hotel to anyone. Hard Rock NY you could have done better.

title: Super Star
text:
Your associates are super stars. Cleanest hotel. Best hotel that I have ever stayed.
Ratings only go to 5 stars, but I think you should get 10 STARS. If your looking for an excellent hotel with incredible staff, that make you feel important. Then this is your place to stay.

title: Great service
text: There were a couple of different issues (noisy room all night due to construction outside & our cooler in room didn’t work) but they were dealt with swiftly by the staff so can’t ask more than that. We were moved the next night and they put a fridge in our room.

title: Fantastic!
text: I would definitely be returning to the Hard Rock Hotel. Great staff, great location, great roof top bar. This place was top notch. With modern and clean rooms. And the staff was so friendly and quick about helping you out with anything you needed. This place absolutely rocked!

title: Excellent Stay in NYC
text: Friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable staff, great amenities, excellent location!  Right in Times Square and an easy walk to several subway stations and a ton of sites in the city.  Bed was really comfy.  Room was quiet, especially for the location.  Would definitely recommend!

title: Ok hotel men utrolig meget larm, dyrt men ikke pengene være.
text:
Desværre var der byggeri lige overfor vores værelser, hvilket gjorde det umulig at sove, vildt meget larm som følger med i New York. 
Steak er ikke pengene hver, dyrt i forholde til kvaliteten. 
Værelser meget lille i forhold til prisen, dejlig senge og personale.

title: Great hotel in a good location
text: We really enjoyed our stay, the hotel was beautiful and staff very friendly. My only negative comment is that I don’t understand the $45 per day Resident fee, or as it was called on our online booking, the Resort fee, Perhaps this is a mandatory New York fee for hotels? Anyway, I don’t mind paying extra fees as long as it adds some kind of extra value to the stay, which I can’t say that I felt that this fee accomplished. Overall, I would recommend this hotel. It was very easy to walk to everything we wanted to do which was important to us when choosing a hotel for our weekend getaway.

title: Felt like a rockstar!
text: WOW, what a great hotel! The location was perfect, the staff was friendly as always and the room was fantastic. One of the best hotels I’ve ever visited! I felt like a rockstar. I already wanna go back!

title: Celebratory girls trip!
text: This hotel is brilliantly positioned and 2 mins from ‘Time Square’ central. Everything you could need is within 10 mins walk. The hotel is very well appointed. The beds are very comfortable, we didn’t hear any noise from within the hotel but did hear some noise from outside though not enough that it stopped any of us having great nights sleep and I am particularly bad at sleeping in hotels. The bathrooms were beautiful and one of our rooms had a lovely tub with floor to ceiling window (and electric blind) which was a joy to soak in after a long day shopping and walking. The reception checked us in very quickly and Ryan (concierge) arranged for us to have two rooms together in a separate little hallway where we could Lock the door to the hallway and keep our doors open. This was so helpful as we had two teens with us and it meant we could be sure they were safe in their room without us. Ryan also arranged for a kind note with birthday wishes and a little surprise to be in the room on our arrival. I have to thank Ryan as sadly we never got to meet him. He was brilliant and provided us with so much information prior to arriving. Thank you Ryan. The roof top bar was great and again the staff were brilliant and found us a great table at a mins notice. Lovely cocktails up there to celebrate a birthday. I would happily stay here again and again. Beautiful decor, great amenities, lovely staff (apart from one lady in a blue dress with white flowers in the 2nd floor restaurant, who was quite rude on the day we departed) and great location. Thank you Hard Rock Hotel x

title: Hard Rock NYC
text: Wonderful property, great location one block from Times Square and Broadway, Friendly staff, beautiful property, clean well maintained. The only concern I have is the size of the room, they are small, however they are laid out very well.

title: Very good hotel in Times Square with great location for exploring New York
text: This hotel has excellent location for exploring New York, the hotel itself is very cool as you could imagine, all staff I spoke with were very professional, polite and very knowledgeable of local area, the lobby is very impressive with lots of cool musical memorabilia all over the place, the room was big enough for my family it had 2 large beds and a small sitting area, the bathroom was a good size too, the place was spotless clean, and cleaned everyday(the housecleaning did leave our door open by mistake one day, we received an apology)fresh towels were supplied too, it was a joint 50th birthday & 20 year wedding anniversary the hotel acknowledged this by delivering a beautiful bottle of Prosecco to our room plus the pillow cases had embroidered happy 50th birthday & happy anniversary, this was a very nice touch, we had some nice drinks in hotel(be prepared to pay New York prices for drinks) the concierge staff were always available to arrange taxis or advise where the nearest tub station was or help with directions, overall we had a great stay here thanks to all staff.

title: Hard Rock Hotel NY
text: Nice staff, good location, the room is new and clean.  It's not easy to find a modern hotel with energy in NYC, apart from the problem with valet parking, we have really enjoyed the stay, have already booked to stay here in our next NYC trip in August.

title: The very best!
text:
Such a great location for your stay in NYC! Not only the location but the hotel itself is absolutely outstanding, the service is like no other, the staff can not do enough for you. The rooms are super clean always and very modern. Thank you for such an enjoyable stay, it was my first time in NY snd
My first time staying at a hard rock hotel, I will definitely be booking again in the future due to my great experience.

title: Just stay here
text:
Top tier service, A game level service from the time you walk up to the hotel until you check out. I’ve never experienced that before. Whatever you need, the staff is all over it. I traveled solo for my birthday and HRH treated me like a queen.  Excellent food at Sessions, excellent drinks at Sessions. They have security too so not just anyone can walk into the hotel. I can’t forget to mention all the great music and the memorabilia that we all expect from this brand…so cool. 

It near all popular sites, it’s literally in Times Square, walking distance to Rock Plaza and various theatres and shopping. The tour buses all stop on the corner. If you want to go to the Met or Central Park, it’s like a $14 dollar cab ride. Not bad. 10/10 highly recommend you should stay here.

title: Boa
text: Informação constante estão de acordo com a realidade do hotel. Localização boa muito próxima a principais atrações da cidade, com facilidade de acesso a pontos turísticos da cidade. Poderia ser melhorado o transporte dos hospedes do aeroporto ao hotel e vice versa, pela dificuldade de tomar transportes públicos. Para as pessoas de primeira viagem a NY, é muito difícil entender ou identificar o meio de transporte de custo razoável para se chegar ao hotel.

title: Great hotel in a great location with wonderful staff!
text: The hotel is in a perfect location on a quiet side street right off of Times Square and close to Rockefeller. The hotel feels very fresh, new and clean! Beds were very comfortable and housekeeping kept the rooms and common areas sparkling. The bell staff, front desk and concierge always went above and beyond to be helpful and make our stay enjoyable. We will definitely stay here again!

title: Outstanding!
text: The aroma every time we walked in was amazing, the brand-new hotel had an atmosphere of fun, the attentiveness of every staff member was top notch and the communication via text was always timely. The location was perfect to get to Times Square, grab a Lyft, walk to Central Park or hop on a pedal cab! Highly recommend and would definitely stay again.

title: Fabulous Experience
text: Stayed here for our 20th wedding anniversary.   Stayed in a junior suite with a balcony. This hotel is beautiful and extremely clean. Service was top-notch, from security and check-in to check out. All requests were met swiftly and happily. All the staff were so helpful and friendly.  You can tell they take  customer service seriously.  Our room had a view of Times Square and the hotel is within walking distance of Times Square,  Rockefeller Center, Central Park etc. Everything is at your finger tips. We were also met with a complimentary bottle of champagne. We loved our stay and staff made us feel spoiled.

title: Ótima experiência
text:
A atenção dos funcionários é impressionante 
A beleza o cheiro do local fantástico
Vale destacar o recepcionista GABRIEL !!!!,FANTÁSTICO,prestativo,muito atencioso,sendo nossa primeira vez aqui ,nos orientou de maneira simples e direta com grandes dicas,que nos fez economizar e ganhar tempo
Muita atenção e simpatia

title: Birthday and wedding anniversary treat
text: A superb location for either Times Square or 5th Avenue - Decor is amazing - Staff are very attentive and the quality of food and amenities is excellent. We stayed for 6 nights for my wife's birthday celebration and our wedding anniversary, and will be coming back again ..... We can't wait!

title: Perfection!
text: A great stay from the minute I got there, the hotel staff were on there game the entire time I was there, from the food servers to the people checking me in, the hotel is spotless and I felt extremely safe staying there, my room was clean and comfortable and the staff were engaged in helping guests anyway they could, the food was great and very fresh as I love eating at the hotel after a long day of walking, a shout out to Milton who always said hello and greeted me in the morning on my way out, I went to the rooftop and the view is amazing, thanks to the staff at this hotel for making my stay in New York relaxing and fun!

title: Hard rock New York
text:
Great location. Comfortable beds. Friendly staff.
A little noisy to be honest ,due to the proximity of Times Square,  however the hotel is super clean .
Rooftop bar is nice for a drink. 
No views of anything and we were on the 26th floor.
Check with hotel before you go, because you may be denied access to rooftop and club due to private events.
Book an escalade with hotel for 85.00 to airport. We took a cab instead and it was a horrible ride from hell.

title: Good but not great
text:
Ok so Hard Rock Hotel NYC is a good hotel in a good location. Very near to Times Square and the subway. However the location makes it quite noisy which is fine if that’s your vibe. There was lots going on in the hotel. It was the Pride Ball and various other events so very buzzy and fun. 
I do have a gripe about the room. We had a studio suite as we love a suite and thought a little more space would be nice. However in all honesty it simply wasn’t worth the money. It didn’t have a suite feel at all and barely qualified as a larger room. The sink was next to the coffee machine and front door, not in the bathroom. And that’s because there was no bathroom as such. There was a toilet and the shower was in there right next to it and a bit of a tight squeeze. There was no hope of having a private shower if one of us needed the toilet and visa versa. It was a real shame. If you’re going to call it a suite then you have to do better or don’t bother. Having said that the bed was fantastically comfortable. The tv remote gave up working on the last day but we just left it. There was a Nespresso machine but no kettle or tea which was a shame as it is usually pretty standard in good hotels. But lovely Icelandic water was free and replaced daily. Staff were very friendly. On our last day we had lunch in the session’s restaurant on the mezzanine. I had a very good Caesar salad and my husband a delicious burger. Both followed by cheesecake. There is building work on a hotel opposite which we heard at times but in all honesty we didn’t spend much time in the room other than at the beginning of the day and the end. I would recommend this hotel but I would say choose your room wisely and it’s probably quieter the higher you are.

title: Todo Excelente, nada que mejorar. Recomendado 100%
text:
Una excelente atención por parte de todos y cada uno del personal. Instalaciones maravillosas. La habitación y vistas espectaculares, una excelente ubicación del complejo, muy cerca de todos los puntos de interés de la ciudad. Tuvieron el gran detalle de dejar una botella de champagne por ser mi cumpleaños al momento de nuestra llegada.
El bar RT60 tiene una vista increíble y ambiente cómodo. Definitivamente regreso a este hotel y con todo gusto lo recomendaré con todos mis familiares y amigos.

title: Great stay
text: My company's travel team booked this hotel for me, and I'd been unsure what to expect -- it seemed like it would be a party spot and not quite conducive to business travel. I was very pleasantly surprised to find a very new property, with a comfortable, *quiet* room. Location-wise, the property is just off Times Square, so it wasn't super noisy and the sidewalk out front was typically uncrowded. The room itself was sound-proofed well -- the only time I heard noise from neighbors was when room service was delivered! I heard no noise bleeding from rooms at any other point, which meant very sound sleeping! The staff were all friendly and pleasant, across the board -- from the check-in team to the concierge desk to housekeeping. I'd not hesitate to book here again!

title: Amazing
text: Every single staff member was so incredibly nice and kind.  They were always chatting with guests and made each and every single person there feel welcomed and special.  The rooms were a great size, the overhead rain shower head was super fancy!  We were there celebrating a birthday and they left cupcakes in the room with a card.  I will definitely be back to visit and stay at this location again!

title: The Hard Rock Hotel is the best in NYC - HINT, it's not just the amenities
text:
The staff at the Hard Rock Hotel are sincerely people oriented and made sure that our experience showcased the best of New York City.  They were knowledgeable and no request was too much of a curveball they couldn't hit out of the park.  The memorabilia and background music at the hotel brought back lots of fun personal memories, something we would not have expected at a hotel we'd never been to before.  Everything was clean and beautiful.  The food at the restaurant was delicious. 
 We've been to several hotels in NYC, but this is the first we are planning to come back to!

title: We will be back!
text: I am not accustomed to not having drawers for clothing but there was the closet so it was fine.  We have officially found our new favorite place to stay in the city. Everything was excellent ~ food, drinks, cleanliness throughout, staff  ;-)

title: Can't get back soon enough!
