text: Incredible design, wonderful people and an amazing location. Walked to almost everything we wanted to see! Beautiful hotel and a great place to be! Stayed four nights and wish we could have stayed more to experience even more of what the hotel offers!

title: Central location, very expensive, needs thicker windows and better bedding!
text:
Stayed for a week for my daughters 21st.  Great location just off Times Square.  Easy access to buses and subway, and also well placed for 5th Ave, Rockefeller Centre, Central Park, etc.  

Didn't get a chance to try the bar or restaurant, but room service was average - expensive and mediocre quality.  

Flip side is the staff are great - super friendly, knowledgeable, efficient.

The downsides?  We found mattresses and pillows highly uncomfortable.  The rooms are not cheap $4500 each plus $100 per night per room accidental damage protection - didn't know about that in advance.  Also being off Times Square, it can be very noisy at night with engines revving since the glass is quite thin.

title: It's only rocn n' roll but I like it!
text: I was kind of expecting a cheesy past it's sell by date place even though it's new. Man, was I wrong. The staff were excellent and very friendly. NYY is quality...Really good and I didn't think it was ugly in price. Rooms are decent size and clean. The bar on the 34th floor has a great vibe. This is my new go to hotel in NYC

title: NEW YORK GET AWAY, ROCKED
text:
Great location, we arrived on a 3 day get away and very impressed the moment we arrived to the Hard Rock. The Staff were all so friendly and professional. Check-in was flawless, even though our room wasn’t ready the process of leaving our bags was easy. 
Staff always great you with a smile and ask if there was anything they could help with. 
Rooms are very comfortable, like any NY room they are cozy but very well laced out and functional. 
Clean and have a cool drawer for leftovers or drinks, coffee maker and safe all of these options we used and appreciated. The Hard Rock Hotel will not disappoint if you choice it for your stay.

title: Ok stay because of location
text: Wait staff @ and bartenders were not very attentive to people of color @ Sessions restaurant. Other than that the location is close to Time Square and the Theater District. Plenty of restaurants and eating spots are also close and available near this location if you don’t want to eat @ the hotel.

title: Beautiful design, central location
text: It's a beautiful hotel! Very clean and designed so well. They have celebrity outfits and memorabilia on display with their back stories which is fun to spot around the hotel. Location was really good, walking distance from Times Square, Rockefeller Center, and Radio City, even Central Park if you're feeling adventurous. Lots of food options nearby too. The subway is within a few mins walk. The room was on the smaller side, we had 2 queen beds for a family of 4 and it felt a little crammed at times. But I guess that's anywhere in NYC. It is a crowded area around the hotel (duh, it's in Times Square) but if that doesn't bother you, would definitely recommend!

title: Exactly how a hotel should be …
text: Excellent hotel and staff. When you walk in it’s very nicely designed, smells good, every staff member greeted us. The room was clean and beautiful. Very impressive experience overall. It’s rare to see this … clean hotel, friendly staff, great customer service but hard rock had it!

title: The Best Hotel, Ever!
text: I have just returned  to the UK from a 1 week stay at The Hard Rock Hotel, New York and we absolutely will be back to stay again; simply the best Hotel we have ever stayed in! The staff made us feel so welcome and nothing was too much trouble. Gina Pena was the most helpful person ever from the minute we made our first enquiry to the day of our check-out. The rooms are huge and luxuriously fitted out; the balcony is a suntrap overlooking the bright lights of the City and nothing was ever too much trouble.  Milton, our breakfast host, was an absolute breath of fresh air every morning! We cannot wait to be back!

title: Perfect Location to explore New York
text: Really great hotel, worth the extra costs. Location is amazing, staff on the whole were great. Decent sized room which was spotless. Bed bath as good size and bar upstairs was really nice. Didn’t eat here as there were so many other options around and breakfast seemed high price considering other options in the area.

title: Perfect Holidays at the Hard Rock Hotel
text: awesome in every sense!!! Modern design, perfect service. Employees were very nice and helpful. You can book this hotel without any doubt. We will come back for shure. We have made many experiences in top hotels in UAE. The Hard Rock Hotel doesnt have to hide!

title: Beautiful hotel
text: Great location close to Radio City Music Hall and Rockefeller Center.Not far from Times Square.  Beautiful new hotel. Rooms were nice. Good size.Bed and pillows were so comfortable. The hotel lobbies and restaurant areas are very elegant looking. More than I would have thought for Hard Rock Cafe. Some music memorabilia but mostly just an upscale looking hotel. Staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Rooms were very quiet. Could not hear any street noise at all. Would definitely stay here again!!

title: Great hotel and fitness center
text: This is a great hotel in the heart of Times Square and an oasis from all the hustle and bustle outside. It is beautifully designed and the rooms are super comfortable. The fitness center is top notch for a hotel gym. It is large and has great weights and cardio equipment.

title: Super fun hotel
text: Great property in a great location. Staff is wonderful, views are great, so close to all the action but amazingly the rooms were super quiet.  The food was great and the bars are a lot of fun.  Clean, well appointed and super comfortable.  Highly recommend.

title: Super recommended!
text: In the heart of NYC, friendly and considerate staff, super clean and comfortable (I was surprised how good the black-out blinds are!!). I didn't try the food on the hotel/restaurant/bar, but they're all beautiful to hang out at. They surprised us with a bottle of Prosecco because of our anniversary :)

title: Excellent location.
text: We stayed at The Hard Rock hotel in NY USA. It’s situated by time square so we stayed inns room with a balcony one of 3 only available at this hotel with fantastic views of time square and fabulous sunsets. Highly recommended. It has a great steak restaurant within this hotel and a roof top bar on 34th floor. The service was amazing with unlimited water and tea / coffee facilities in the room. Would stay here again.

title: Exceptional Experience!
text: The entire staff at the Hard Rock Hotel were absolutely wonderful!!! From the second we set foot on the property Chester, greeted us with great enthusiasm, and impeccable professionalism. Our check-in was smooth, welcoming, and informative. Our Concierge Abby, went above and beyond to provide us with valuable information, and fantastic recommendations!!! The RT60 Rooftop Bar & Lounge is gorgeous, and we thoroughly enjoyed our cocktails!! The baristas at the café in the Rock Shop are fantastic! The espressos, lattes and almond croissants  were all delicious! The Hard Rock Hotel is a must stay when in New York!! Can’t wait to come back!!!

title: Love it
text:
Very clean, new, beautiful hotel. Stuff is great and friendly. Security guys were nice and thorough to open doors and help with luggage. Coffee machine and the coffee is the best and the most delicious. The bathroom is new, gorgeous, clean- I enjoyed every minute being in the hotel. 
Thank you, I love it!

title: Absolutely perfect
text: We went to New York for my birthday and made a last minute change to the Hard Rock hotel. When we arrived check in was easy and they allowed check in early. They knew it was a special occasion and made it so special and went above and beyond. The rooms were beautiful, modern and clean. The location is great, you are by Times Square but a little off to the size so you don’t get the flashing lights in your windows but still so close to everything.

title: Superb hotel for a family stay near all of the attractions
text: Spent five nights at the HRH and had a faultless stay. Welcoming arrival, very clean rooms with comfortable beds and great location to Times Square. Low noise from outside in the bedrooms which was an added bonus considering how near to Times Sq it is located. Had breakfast one morning which was lovely. Would definitely recommend and visit again.

title: PERFECT
text: We travelled from Nova Scotia to the US and were disappointed in our accommodations and THEN we arrived at the Hard Rock New York - the hotel is exceptionally clean, rooms are sparkling , spacious enough for a couple, comfy beds , bathrooms beautiful , the staff were exceptional always eager to help .  Dining on site gives lots of options, food is delicious .  Truly made the trip wonderful!  We will be back and would highly recommend to anyone heading to Manhattan!!

title: Holiday weekend leisure travel
text: I really like this hotel. It was clean, Updated, comfortable, and interesting decor. Service and staff were very good, and ExpressCheck out was extremely easy. They were two restaurants to eat at and the rooftop bar was an added plus. The hotel common areas and rooms were very clean and comfortable.

title: NYC Hard Rock Great Place to Stay
text: Had a great time at the Hard Rock, very friendly staff, very accommodating and attentive to your needs.  The suite was roomy and very nice.  We had great views.  I would definitely recommend staying there.  It is convenient to anywhere you need to be in the city.

title: The Best Place!
text: The hotel was central to all activities, food, street vendors, and shopping.  The staff was very friendly and knowledgeable.  The food at Sessions was excellent.  If you go, you must try the French Toast! And the room was top notch with very comfortable beds and nice, clean bathrooms. Highly recommend.

title: Had a rockstar experience at NY Hard Rock Hotel
text: The vibe at the NY Hard Rock is hard to beat, and the staff service beyond compare. Food was great, service was supreme, from the time I walked in I felt like I was a rockstar. Check-in and check-out was quick and easy, and I loved the care and convenience of texting for what I needed. Beds are really comfortable, and you can see the whole city for the RT60 Roof Top bar while you drink and eat and rock to music. Fantastic experience.

title: A series of unfortunate events
text: There was a new issue every day of our stay.  From the time we checked in to the time we checked out there were problems. One or two minor issues with a stay is understandable, but 5+. Over only 4 days indicates poor management and little concern for guests.

title: Surprising stay at the Hard Rock Hotel
text: I was in town for 5 nights for business (and a little pleasure). My partner and I ended up staying at the Hard Rock Hotel and were blown away. The hotel is beautiful. There's not a Hard Rock Cafe in the lobby, but rather a steakhouse with great cocktails and food. The rooms were incredibly clean and comfortable. Very well designed to be efficient without  being claustrophobic. You're in Times Square, but its easy to get anywhere else on the train. The staff was helpful and attentive without being intrusive. Our room was expertly cleaned daily. We were there for 5 nights and didn't have to call the front desk once. We will absolutely be staying here again.

title: Super 👍
text: Parfait: emplacement, chambre relativement spacieuse, gentillesse du service et magnifique espace intérieur avec terrasse pour le petit-déjeuner, ambiance et fond musical sympa, désormais mon meilleur choix pour New York !

title: Excellent hotel near Times Square
text: The rooms are very clean, roomy, and well stocked with clothing steamer, coffee maker, mini refrigerator. Great location - easy walk to anywhere in the Times Square area. Staff is very attentive and friendly. Check in and check out were a breeze. I couldn't have asked for a better hotel experience.

title: Hard Rock Cafe in the hotel
text: This review is for the hard rock coffee place. The guys that work there: David P, Aldo, Gabriel, and Ian are a fantastic group. I’ve gotten to know them as I often stop by for coffees because they are in close proximity to my office. The coffee is always great and the customer service is top notch. I often bring my coworkers because I love coming here! The coffee is Lavazzo so you know the drip is always good and they make amazing chai tea lattes! Thanks guys for being awesome !

title: Good location but hotel could do better
text: We booked for fantastic location which it was. The hotel and services could be better, eg poor barthroom design with no practical towel hangers and missing ventilation. Rooms are rather small, we got the suite (with guitar that we had to remind them about) and it was more like a regular room size.

title: Rockin’ Hard Rock Hotel!
text: Really an accommodating and welcoming place.  The staff was great and extremely pleasant and helpful.  They helped with all aspects from the room to transportation.  I wish we just had a longer stay at such a wonderful place. Will definitely come back!!!

title: Excellent property, needs coordination of staff
text:
Overall we enjoyed our stay at Hard Rock NYC: the building is cool and modern, there is good security, the rooms are spacious-ish (for New York City), the amenities are satisfactory, the gym/fitness center is large and well equipped, and the room soundproofing is excellent.

We withheld a star for the lack of coordination in the front desk and Sessions restaurant staff. There is much activity going on, but it doesn't seem focused or directed. At the former, our room was not ready at check-in time but an hour later, and we had to keep presenting this issue seemingly anew to changed staff who never seemed to have any idea what had been said or promised earlier. At the latter, there is a lot of server and staff movement, but it is inefficient. We had to ask random staff to order, for more coffee, etc.

From our experience, this is an excellent property with promise that needs staff training and coordination in order to meet that promise.

title: Construction site next door
text:
Poor service and next to a construction site not worth the additional cost.
The bar service was poor and the staff were too busy messing about to pay attention to the customers.
We did get a room change but I do not go away to keep packing and unpacking being woken at 6am from the construction site was no joke!

title: Excelente experiencia
text: El hotel es bello lugar, muy acogedor, muy buen servicio de limpieza, fabulosa ubicación, personal amable y atento, resolvieron nuestras dudas, nos ayudaron en gestiones del viaje, en temas de salud y    nos brindaron soluciones ante situaciones emergentes.

title: Superb service
text: Hard Rock has now gained a customer for LIFE. There is NOTHING I can say about my recent stay besides SUPERB! If the balcony room is available so yourself a favor and book it. The view is amazing of Times Square. The location is right in the center of the action yet one CANT hear much when it’s time to relax and unwind. Just book it you want be disappointed!

title: Excellent!
text: Great location and great hotel. Yes the rooms are small so you will need more than one room if going plus 2. The hotel is very clean and well maintained and offers a lot of amenities and various in hotel dining options. Location is also great and very central! Highly recommended!

title: Wonderful hotel, Amazing location
text: Excellent location! steps from Times Square and the Subway.  Excellent choice for business and leisure.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  I went there with my family (kids included).  Everyone had a blast.  Both restaurants and the roof top bar were very good.  This is not like any other Hard Rock.  The hotel vibe is calm.  The lobby is beautiful.

title: Lovely Hotel with great bar and restaurant facilities
text: Just finished a trip to New York and stayed in Hard Rock Hotel. It is a lovely hotel, very clean with friendly, helpful staff. However, probably the best features are the bars are restaurants especially the roof top bar. All have entertainment and serve food.

title: Ottima posizione e molto bello!
text: Ottima posizione per girare a piedi nella Uptown tra Times Square e Rockefeller Center, fermate metro comode per spostarsi in sicurezza anche la sera. Camere splendide, pulitissimo, personale estremamente gentile e accogliente. Bel rooftop per aperitivo.

title: Great vibe and value.
text: Fantastic location and room, and a very nice and helpful staff that always seemed genuinely happy. Air conditioning unit was a bit noisy, but the room itself was very quiet despite being in Times Square.

title: MAGNIFIQUE HOTEL
text:
Très bel hôtel, confort, service, chambre luxueuse .
La propreté est excellente aussi bien dans la chambre que dans les parties communes. 
Le roof top offre une vue formidable sur time square.
Le service est très professionnel .

title: My dream stay at hard rock
text: I had an amazing time in this hotel , the staff and the hotel decoration was a dream. By the way everything was close, so I was able to walk to everywhere that I wanted to go. All the staff was ready to provide advice to me and the roof top is a breathtaking to party and eat ding food

title: The Best time in my life
text:
Greetings, 
My name is Shay kornblu and I had the privilege of staying at your hotel. From the first day to the last, I received excellent service! Everyone was nice to me and made me feel at home. I am sure that the names that I will mention here are not everyone that I met during my stay at the hotel, but what I am sure of, I will return to this hotel again. So thank you very much for everything. thanks to Robert DAVID Linett GABRIEL Aldo ORLANDO JOORNETT And I'm sure I forgot to thank some of the people I met but you will all stay in my heart until the next time I come. 
Shay kornblu

title: Amazing!!
text: Modern Clean hotel!  Great staff! Amazing location! The smallest room is very small,  We upgraded to the king suite which was much nicer. Complimentary water bottles daily. We didn't eat at their restaurant.

title: Great Hotel with some very cool memorable
text: Stayed at the Hard Rock NYC, for business. The staff, ambiance, food were all great. Room and bed are very clean and comfortable. Wifi speeds we're also great which made working from my room and bar a breeze.

title: Big Apple one more time
text: Hard Rock Hotel is fabulous, great selection, superb service and location, gorgeous restaurants, delicious coffee, Times Square is right outside the hotel, near to city main atractions, metro lines near to the hotel

title: NYC Vacation
text: We loved our stay at the Hard Rock. Our room and bathroom were clean and very modern. It was very quiet with zero road noise. The staff was friendly, courteous and professional. We will definitely stay here again.

title: Great choice!
text: We were extremely happy with all aspects of our stay!  We wanted a hotel close to theaters, so the location was perfect. Staff was polite and very friendly, and accommodations clean, attractive and comfortable.   We are happy we chose the Hard Rock Hotel!

title: UN 5 étoile en devenir
Definitely not a 5 star hotel !
text:
We stayed for 10 days in 2 rooms.
Very disappointed in term of welcome, understanding and overall services. No attentions at all especially for such a long stay. 
Breakfast experience is terrible !

The rooms and corridors are very noisy.
The in room service is too long. 

Excepted the rooftop bar, this is definitely not a welcoming place. People are regardless. The value for money is too high. Avoid and choose a more charming and client centric hotel instead !

title: The best themed hotel
text:
From the moment you enter the hotel you know you are in for a great ride. The hotel lobby, with a Lady GaGa dress and various other memorabilia is stunning. The reception is on the first floor, checking-in was efficient, the staff are so well trained, they are there to make you feel specia,l and they do. I filled out a form to recieve a guitar in my room - which I never got, my only real disappointment. To be honest I had so much going on I wouldn't have been able to practice my pentatonics anyway.
The room was amazing. Great vibe, REALLY comfy bed, well equipped bath room with an incredible shower. 
The roof-top bar was top-notch. Great food (as you would expect from this brand), an impressive choice of drinks and view to die for. The atomosphere was immersive. 
Check-out was as efficient and friendly as check-in. Although I asked for my bill to be emailed, which I didn't get, not a big issue as I had a paper one.
I went

title: Other charges
text: The reception and management team treated me awful. Said I have to pay more than what mentioned in booking, while it wasn’t true. At the end they forced to charge my credit card without my permission.

title: Super semaine en famille pour notre 1ere fois à NY
text:
Nous avons passé 7j en famille dans l’hôtel
Émplacement au cœur de time square ce qui était parfait pour notre 1ere fois à NYC car très central et commode pour se déplacer
En revanche une fois sortie de la quiétude de l’hôtel dehors c’est la folie touristique
L’ambiance de l’hôtel est à l’image de l’enseigne, de la musique et une bonne ambiance partout.
Le service est très aimable. 
Nous avions demandé une chambre en étage ce qui a éte exaucé. Les chambres sont très confortables et la literie hyper bonne.
Bref une très bonne semaine .. à un prix NYais .. ! Il faut être prêt à dépenser +++

title: Loved our recent stay at Hard Rock Hotel NY
text: We stay in NYC frequently and haven’t been that happy with the hotels in the area for the price UNTIL we stayed at Hard Rock this weekend. PERFECTION - great energy, communication, the resort is pristine and so luxurious. The rooms are small, but so well equipped and the space is used so well. 10/10. - will be back. Perfect location.

title: The Hard Rock has it all.
text: A great stay at the Hard Rock Hotel NYC. The location is perfect and the staff very accommodating. Dinner at NYY was top notch, and we appreciated the vouchers from the hotel for 2 free cocktails.. Our room was immaculate, decor super interesting, staff extremely helpful. Check out the rooftop bar. The Hard Rock has it all. Recommend highly.

title: Great hotel and great location
text:
Had a great time staying here. Staff very helpful and friendly. Great location. Room well appointed only thing missing was a bottle opener.
Great cake shop too got to have the raspberry tart. Would stay again if back jn New York.

title: I wouldn’t recommend staying here-not worth it
text: Mattress was uncomfortable and the room was very small and not the room we paid for. The restaurant service was awful. You can’t even walk around your bed without bumping into the closet. I would not recommend this hotel nor stay again

title: Great choice
text: I was so happy with this hotel. It its a bit pricey but well worth it. Great location to Time Square and the subway. The concierge were always nice and helpful. It was clean and comfortable. I would stay here again.

title: Nice hotel, great Location!
text: I’ve never stayed quite so close to time square before but I loved this location and ease of getting to Broadway shows. I loved the hotel, we enjoyed looking at the music memorabilia. The hotel felt fancy and new. The rooms, like all NYC rooms, are small but these rooms made such great use of their space. Lots of storage. Loved the sitting nook and table, perfect for eating Juniors Cheesecake after a show. Loved the blackout curtains. (Beds are queens that feel like doubles, but at least they were comfortable). There is a nice market right next door too which was so helpful. PSA; The lights by the bed turn on by a little switch above the lampshade, it took us way too long to figure out and ironically we would have found them faster if there had been more light to see. (Our room on the 7th floor did not get direct sunlight due to the tall buildings around it  so it felt dark even with the shades open). Will definitely stay here again!!

title: Awesome Experience!
text: Must eat at NYY and have a drink at RT60! The food is fantastic at NYY, start with the bison meatballs! Nico, Becca, and Nathan will take care of you at the bar. The live music is nice and adds to the ambience!

title: Lovely Hotel, Perfect Location
text:
Wonderful hotel, 2 minute walk to times square, easy to get ubers/taxis out front.  Hotel team were really helpful, they kinldy printed the theatre tickets I had forgotten to print before arriving :)! 
Rooms were spot on, so comfy and quiet. Showers are AMAZING!
We used the restaurant and bar, both really nice, but did't make the steak house unfortunately (next time, for sure!).  There's a pizza place a couple doors down where you can buy by the slice (perfect for midnight munchies on the way back to the hotel!)
We used the left luggage on our last day to make the most of our time in the city and unlike some hotels I've stayed at, it was quick and easy to get them back ready for the trip to the airport.  The staff are very helpful too if you need a taxi to the airport (cheaper than uber!)
Would recommend to anyone and will definitely stay again!

title: Beautiful Property/Hotel
text: Had an amazing 8 night stay here at the HRNY hotel! I had the superior king room—which is just the classic king room, but higher floor. When I arrived I was placed only on the 6th floor. I was swiftly accommodated to the 16th floor once I made this known. Only downside. Highly recommend!!!

title: Absolutely perfect!
text:
I would recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to stay in the middle of everything, we would 100% come back!
The room was immaculate, nothing was too much trouble, it exceeded our expectations. We had been told that New York hotel rooms tend to be very small but our room had plenty of space with everything we would need.

title: Hard rock
text:
Sono stato in questo hotel con mia moglie e mia figlia. Camera e bagno belli ma di dimensioni ridotte per tre persone.
Posizione fantastica e personale molto gentile e disponibile.
Ho cenato alla Steak dell'hotel dove mi sono trovato decisamente bene. Non parliamo di prezzi in quanto in questo periodo New York è in generale tuo much.
Roof carino ma frequentato parecchio dall'esterno quindi sempre prenotato e pieno.Non ha una gran vista e la terrazza è piccola per accogliere gente al di fuori dell'hotel.

title: Guitar in room didn’t happen
text: Loved the hotel and staff, but the SOLE reason I chose this hotel was to have a guitar in our room for the weekend. I wanted to hear my son play in the morning, afternoon, or before bed - a mom’s dream.  There weren’t any guitars available on Thursday, so we were hoping for one on Friday, Saturday, or Sunday - didn’t happen. I was traveling with my three adult kids and they enjoyed the city, but I was so hoping for those quiet times when I could just enjoy my kids and the music. Hard Rock Hotel. Guitar in our room - cool, right?  Nope. So, if you are going to advertise this “experience” for those of us who plan on it, please have enough. It was the only disappointment of our trip, but it meant so much to me.

title: Excellent
text: Hard rock was excellent from arrival to departure. Excellent location, friendly staff excellent hotel. Clean beautiful. Roof top bar has stunning views, staff always put you first. Excellent bar service.

title: Heart of time square
text: Excellent location and vey nice and clean hotel, it was the best choice to be in the heat of time square. And the staff was vey friendly specially the concierge staff had a very helpful information to plan our day in NY

title: 5 night trip
text: Great location near Times Square.Lovely decor and excellent friendly staff .Can’t really fault anything and there’s a great Pizza shop next door .Had a problem with our toilet but was repaired immediately.

title: Weekend getaway
text: Our stay at the Hard Rock hotel was amazing.  It was by far the best hotel experience I have had in NYC.  Everyone we interacted with was friendly and helpful (with the exception of the host on the rooftop bar).  We did have a problem with our first room, but they texted me the second day to see how things were and quickly remedied the situation.  Honestly, I would not have said anything if they did not ask!  They upgraded our room too which was an added surprise.  The bed was comfortable and the hotel had lots of interesting memorabilia to look at.  I will definitely stay there again!

title: Can’t wait to come back!
text: I really enjoyed my stay with the Hard Rock hotel. The hotel is absolutely gorgeous, the interior design was really thought out. The staff was amazing and super attentive. Anytime I ran into a staff member, I was met with a kind smile and willingness to help if I needed it. Checking in/out was such a breeze! Can’t wait to return for a longer trip!

title: LOVE the Hard Rock Hotel in NYC Times Square!
text: I was totally impressed with this hotel!  First of all, aesthetically it was very pleasing - everything new and in great shape - that was my first impression.  Then the staff - it's been a long time since I've been someplace where everyone on the staff was wonderful!  Front desk staff, concierge, doormen, bell hops, restaurant staff and housekeeping.  Great location if you want to be in Times Square.  My only suggestion - put more food options on the rooftop bar menu.  I highly recommend this hotel!

title: Excellent hotel near Times Square
text: Loved this hotel!  The rooms are modern, clean and well-functioning. The location is great near Times Square but not too close.  Several subway stations within just a few blocks. The rooftop bar is great with nice views.  The staff is extremely friendly, from the doormen to front desk to the restaurants and bars, everyone on staff went overboard to make us feel welcome. I’ll definitely return.

title: Great hotel! Just stay there! You won’t be disappointed!
text:
We really enjoyed our stay at HRH! Everyone did everything they could to make the stay exceptional and they succeeded! Very friendly and helpful staff! Best stay we’ve EVER had in ANY hotel! 
Just stay there, it’s fantastic!

title: Excellent overall but hole tshirt from hard rock shop as goft
text:
Excellent trip. Four day stop off after Jamaica.
My sons 14th birthday- only fault was birthday gift iupok arriving home the T shirt has a hole. 

Such a shame my son was looking forward to wearing his memorabilia

title: Hard Rock hotel - Easter visit
text: Excellent hotel for our Easter trip to NYC. Room was clean, modern and comfortable. Staff were friendly, welcoming and always helpful. The hotel is definitely pricey, but this reflects its position and star rating. I’d actively look to rebook into the hotel on returning to the city.

title: Our go to Hotel in NYC now…highly recommend
text: The Hard Rock Hotel was fantastic all around.  Not a speck of dirt in our room on arrival.  Easy check in and out.  The staff was very professional and friendly.  Loved that there was valet parking.  The security was top notch, which puts your mind at ease.  The location was in the heart of NYC, just outside of the hustle and bustle of Times Square.  We had dinner before our show at NYY, and the crab cake and fries with the smokey mayo was fantastic!  The cocktails were very good too!  We also liked the ambiance of the rooftop bar, RT 60.  Good music, professional staff that approached immediately for drink orders, and the view of the city was nice.  The concierge recommended a nail salon, and he was spot on.  This will be my go to Hotel any time I’m in NYC.

title: Excellent customer service
text: We had a great time at the HRC Hotel. We experienced  excellent customer service while shopping. Journett was very friendly, patient, professional and helpful in helping us find what we were looking for at the Hard Rock Cafe Gift Shop. Great service at an incredible  hotel Thank you

title: Brilliant hotel New York hotel .
text:
I don't know where to start really . The hotel is fabulous with amazing ,friendly , helpful staff . We stayed for 4 nights  over the Easter period . The place was clearly very busy but all the staff took time to make us feel welcome and valued , nothing was too much trouble . The room was spotless and the amenities were excellent. 
We were there to celebrate a birthday and to see Bruce  Springsteen . The staff had been able to assign us the "appropriate " room for our stay and the reception staff seemed to be as pleased as I was about this , making the stay even more special .
The hotel is brilliantly placed for exploring Times Square and beyond .
The rooftop bar is a must with wonderful views over the city and a fantastic atmosphere , once again all the staff were helpful and friendly .
There is a wide range of rock and pop memorabilia to discover ,brilliant for rock and pop trivia nerds like us !!!
The Hard Rock is THE perfect hotel to stay and explore New York but also to relax at the end of the day .
The kindness of the staff was highlighted further on the last night when a little 'Brucie' gift was left in my daughters room with a lovely handwritten card . A very special touch to end a perfect stay . 
Thank you to everyone , if we could give the Hard Rock 6 stars we would .

title: Excel;ent stay
text: Hard Rock Hotel NYC is an excellent hotel to stay in. Staff are extremely helpful and make you feel very welcome.  As a family of four adults we had a fabulous stay.  The hotel is in a great location for visiting NYC.  Very clean and beautiful hotel.

title: Hard Rock Hotel in New York
text: Amazing new Hotel. All staff were very helpful. Rooms serviced every day. Sessions restaurant was for excellent for breakfast and evening meal. Perfect location for a stay at New York. Close to Times Square.

title: Excellent
text: Great hotel. Located a stones throw from Times Square, the subway, Radio City and all Broadway Theatres. Clean rooms, daily room cleaning service. Breakfasts were brilliant and I had the best steak I’d ever had in the NYY Steak house who do a great pre theatre menu at a reasonable price.

title: Great hotel
text: Loved this hotel. It was very nice and clean. We loved the location because it was easy to get everywhere we wanted to go. The staff was so friendly and helpful. Will definitely stay here again in the future.

title: Hôtel hard rock café NYC.
text: Nous avons été prendre un verre au Hard Rock Café hôtel de NYC, au roof top au 34e étage.  Nous étions assise au bar et la ´barmaid’ avait une humeur exécrable.  Elle avait l’attitude d’une personne qui voulait être ailleurs. C’est la première fois que je vois une employée de si de mauvaise humeur à NYC.

title: Wonderful stay!
text: What a lovely experience. The hotel is next to Times Square which was perfect for touristy things. The rooms are quiet and well decorated, brand new and super clean. Loved the hotel, everything was great!

title: Perfect vacations
text: Excellent beautiful new hotel, with a good location and very friendly staff, offers breakfast, dinner and a spectacular steak house restaurant, plus best of all pet friendly where you can be comfortably with your four-legged best friend and they treat them well How to start Miguel el doorman and bartenders, absolutely all of them were very friendly and professional, like 5 stars. The hotel is very, very close to everything, just 1 minute walk from Radio City Music Hall and Times Square. I loved that they have people there with vans that help you They take you anywhere, excellent hotel, we definitely stayed in the studio suite, very comfortable and comfortable, we slept very well, very comfortable beds, without thinking about it, I would visit from Puerto Rico again

title: super friendly staff
text:
The room we had was quite small ( used to something with a bit more room) but it was clean and had all the facilities you need. It had a nice coffee machine (great if you like coffee) but what I did appreciate was the mini fridge where you could keep a small selection of alcoholic drinks cool! :) The first night we arrived we had no toiletries left in the room, one phone call and they whizzed a good supply of everything up to us immediately. We also had a problem with the tv connection which baffled the maintenance guys but with a bit of perseverance was fixed in no time at all! The bed was really comfortable with excellent quality pillows, but I was woken up a couple of times by people talking in the next room but saying that outside noise was minimal. We had room service one night which was exceptional! Well worth the money, Quick, hot and plenty of it!
Staff were super friendly, we were met by the doorman who acknowledged us every time! I would like to give a shout out to Gabriel from the coffee shop who was charming and made a great cup of tea! Also Darren who greeted us warmly and made us feel very welcome. 
I would recommend this hotel on location and friendly staff, not so on the size of the room though

title: Wonderful Hotel
text: We are just back from a 5 night stay at the Hard Rock in a double Queen room with our family of four. The staff are very welcoming, the doormen always greeted us every morning and had a laugh with the kids. The room was brilliant - plenty of room for 4 people, the room was cleaned daily during our stay. All in all we had a great time and wouldn’t hesitate recommending this hotel to others out returning ourselves for our next trip to NYC. Thanks again everyone at Hard Rock New York!!

title: Wonderful stay
text: We had a wonderful stay at this amazing hotel. Rooms were beautiful and clean. The rooms were also so quiet - no street noise. The location was ideal and the staff was so friendly. We will definitely be back!!

title: I love The Hard Rock NY!
text: We had the best time here! The rooms are gorgeous and the room service and hotel staff are so accommodating and hospitable! The hotel is gorgeous and the food is amazing! I love staying at Hard Rock hotels especially this one here in NY!

title: Mr. H'eroux
text: From my arrival to my departure of 3 days, I was absoluty amazed at the level of excellence shown through my own customer experience.  I was able to see New York Times square for the first time.  I was equally impressed with GM Chef Oscar & his team of professional chefs - indecently could rival with Mr. Ramsey's team for sure!!!.   I enjoyed the aged filet for lunch & the breakfast choices I so eloquently enjoyed.   Please complement the valet team on their excellent customer service, as I personally witnessed.  Thank you for the opportunity to share my positive feedback.

title: Hard Rock Hotel rocks with a fabulous roof top bar!
text: An amazing modern hotel right in the heart of Times Square.  Great bars and cocktails made to order and we even enjoyed a silent disco on one of the evenings before heading out!  The roof top bar is amazing !!! So central it was amazing for such a short trip - we will be back!

title: Brilliant, start to finish!
text:
Absolutely brilliant, start to finish. What a hotel and what service, at all levels.

Check in was easy, friendly and just what you wanted after a long journey. Bubbly door staff every morning, wishing us a happy day,  nice touch. Comp umbrellas were also welcomed on a wet day.

Bar was good, but drink range a little limited - no tap beer, only bottles.

Room is small, but then it is New York. Excellent room though, immaculate on arrival and everyday after maid service. Lovely touch of a free bottle of drink to mark my wife’s birthday. And an amazing note from the team. Lovely - thank you again!

Times Square is manic, but having this hotel to come back to, feel welcomed and then relax, was just brilliant.

Cannot recommend enough. Well done Hard Rock, you got this right! The Hard Rock Cafe around the corner could learn a lot from you!!!

Thanks again!

title: Good location
text: The hotel is near Times Square, the rooms are clean ,furniture is new and the staff is helpful. The only thing I was disappointed with, is the daily resort fee which is 45 USD per room in addition to the rate  of the room .So check it before booking !

title: Excelente opción en New York.
text: Personal Amable... Muy Amable, muy buena ubicación, sus restaurantes muy buenos.  Regresaría sin pensarlo.  La habitación un poco más grande que el general de las habitaciones que están cerca de Times Square

title: March in NYC
text: Fabulous mid week break. 3 generations. All impressed by fabulous staff, top quality amenities, food etc.  Loved the hotel interior,  bathroom products etc.  definitely a return visit. Great location for broadway, Vanderbilt Summit, the Met etc.  Clodagh

title: Good hotel
text:
Nice new modern rooms (difficult to find in NYC), decent gym, good bar.  Overall nothing to complain about, location is a little near to Times Square but I knew that before I booked.

Overall would return as I find it hard to find a hotel with decent rooms in NYC.

title: Highly recommend
text: Beautiful hotel with excellent customer service. Very close to all the action of Times Square and very quiet when you return to your room. The most comfortable bed I have slept in. Their lobby staff couldn’t do enough to help and really added to our stay. We stayed 6 nights and I could have stayed for longer.

title: Boy with glasses are cute
text:
I went to the rock shop. 
The coffee was fast and hot and made perfect.
 This guy named Journett help me out.
 He was so helpful and very sweet and cute.
 5 out of 5 stars will definitely tell my friends to visit.
 I have a thing for 4 eyes.

title: $45 toilet paper charge!!
text:
Great location, you are paying for the branding. 
On check out, we were told we had a $45 plus tax resort fee per night, our stay was 4 nights. We were never informed of this at check in and were totally shocked! When questioned this fee,we were told `it's for condiments', so a 5 star hotel you are expected to pay for water,coffee,soap and toilet paper??

title: great stuff very friendly
text: Great customer service clean and great stuff , easy check in .the stuff were very helpful .great location iwill definitely recommend staying at this hotel .great experience .walking distance to all the stores in timesquare .

title: Perfect spot!
text: From arrival - valet and checkin were both seamless and simple. Initially I was a little concerned our balcony room was only on the 5th floor, but it was ideal - no significant city noise. The room was beautifully appointed and perfectly spacious, just perfect for myself and my 9 year old daughter. The chocolates on our first night from room service made her day! The entire hotel (that we saw) was unbelievably clean - main areas, elevators, and halls. Stellar housekeeping service on the 5th floor - even though we opted against daily service, the team checked on us every time they saw us in the hall to make certain we were all set. No trash bags in the room was a bit of a concern, I didn’t want to dispose of food trash in an empty bin so that was a bit to manage, but I imagine it must be related to NYC plastic bag ban. This hotel is so perfectly situated between Times Square and Rockefeller Center, and the subway but yet tucked away enough you get some peace and quiet. Beware the views from the 5th floor balcony rooms aren’t much, but still a bonus to have a balcony in the city! Mobile checkout was a cinch and the valet team was awesome. We came down about an hour and a half before departure on checkout day and let them know when we planned to leave and our car was waiting out front for us when we returned. Overall a wonderful experience- we did not try the on-site restaurants or bars, or in room dining.

title: Rooms are small and water pressure too.
text: My King Suite Balcony is so unlike the photos or the size mentioned.. Rooms are small and toilet too.. Nothing nice to say on this except  one very Kind concierge  guy. Thank u. Sorry i missed your name.

title: First timer in NY

The Bar upstairs good for the drinks and hang out . room we got had no view .was very clean and modern .,Small and no drawer space . We stayed 6 day

title: Best location and hotel!!
text: The hotel is located right in Times Square. One block from a subway station if needed. Friendly staff, very updated and clean hotel. Bedding was superb. Room has everything you need with lots of upgrades.

title: Cannot beat this hotel!
text: Location is amazing!  Steps to Broadway and 30 Rock.  Close to Central Park and Empire State.  Subway is steps away.  Hotel itself is gorgeous.  Staff is friendly, knowledgeable and helpful.  Very clean and comfortable rooms.  We absolutely made the right choice when we stayed in this hotel!

title: Excellent service
text: Service d’une qualité exceptionnelle, personnel très courtois, hôtel très bien situé, propreté impeccable, très sécuritaire , très belle ambiance au restaurant de l’hôtel, seul bémol manque de choix sur le menu du restaurant du 2 ieme étage.

title: My new go-to!
text: We loved it!  Clean and fun and beautiful!!!!  Appropriate for kids and amazing rooms and amazing shower head!  Could not be more convenient!  Close to everything!  Bagels next door and in Times Square…this is my new spot!

title: The most personable Nyc hotel experience
text: We had the most amazing time at the hard rock hotel in New York City all staff were attentive personable and friendly. We were greeted with smiles from the door.  Housekeeping responded and delivered right away any item you requested.  Front desk agents greeted you with smiles and great information on what to do and where to eat in the city. This has been the best hotel experience I have had since the pandemic. It is good to know that hospitality has not died! Way to go hard rock!

title: A great stay!
text: I stayed here last week on business and had a fantastic experience. The location is superb, the staff was so friendly and accommodating, the room was a good size, the bed was extremely comfortable with a ton of pillows.  Best of all, it was IMMACULATE. Their housekeeping staff is outstanding. The rooms are well-equipped but there's no micowave, so be warned. Also I was a bit confused about the operation of the shower, but eventually sorted it out.  Had some water problems one morning as well, but those were momentary and did not impact my stay. Just don't panic if you can't get the water to turn on in the morning--give it a few seconds. I didn't completely love the food--it was good but oddly prepared in a few cases that did not really add anything to the result. The hotel is incredibly stylish and virtually brand-new.  Try the rooftop bar for amazing views, especially at night, out on the balcony.  Overall this was one of my best experiences at any NY hotel. The staff really takes it up a level and I want to commend them here for their outstanding service. If you are considering staying anywhere near Times Square or Midtown, the Hard Rock is a great choice.

title: Glasgow 70th celebrations
text:
Can’t praise all staff in the hotel highly enough.
The door staff always help make a good city break in my opinion. 
We had cold water 2/5 mornings for showering. Honest maintenance issue. However they did their very best to sort.
And we were looked after over and above this..
Planning on coming back ASAP.

title: 2nd stay, will stay again
text: I keep reading reviews that say the staff are not friendly. That can’t be further from the truth. Everyone was so welcoming and hospitable. Lobby and rooms were clean. Beds were extremely comfortable. I have had no problems with this hotel and will stay again.

title: Great service!
text: Julivia was able to provide us with awesome, personalized experience during checking while we were visiting for our anniversary! She made sure that we got the best room possible, hand delivered our keys when the room was ready. She gave us great recommendations for our visit to the city!

title: Perfection in Times Square
text: Great customer service from the beginning to the end! Hard Rock is centrally located in the heart of times square, and the hotel is BEAUTIFUL top to bottom. Be sure to check out their steak house!! :)

title: Prime location great staff
text: Spent a long weekend at the Hard Rock in Manhattan. Price was fair. Proximity to theaters, dining and transportation is ideal. Staff was friendly and helpful. Rooftop bar is a great spot on a nice weather evening.

title: Hard Rock Hotel
text: This hotel exceeded my expectations! Great service and hospitality by all employees. The location is close to everything with many options for food and entertainment. You don’t even have to leave the hotel because it truly has it all. 10/10!

title: Best Hotel in New york
text: We've stayed in many New York Hotels and this was our best experience this far. Great staff, clean hotel, decent sized rooms. Staff went above and beyond to make sure it was a memorable trip. It was a great experience we will definitely be back.

title: Excellent Everything!!!
text: Excellent service, hotel and location. Right when we entered the service was great! We got a bottle of wine and a hand written note for our anniversary left on the table in the room which touched our hearts! It shows this hotel cares about their customers and went above and beyond. The room was New York sized but perfect! We brought small luggage so we had plenty of room. Bed was comfy, TV was nice with good channels. Washroom was very nice, the shower had handheld and rain shower head. We had a view of Times Square. The location was perfect! The hotel also would text you updates or whats going on in their rooftop lounge. We went once it was really nice!! I’d highly recommend anyone come to this hotel if you’re in the area, I’d stay here again!

title: Nice hotel
text: Me and my friend stayed at this hotel for one night . First we checked many places and we came across this one . It is Great place to stay with a nice view . Th stuff was perfect and we had a great night at this hotel . When we arrived the stuff check us in quickly and be there for anything you want . Highly recommended it.

title: Wonderful hotel, centrally located in Time Square. Hotel is new, very clean. Rooms ample room. Rooftop bar is welcoming.  Great
text: Wonderful hotel. Spacious new, great location.  Easy Uber ride from JFK. Lovely breakfast. Great drinks at the rooftop lounge. Tasty lemon drops, while enjoying the view of the city. Very pleased with our stay. Pricey but the quality is well worth the cost. Restaurants are expensive.

title: Great location, property and staff!
text: Staff was so inviting and helpful! Property was nice and in a great location. Staff went above and beyond making this birthday trip for my boyfriend memorable. Rose petals, champagne and dinner after a Broadway show was late and they made it happen! Thank you for your help Michael and other staff members!

title: Fantastic experience
text: I highly recommend the Hard Rock NYC. Everyone is friendly and professional and does a fantastic job. The hotel itself is extremely clean and well appointed. You can't go wrong staying here. Well worth the money.

title: Frequent Hard Rock AC Rock Royalty Member- 1st time at Hard Rock Hotel New York Did not disappoint!!
text: Traveled with my 15 year old. Hotel was beautiful. Staff was very friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. The room had an awesome view and was very clean. We drove into the city, the valet parking was effortless. We can’t wait to go back and will definitely be staying at the Hard Rock Hotel New York again!

title: Well worth it!
text: This hotel is awesome.  Beautiful facility and rooms, spotless, updated, perfect location.  I cannot say enough about the staff and service.  Well worth the extra money to stay in an upgraded hotel in Times Square.

title: Good location, let down by poor, occasionally rude service and hidden fees
text:
Me and my partner visited from the UK for 4 nights. We were very excited to stay in the Hard Rock hotel. At Check in, we were given our room keys and asked if we needed help with our bags, no conversation and fairly blunt, not very welcoming experience. They also took my credit card and said it was for security but I would not be charged, again this was fine until I saw I had been charged $400 in holding, ($100 per night) we were not informed of this. The room was nice but small which is understandable for the location. What let the hotel down was the service from the staff.  From returning into the building, the security would not greet you, if anything we felt looked up and down and judged, no hello or welcome back, maybe this is just because we are a gay couple, and others may get a better experience. We got a drink in the lobby bar and had the rudest server, we were pretty much the only people at the bar and we got service which was not just poor, the barman was blatantly rude, ignored us, gave my partner a long dirty look. We had a chat with a nice lady from Chicago outside the hotel who had a similar experience.

On check out I was surprised to be hit with a $180 charge for fees that I was not told about at check-in.

Advise to management - The team need to be briefed to be more informative on fees, I get why they would hide them, but I would rather know about them as they are unclear on booking. Also the staff need to be refreshed that customers are paying a lot of money for the hotel and expect friendly service.

title: Excellent service
text: We had a fantastic stay at the Hard Rock Hotel. The staff was extremely accommodating and helpful. The room was updated and clean. We had breakfast at the Sessions restaurant one morning. The food was excellent and the service was wonderful.

title: Special occasion
text: Great location, can walk to everywhere.  Balcony was a nice touch. Restaurant for dinner was not rushed, great service. Service in hotel was excellent, attentive, and what you would anticipate for the pricing.

title: Very nice hotel-but NOT queen beds
text: So in planning a girls trip for three to NYC we saw that this hotel had 2 queen beds. This seemed to be more desirable than having 2 double beds. So while more expensive we decided that comfort was more important. Only to get to the room and see 2 double beds. We called the front desk and they said oh no those are queen beds. Well they are 100% NOT queen beds. They offered us free breakfast-fine. To find out the free breakfast was a continental breakfast. Whatever. Everyone who worked at the hotel was very nice and the hotel was very nice. I just don't appreciate false advertising!!  Oh one other funny thing-they advertise that you could get a yoga kit to do yoga in your room. That is NOT gonna happen, there is no room for that, unless you'd like to do yoga on your bed!

title: Positive energy
text: Me and my son had a great weekend staying at Hard Rock Hotel last weekend. This hotel is not only conveniently located in the middle of all the attractions, but has its own remarkable gems, like the rooftop bar and outside sitting areas on the 34th floor.

title: Great location, everything is within walking distance.
text: Hard Rock is a very new hotel in Times Square. It’s literally on the doorstep of all the shops, restaurants and subway. Can fault the location. The decor is all new, bathrooms are fully equipped. The Rooms are all decorated very modern and have very comfy beds. Staff are helpful.

title: Anniversary Trip
text: We had a great time. The atmosphere is great. Nice rooftop bar and the shower was ideal. Can’t bear the location - minute from Times Square and walkable to and from PENN Station. Would stay again for sure.

title: Great overnight stay at Hard Rock Hotel
text: Perfect location; everyone friendly and willing to help. Clean and nicely decorated with music legends artifacts. Rooms are boutique small but are comfortable. Tiffany at check in was very friendly and accommodated request for a room change. Definitely would stay again.

title: NYC Trip
text:
Hard Rock is a new hotel, in a very nice local (on the heart of Times Square) and the rooms are quiet.
We stayed in a room whith double bed, that can be bigger because there is no place to put your clothes.

title: Perfect
text: Nous avons passé un super séjour dans cet hôtel. Tout était parfait. L'hôtel est idéalement situé, les chambres et l'hôtel sont très agréable. Le personnel et très sympathique. Mention spécial à David G qui a été d'une aide precieuse. Je recommande vivement cet hôtel pour un séjour à New York.

title: Ok hotel but poor service.
text:
Super slow room service. Unpleasant front desk person. Hotel advertises a guitar and record player for the room however every time I called the front desk they couldn’t tell me when one would be available. 

Room is clean and comfortable but room service wait times are way too long.

title: Great Times Square Location
text: Nice rooms in a great location. Stayed here in November for a getaway. It was my first time to New York. Great place to stay to enjoy Central Park, Times Square and theatre district. Amazing restaurants within walking distance and NYC transit makes the whole city easily accessible. Rooms were quiet and on the smaller side which I am told is the norm in NYC. Nice decor, really pleasant staff and great cocktails at both the lobby bar and the club on the top floor. I gave 5 stars but would’ve given 4.5 (if there was that option) as the rooms were small. But on the whole, closer to 5 than 4 stars thus the rating.

title: Superb service
text: This little gem was location right outside of the square.  It is located within walking distance of everything.  The staff was amazing the rooms are comfy and clean.  It quite literally  offered everything we needed for a first trip to NYC

title: Terrible Service, No Sleep
text: Me and my wife came in last night for vacation and promotion celebration, and choose to eat a Sessions. They were closing up and sent to us to NYC Steakhouse downstairs. When we arrived we had no reservations we were not told know we needed. After being set at our table our server took our order and proceeded to ask if we wanted to share every item we ordered as if we could not afford to order separate plates. I had three beers all of which were warm or at room temperature. My steak was ordered medium, it was medium well on the edges. The center was at the correct temperature. Over all it was a quality steak but the seasoning was underwhelming. For 337 dollars I expected to get treated with some respect. We came back up to our room and headed to bed we came in late so this was around 1 am, expecting to get up around 9 to explore the city. At around 6 am our neighbors came home absolutely trashed. We were awaken to the sound of heavy thumping like furniture was being moved, yelling and partying. We have heard all of there personal problems, political views, and enough bro’s to last me a lifetime. They continue to party as we speak (9 am now) and me and my wife have gotten no sleep. We text the number provided for assistance with no help. But room service did show up at 8:30 am and come into our room even though we had the do not disturb light on to clean. I expected better service all around I’m here until Sunday hopefully they are not and service improves I am disappointed.

title: Best NYC experience
text: Loved my experience at the hard rock. It was magical, right at time square broadway shows, everything you need. I would highly recommend anyone looking to be in NYC especially for your first time like myself.

title: AWESOME!
text: Awesome new hotel in the heart of Times Square! Great rooms, service, food and drinks. Enjoyed the live music at Sessions! Rooms are small but the price point is great for NYC. Will definitely stay here again in the near future! Absolutely visit the rooftop bar! Great vibes!

title: First class service
text: Warm welcome and staff eager to please every step of the way. Particularly good service in the bar and cafe/shop. Rooms were cleaned beautifully each day. In house entertainment was also of high quality if a little on the 'loud' side.

title: Hotel vraiment a fuir
text:
Je voyage souvent et j'en est fais des hotels dans ma vie, mais comme celui ci JAMAIS! 

Personnelles ne cherche pas a vous comprendre, si vous ne parler pas la langue elle peut vous laisse sur le carreaux. La conciergerie étais au 2 eme et non au RDC, ce qui est pas mal ennuyant pour la clientel. Dans les chambres vous avez une parti en carrelage glacial a tomber malade en sortant de la douche, meme en ayant mis le chauffage, il ne fournissent pas de chaussons. Mon copain étais malade dans la nuit j'ai demander a la reception si je pouvais descendre pour un coca cola ( a 13 dollars je precise ! )il mon dis attendez 6h du matin pour la boisson car tout est fermer. Il nous on prélever 2 fois sans faire expres du coup on se retrouve avec 1800 e découvert et la seule chose a dire c'est il faut attendre 20 jours. Bravo. pour un hotel de luxe c'est nul

title: Great place to stay!
text:
Staff was amazing and extremely accommodating.  Hotel was clean. 
 Loved the vibe and the music pumping through the hotel. Have to see the roof top bar! Location was great. Up the block from Time Square, near the subway and places to eat.  Never a dull moment.

title: Amazing time at Hard Rock Times Square
text:
My wife and I went on Presidents Day weekend for a three day visit to NYC. 
The hotel was amazing. Very clean, felt brand new. The rooms and bathrooms were spotless. The staff was extremely friendly. You can't best The location near all the Broadway shows and restaurants. 
We will definitely come back to the HR in Times Square

title: Outstanding
text: Best new hotel in NY, with an array of internal restaurants, shops, rooftop and live music entertainment experience. Culinary mouth watering, within all of the restaurants. Best beverage and food to choose from.

title: Plush new hotel in Times Square
text: Really enjoyed our stay at the Hard Rock. It's a brand new hotel so the condition is as you'd expect. All very clean and shiny! The variety of different bars/restaurants are great which have different stuff on each day which they text you about. The rooms and nice but small (it's NYC). Bed is super comfy! A few annoying issues, the TV didn't work every morning so we had to call for it to be fixed. The shower pressure was also pulsating out rather than a constant flow but nothing to ruin our stay. Overall it's a really nice hotel which really nice staff in a central location that won't break the bank.

title: Location, location, location
text: The Hard Rock Hotel was very clean and friendly.  Location is everything when it comes to NYC and you are in walking distance to all things you would like to partake in this vast city. Take my word for it, this is a MUST for your next adventure in NYC!!

title: New York Family Tripe
text:
We really liked the hotel, cleanliness and service.
About the service, they gave us a bigger room, and on departure we were given a free check-out until the evening and were given a complimentary lunch from the hotel. 
10 of 10

title: Style over substance
text: Positives - the hotel is modern, clean, funky and in a great location. Negatives - the walls in the rooms could be better sound-proofed and service in the bar and restaurant was sometimes slow. There really should be table service for drinks. Also, several nights we came back from dinner to find that Sessions had closed at 10am. The only option for a drink was the full-on RT40 bar. We couldn't go in there with our daughter and wouldn't have wanted to anyway. Finally, there should be far more vegetarian and vegan options on the menus. All in all, good but could be better.

title: Όλα τέλεια σε μια τέλεια πολη
text: Εξαιρετική καθαριότητα, πολύ καλή τοποθεσία, καταπληκτικό κρεβάτι, εξυπηρετικοτατο προσωπικό, όλα τέλεια. Ήταν προφανής η επιθυμία όλων να είναι οι πελάτες του ξενοδοχείου απόλυτα ικανοποιημένοι με όλα. Πολύ βολική η καφετιέρα στο δωμάτιο.

title: Great hotel if you want to stay in Times Square
text: It's brand new and super clean, plus the staff was lovely! I thought it would be loud but the rooms were actually very quiet. I know Times Square is not the most authentic NYC experience, but I found the location to be quite convenient.

title: Valentine’s Day
text: The staff was very friendly and helpful with all of our questions and requests. The room was clean and as expected with a comfortable mattress. My husband I enjoyed a very peaceful stay to celebrate Valentine’s Day and plan to return.

title: Great location and value in the middle of NYC!
text:
Beautifully and tastefully done hotel. I've been to other Hard Rock hotels, and I've not been impressed. In fact, I've stayed away. Of course, when going to NYC, hotels can be hit or miss - either old and outdated in a great location, or beautiful but exorbitantly priced in an "OK" location.

This hotel was the best of all - great location, recently updated with cool decor and fun colors, and very clean. Our room was a classic queen - 2 beds - and it was roomy enough for the two of us to have space and not be in the way of each other. The bathroom was small, but efficient and very clean, and well-maintained. Inside of the hotel, it was quiet too!
We would 100% book here again. Worth the value of the stay, for sure!

title: Perfection!
text: What a gorgeous hotel - and still smells brand new!  The hotel is in a perfect location with a stunning lobby as soon as you enter.  Every member of the staff was unbelievably pleasant, top level customer service!  Check in and check out, so effortless!  And now the rooms - nice size,  comfortable beds, well appointed bathroom and my favorite coffee in the room!  I also enjoyed a delicious dinner at the onsite restaurant, Sessions, super, friendly staff there as well!  I loved this hotel so much that I will be booking our team there in March for a board meeting...they will love it also!  Thank you, Hard Rock Hotel, for a perfect new spot to stay!

title: Good Hotel
text:
Good Hotel, in a perfect location near times square, near to the subway and easy access to ask for a taxi / uber, the amenities were good. the room was very clean and with modern instalations.
The only thing that didnt agree our expectations was RT60 the rooftop

title: Amazing!!
text:
Hotel is the best including location.The staff including Chester and Jairo were the best. Service was better than a 10. The room was so nice and comfortable that we stayed in one day to relax and enjoy the hotel. My family and I will always remember this trip. 
Thank you

title: Great spot to stay!!
text: We know NYC, and wanted a spot for a Girls Weekend!  This worked well with two queen beds and good location. The team was client focused. Clean! Would recommend to all who are coming in - check this hotel out!

title: Wow
text: The stay was great. Pleasant staff, clean rooms, everything was just right. I would highly recommend this hotel. If you are in the area for a broadway show such as us, it is right in the proximity and very easy to navigate around. The interior was spotless and new. It made our visit so much nicer coming back to a really comfortable place to rest after exploring about!

title: Hard Rock NYC Review
text: Hotel was exceptionally clean, staff are super friendly and helpful, rooms were furnished well and are brand new looking. My husband and I were upgraded into a room with a better view which was super awesome.

title: Stay Charged twice on my credit card
text:
The reception charged twice the amount of my stay on my credit credit card. On the first night, my credit card was charged USD 2’600 and it was approved. HRH said there was a pb on their side and wanted to charge again. I refused since it had been approved already. On the next night we came back to the hotel at 11:00 pm and our room was locked (our keys did not work). We went back to the reception and they said they had to have my credit card again and would just make an “authorization” on it. I did not have any choice but to accept (or would have no access to a bed for the night). The next morning I realized on my bank status that the amount of 2600 USD AND a second amount of 2500 USD had been charged on my credit card. Went to the manager: he told me they did not have the money, etc. Finally with the proof of my bank statement, realized the error. Nevertheless, it was too late for the bank to cancel the charge right away and I was left with an overcharge of 2500 for the next 7 days (time for the bank to process). Thus left me in distress in NYC. I had to get a bank transfer from a family member to cover my holiday costs in the meantime. 
I was forced to charge my credit card or would have been homeless > this is unacceptable from a hotel chain to treat a customer that way given that we were there for 7 nights !

title: My trip experience
text: Had a nice stay at the hard rock. The convince of food shopping stores and pharmacy’s was awesome. We stayed on the 25th floor and it was an awesome experience. Definitely going to stay here again in the future

title: OMG everyone was so amazing !!!!
text: Form the moment I walked in , omg amazing service! I live in Miami , and Ian in the mail pick shop , was so helpful and amazing, so sweet to me and my family definitely a super super 100 percent!!!! Love

title: Best place to stay at
text: The rooms are clean all the amenities and restaurant are top , front desk and customer rep have great actitud , the bed and bathroom are great will recommend to anyone to stay at this place, I will stay here next time I fly anywhere

title: This hotel “rocks”!
text: Lovely staff, clean everywhere. Bars are nice and allows for a laid back experience in the lobby or more club experience at the rooftop. Really enjoyed my stay here and will recommend to friends/colleagues in the future.

title: GREAT VIBE - Great Experience
text: Great Vibe!  The bar (Sessions) is set up like a lounge and had a fantastic latin band.  People were dancing and it was just a great setting for me to dine alone.  Food was also fabulous.    The staff is very friendly.  The rooms are a bit small but set up beautifully an have all the accomodations you could ask for.  Definitely the most omfortable bed/pillows/sheets I've ever eperienced and I travel quite a bit.  Don't love the location but I was able to go out to Starbucks at 5 am and felt very safe.  Great expereince for a business stay and plan on coming back with the Hubby.

title: Hard Rock Moment
text: Great hotel with a great VIBE.... The staff is excellent and the food along with the service was also excellent.  I would recommend everyone to stay at Hard Rock when you are in the city or any where there is a Hard Rock Hotel....

title: Not the greatest
text:
I've been undecided about leaving a review about our 6 night stay over Christmas as I wanted to give the hotel time to follow through with their offer of Unity points, over 4 weeks later the points promised have not been added to my account which sums up the hotel.
  Our welcome was warm and the hotel is beautiful, I booked a stay which included 2 continental breakfasts per night and welcome drinks, we received the breakfast vouchers but not the welcome drinks. We only used the breakfast vouchers on two mornings as on the first morning the service was abysmal and because of this we didn't make dinner reservations as was our plan and booked all our evening meals off property. 
  Housekeeping was the one thing at this hotel which was exceptional, Brenda went above and beyond everyday. I requested some extra towels and coffee's on Christmas eve and left a note saying she didn't need to call on Christmas day, we went out for the day and returned to an absolutely spotless room! Every hotel needs a Brenda.
 Having stayed at Hard Rock Hotel in London this stay had a lot to compete with but unfortunately it just didn't deliver.

title: New and location!!
text: A new hotel very well located (Times Square) and with the quality of the Hard Rock Chain.  Very comfortable bed and pillows!!!  The only unpleasant thing is the price. We got an early check in which was wonderful!!!  The memorabilia is also sensational.

title: David & Miguel are AMAAZZING GREAT HOTEL TO STAY
text:
The staff is ABSOLUTELY AMAAZZING David & Miguel are super sweet they made me & my friend feel super valued. David took our bags out the car, opened our doors, got us a taxi, when we want to go to Brooklyn Miguel got us a car service and made sure we had a car serivice to get back. when leaving David had out bags neatly in our car. My friend only stays at top 5star hotels and she was very pleased and happy stay here
i recommend

title: Rock On Hard Rock
text:
We booked this hotel primarily for its location and ended up really enjoying ourselves.
Pre-check in and check in was excellent!  Brittani reached out ahead of time and I explained our request for an early check in, as we were going to a matinee and wanted to get settled beforehand.  Our request was accommodated and made to feel effortless, which was appreciated.  
We upgraded to a deluxe room.  Word of caution… the room is tiny.  Very tiny.  But extremely well thought out.  Nods to rock are everywhere but tastefully done.  Special shout out for the Tony Bennett and Lady Gaga print in our room as well as the guitar pick used to keep the bolt from hitting the wall.
Bed was comfy and the duvet was patterned in guitars!  Loved it all.
We tried Sessions for dinner one night and breakfast one morning.  Cannot say anything but excellent on both counts.  Service was friendly and professional and the food arrived hot.  All was tasty.  There could be a few more choices on the menu, but what was there was well presented and moreish.
Also, tried the continental breakfast on the Sunday morning through private dining.  Just lovely and quite a good value.
So, why 4 stars instead of 5?
We didn’t have hot water on the last morning of our stay.  We didn’t even have lukewarm water.  It was cold, which was a shame as I enjoyed standing under the rainfall shower for quite some time.
Also, the amenities fee is high at $45 per person, per day.  I knew it before I booked so there were no surprises but all we took advantage of were the 2 bottles of water per day and 1 cup of coffee each.
Lastly, the cable was a bit spotty and went out completely on Saturday night for a bit.
Overall, however, this hotel was just what we needed for a weekend of theatre going.  And we go to the theater a lot so we will definitely be back.
Last point - I’m not sure if this was planned or just by chance, but when we walked into our room they had the music turned to the show tunes station.  That won me over instantly.

title: Excellent  Hotel in the middle of  Times square
text: We had a wonderful stay at this hotel and plan on returning. its easy access to everything we wanted to do. the staff was excellent. having a rooftop bar and restaurant in the hotel to enjoy was also very convenient.

title: Hard Rock Rocks
text: The hotel is spotless. Everyone we dealt with was friendly and courteous. NYY Steakhouse is out of this world. The roof top bar RT60 is very well done with great views and fun bartenders. Sessions lounge on the second floor had great food and an open spacious feel.

title: An amazing hotel, very attentive and helpful staff too! Thank you very much for making our holiday amazing.
text: Really amazing hotel, it was my birthday and it was mine and my partners 10th anniversary. The hotel supplied us with drinks vouchers and a bottle of Prosecco. We had the best stay, the hotel was amazing as was the staff, the bar and breakfast.

title: The best experience

title: Maria Nelson

title: 5 Stars all the way!!!
text:

I didn't want to go to a cheap hotel so I decided to go here, this was perfect location downstairs 2 buildings down, is Little Italy where you can get food 24/7. Also, this hotel was just built recently, and tons of famous people have stayed there. the cleaning lady I had was the best, at first, I was hesitant to let anyone in my room, but she was super friendly and gave me all new towels and threw out all my trash for me I was so impressed the best part was she even spoke 2 languages perfectly (English and Mandarin). Another thing that I loved about this hotel is that multiple security officers monitor the cameras simultaneously and stand outside of the building and inside the building entrances 24/7 I felt like i was more protected than Fort Knox. 
When we landed at the hotel, we had a million things to do on our list, i wanted to go to museums, the empire state building times square, and the church, go shopping on 5th ave at Saks Fifth Avenue and all the famous places near by. This place was a blast, and all I can say is you will never want to leave.

Also, the view from my room was so beautiful both at morning and night!!!

title: Highly recommend this hotel. Presently surprised.
text:
From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm and friendly service from the staff. The room was spacious and beautifully decorated, with all the amenities I needed for a comfortable and relaxing stay. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and I slept soundly each night. The hotel's location was also perfect for exploring the city, with easy access to all the main attractions.

I also had a chance to dine at the hotel's restaurant, which offered delicious food and great service. The hotel's fitness center was well-equipped, and I was able to keep up with my workout routine during my stay.

Overall, my experience at the Hard Rock Hotel was exceptional. The staff went above and beyond to make my stay enjoyable, and I couldn't have asked for more. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a luxurious and comfortable stay in the city.

title: Great hotel
text: Amazing location and hotel. The staff was so helped and accommodating. Everything is brand new and pristine, right in the middle of the action. Valet was easy to navigate and quick, will definitely come back!

title: Loved it

title: Terrible Check In Experience
text: The front desk when we checked in was terrible. They didn't have our reservation which was booked through their own reservation team. They were rude and abrasive. And made my kids and I wait 2 hours while they sorted their own mistake out. I would never stay here again!

Throughout my stay, there was always a staff member near by to assist with a question or satisfy even the smallest need. Certainly, a hotel I'll be eager to return to- and next time have some fun in the great neighborhood of Times Square.

text: This was my wife’s 60th birthday treat. The Hotel was very clean and we could not fault the friendliness of the staff. Unfortunately 2 of the 3 nights were plagued with fire alarm faults which when on the 31st floor is very scary.

Beautiful Hotel I love the music they play in the elevators, love seeing all the different artists pictures all around the Hotel. It was really nice I enjoyed we will definitely be going back

text:

Have stayed at a few different hotels in NY and this is by far my favourite, great location, friendly staff, amazing roof terrace bar, lovely rooms. Cannot fault anything about this hotel!
