title: Impromptu trip with my husband
text:

title: Highly recommend
text: I stayed here for my sisters birthday and it was fantastic! They brought us cupcakes to our room and gave her a birthday cocktail at RT60 and had a great time ! The staff was so helpful and friendly I’m definitely going to return.

title: Clean, New Hotel in Times Square
text:
Very clean hotel in the perfect location if you are headed to Times Square (out the door) and Rockefeller center (a 5-minute walk). Valet parking is fairly easy. Pull up in front of the hotel (you may have to double park) and let a valet know you want the service. It is $65 a night for a regular-sized car or $75 for oversized. The hotel emails you ahead of your stay with the option to add on upgrades like the parking, but it only mentions the $75 price. The valet is run efficiently with friendly customer service. Call 45 minutes ahead on the day of your departure. 

This is a small hotel with small but clean rooms. The bathroom is cramped  with NO hooks. I couldn't hang my dress and had to instead come out to get it in a provided robe (inconvenient if traveling with kids). There wasn't even a hook for the bath towel when showering. The bathroom door is frosted glass with (for us) Lady Gaga on it. You can't really see through it as far as privacy but if someone uses the bathroom in the middle of the night, the bathroom light shines into the bedroom through the glass. The bathroom door does not have a lock and there is no vent/fan. Even for a shower. 

There is a SMALL closet area for hanging clothes (but some would need to be short to hang over the drawers and safe) and only 3 small drawers. The room also has a small fridge. The beds were definitely comfortable. The curtains and shades were great darkeners. We never heard our neighbors and we were told the hotel was at almost 100% capacity. Since the room was tight and we had our stuff everywhere (and only stayed 2 nights), we opted out of room service and only requested towels. 

The hotel offers some free options. My husband requested a Fender Telecaster ($200 credit card hold only), but there is no guarantee or pre-reservation. We came back to our room on day 2 to a different guitar that comes with a small amp that links to headphones).  It was fun for something different. 

I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends who wanted this location. Any staff we encountered were friendly. Hard Rock: add bathroom hooks.

title: Nicest staff
text: We had great experience at the Hotel, very well located and the food at the restaurant “Session” is delicious, they have great staff,  very professional and extremely kind. They will do everything to serve and make sure that you have great experience. We would like to say special thanks to Sandro, Pedro and Gabriel!!!!! They definitely contributed so our family had great memories😊

title: Great location right in Times Square. Close proximity to lots of attractions.
text: Great location. Staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Hotel was immaculate. Very clean and comfortable bedrooms. Great food in Sessions and NYY Steak and lovely cockyails in RT60. It was great to ha e so much choice within the hotel. Would highly recommend!

title: Nice hotel, sensitive staff
text:
The stay overall was positive, unfortunately there was a member of staff on the last day who appeared to be in a bad mood/oddly defensive.

My wife and I came downstairs to store our bags, a gentleman who I thought was staying at the hotel said good morning to me (my wife said hello and I nodded) I them spoke to a person at the desk to ask to stow my bags somewhere, the person who had said hello a moment ago said he had tried to help me but I ignored him which seems oddly defensive/borderline combative and was also incorrect as my wife had said hello to him before he walked off.

He would then not make eye contact whilst putting the bags in to storage, and his attitude was not what we expected or had seen from the rest of the stay the whole thing was quite odd and tainted an otherwise good stay.

I understand if the person was having a bad day but they could do with not taking this out on customers and being so sensitive about a perceived slight. I say perceived as my wife acknowledged him, clearly he didn't perceived that as proper acknowledgement for some reason .

Not the level of service I would expect from the hard rock.

Shkurte & Valbona

title: Stylish Hotel in great location.

Don't expect anything too grand in Times Square but there was only room to shuffle around the bed and nowhere to place the suitcase.

title: Gorgeous

The best part is that even if you don’t stay there the amenities Rock!

Shower curtain in a new hotel is a bit outdated. Front desk are excellent and resolved an issue we had with incorrect room service orders.

title: NYC/NYE
text:
We had a great time, and we love the hotel, staff was extremely nice, professional, and the hotel was much more than we expected!
And I highly recommend this to anybody who’s going to New York City & looking for a awesome hotel right in the middle of NYC/Times Square!

title: Clean Hotel
text: We loved the hotel and the cleanliness. My wife and I were upset that the front desk said he would send us a yoga set and it never came. My wife was waiting all night and it never came. Other then that we enjoyed our stay and the room service

title: Superb hotel
text: Staff super friendly. Although the room was a little small for a family of four, Rooms are exceptionally clean and modern. Excellent area for shopping and shows. One down side is the restaurant and room service were not kid friendly however the food was tasty. Valet was pricey but I would expect the prices given the area. This will be my new place when visiting Times Squre!

title: Rock star treatment
text: This hotel exceeded our expectations. The staff are rock stars!! Sarah in the RT60 rooftop bar was amazing and took the best care of us. She was on top of our orders and we loved conversing with her. Chester was our favorite doorman and he greeted us initially when we arrived. Every time we came/went out the front doors, his sweet voice (calling us by name EVERY TIME), beautiful smile and lively banter made us feel special and really added to our great experience.  I also must mention the entire breakfast staff at Sessions.  I cannot state enough how lovely they were and orders were delivered promptly and were delicious.  Coffee is fantastic here.  I looked forward to interacting with them every morning.  The hotel is beautiful, interesting and super clean.  Housekeeping did amazing job each day

title: Amazing place to stay!
text: I can’t say enough good things about this hotel. I never write reviews, but I had to for this hotel. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful. The room and bathroom was spacious, clean, and like-new. The location can’t be beat. We will definitely stay here again.

title: Amazing stay !
text: Very wonderful hotel with very good staff. Really effective especially for luggage. Thank you so much for everything and thank you for the special attention for my husband’s birthday. We will come back for sure !

title: 3 day holiday
text:

My only complaint was with not any areas to sit and drink coffee or pizza slices we bought at local pizza shop. we sat in 2nd floor lounge area and we were told we had to leave. It was very rude , we had taken food up to our room. One evening running late from a Broadway show , we called the roof top restaurant to make sure it was open. When we got
There 5 minutes before closing they didn’t let us in. I was surprised and again felt they could made an exception since we were guest at hotel. We had to search out a place to dine at other properties. 
But the hotel accommodations and staff were very clean , comfortable and staff was overall very nice and helpful.

title: Hard Rock Hotel New York
text: Great stay. We spent 3 days around Christmas and the hotel, service and everything was really nice. The service from the reception was particularly a highlight. We requested 2 rooms since travelling with family and they made sure that we had 2 rooms next to each other, which was great touch. The concierge service was also great and nothing was problem. The size of the room yes it a bit claustrophobic but nothing scary :). Location is perfect! 2 min walk to Times Square but not exactly there, so thats good. Plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. Overall great stay. Well done.

title: Nice hotel
text: The hotel is very nice, it is in center and easy to access all Time Square and Central Park activities. All staff is very nice and helpful. And the NYY restaurant is amazing, you need to try it and you will love it

title: Lovely hotel, but overall disappointed
text: Stayed December 2022 for Christmas , door staff were excellent, Check in was fast , the hotel was  spotless as expected ,  housekeeping was faultless, it looks like  five-star hotel Should look,  for me that’s where the five star ratings ends there is a lack of seating in the hotel unless you book a table in the restaurant which we did Christmas morning. We arrived on time, but the table was not set when the food arrived. It was cold and service was very slow.on checking in I was asked to provide a card to put on file which $600 was put on hold a couple of days later an additional $880 was also assigned to that card without my authorisation, when  questioned why no explanation could be given I was told by the management that it cannot be refunded until I check out. I have now been back in the UK 9 days and the money has still not been refunded nearly a total of £1300. I have emailed hard rock management and hard rock New York with no reply from either .

title: Anniversary Trip
text:
We been to NYC multiple times and we always stay in Time Square for proximity reasons. This time we chose Hard Rock as its relatively newer. We are extremely happy. Not just cause its new and close to broadway shows but also the service is top notch. Even before check in they asked us if we need anything and I mentioned we are here for our wedding anniversary. They went over and beyond and surprise us with bottle of champagne and also filled our rooms with rose petals and had my personalized message on the pillow case. There’s 24 hour convenient store downstairs as well good pizza place. So you cant go wrong with this one. We will come back again with our kids. 

Special Mention to their front desk Brittany Henderson and Ryan from their reservations both did awesome job making our trip more memorable.

title: Do not recommend
text: We booked through travelocity and was paid in full. I was charged twice. We were told that we need to call valet in advance to get our car. We waited 2.5 hours , the valet people were unable to tell where our car is. The car was missing. I have a LoJack on my car and found my car near Hells Kitchen. Once I told where my car is , I have it in 20 minutes. I will not trust my belonging with HARD ROCK any more. Mr. O'Neil who is valet manager assured me that they will not charge me for valet, despite that. I am charged twice for my room and valet :(

title: NYC visit
text: Great place and awesome location. Friendly staff and very clean comfortable beds. Staff was great in assisting us on our stay. Was greeted by smiling staff upon entering and leaving the hotel to tour the city.  Very quiet. Beautiful hotel

title: Christmas at the Hard Rock
text: Originally had this booked through Expedia but checked with Hard Rock directly and got an upgrade for $200 less!  Very nice and clean hotel all decked out for the holiday.   Nice view of Times Square from our room.   We had a super early flight in and they were able to check us in way before our scheduled check-in.  Nicely updated rooms but small from what I'm accustomed to.  Average for New York, I'm sure.  Hotel was perfectly located to so many attractions!  We would definitely stay here again!

title: Great New NY Hotel
text: The rooms were wonderful, everything is new and very clean.  The staff was amazing.  From the moment we were dropped off to when we left, we felt very taken care of.  The location is amazing, you're half a block from Times Square and two blocks from Rockefeller Center.  But there were never any noise issues.

title: Still Dazzled!
text:
My husband and I spent the night before Christmas Eve at the Hard Rock and we can say without hesitation that it was one of the most unexpectedly positive hotel experiences we have had in recent memory.
We were in Manhattan to see a matinee with friends, who were able to check in a bit before us. We were assured by Brittany (“Beyoncé”) that our room would be ready after the play and indeed it was. She is an absolute treasure—professional, welcoming and funny. When we went back to the front desk to pick up our keycards, we were treated with the same warmth and courtesy by her colleague (I am almost positive his name is Jay and that his favorite performer is J. Cole.)
Our room was ergonomically ingenious and was perfect for our needs. It was immaculately clean and the bed and its furnishings very comfortable.
It was a special thrill to turn on the bathroom lights, slide the door shut and see a life-size Bruce Springsteen in our room.
The hotel’s public areas were well-kept and staffed by other pleasant and accommodating personnel. A shout-out to Raul, who charmed us at breakfast and the evening before. The cocktails at both the downstairs bars and the rooftop bar were outstanding. The complimentary hot chocolate on offer was the best I have ever had—and a real blessing on a 10°F day.
We had dinner at the NYY restaurant attached to the hotel and it, too, exceeded our expectations. A $46 prix fixe menu blew us away for its quality and value. Service was wonderful. Breakfast the following morning was also pretty darn good. Although our omelettes were delivered incorrectly, they were served with charm.
I am a frugal retired English teacher who would not ordinarily splash out on a hotel like this—our friend who works in midtown made the reservations—but it was a wonderful experience and my husband and I are very glad we stayed at the Hard Rock.

title: Rock Shop
text:
I stopped into the Rock Shop for some last minute gifts and was greeted by hot coco and a DJ! It was a fun experience and everyone seemed to enjoy themselves. I was assisted by Ian who help me nor only with recommendations & with sizes, but with a ton of paper towels ( I spilled my water bottle inside my carry bag)  he also refilled my bottle for me before I left. 
Everyone was friendly and helpful. It was great to see such a cheerful holiday spirit

title: Terrible customer service
text:
I visited the Hard Rock hotel back in Oct 2022. Generally the experience wasn't too bad however on check out I was told everything was fine and no additional charge etc and received no bill after everything had been paid for upfront.

Upon returning home I found my credit card had been charged an additional £236.67, I have made SEVERAL efforts to find out what this charge was for. I have called and was told i would get a call back and didn't, emailed several times with no reply, even tried the contact form on the website and social media and received no reply.

I have no idea what this charge is for and they have made no effort to reply to me. I would avoid this hotel if you don't want a surprise bill! 

They've left me no choice but to leave a negative review now as I have exhausted all other options.

title: Amazing
text: Was a wonderful experience close the year in this hotel and celebrated my Birthday . The food, people very kind. I view in my room , clean room and smell good. Each room knock the door and received a bad with the supply to celebrated the New Years

title: Wonderful experience
text: Great staff! Clean rooms! Wonderful restaurants! The whole vibe was fun. The hotel is beautiful. The location is near the action of the city. The room was tranquil, and accommodations were top-tier. I would definitely recommend.

title: Fab stay for NYE
text: Stayed here in the run up to New Years Eve. Fabulous hotel in prime location with friendly, helpful staff. Great restaurants/bars and shop. Highly recommended and will stay here again if I return to New York in the future.

title: Fantastic Hotel!
text: Fantastic hotel that is beautifully appointed, has wonderful employees and is located very close to Times Square. When we travel to New York City, again, we know where we will stay. It will be at Hard Rock Hotel.

title: New York's Best New Hotel
text: I had a fantastic time at Manhattan's Hard Rock Hotel. This hotel has very spacious rooms and restaurants for being in New York. The staff was extremely friendly, particularly the restaurant staff at Sessions and the hostess ladies at RT60. The hotel is modern, with beautiful design touches that give it a luxurious feel.

title: Parfait!
text:
Nous avons séjourné dans cet hôtel (ainsi que le Riu plaza Manhattan et archer hôtel) pour les fêtes de fin d’année et c’est le Hard Rock qui s’est détaché très nettement des 2 autres.
Emplacement parfait, le décor de l’hôtel est magnifique, la chambre est calme et spacieuse, et la literie est très confortable.
Seul point négatif : une demande faite par mail avant notre arrivée qui a été rajoutée à notre réservation mais cela n’a pas été respecté. Le problème a néanmoins été résolu en 2 minutes après une réclamation à la réception.

title: Good times Square hotel
text: Location is unbeatable. Brand new so every thing has yet to fall in place. Good room service. Rooms are nyc size. Upstairs bar is great. No major complaints yet. Remember it is times Square home of Sodom and Gomorrah and all the weed that goes with it and that nyc is for the young.

title: Hôtel idéal
text: Très bon emplacement, très bel hôtel. Décoration originale. Chambres confortables, spacieuses et bien insonorisées.Personnel agréable. Magnifique vue sur NY du Rooftop. Nous recommandons fortement cet hôtel.

title: New Hard Rock Cafe Constant Grinds
text:
We visited the Hard Rock Cafe Constant Grinds (coffee shop) just before new years. We needed coffee, family-friendly snack, and a place to use the restroom. 

We used the very clean restroom up the beautifully decorated grand staircase on the really lovely second floor. 

Then, with friendly staff including Mark, the Constant Grind had great coffee and fantastic in-house made pastries (complete with a seasonal gingerbread house their pastry chef made, several flavors of macarons, beautiful pastries, and giant cookies). There was a good amount of merchandise in the shop so only a few seats, but they were cozy and offered a pleasant view of the street while we had our snacks. It might be better with a few more seats and merchandise offered elsewhere or moved to the side more.

Stepping away from the madness of Rockefeller center and Times Square, we found the Hard Rock Cafe Constant Grind a welcomed caffeinated stop.

title: Convenient Broadway location
text:
So easy to walk to all the shows and places to eat. Rock Center was close and Macy’s wasn’t a bad walk. Nice and quiet. 
The Bell Captains were very friendly and helpful. Ate at NYY, owned by the Yankee players. Pretty cool.

title: Lots rocks but not all
text: Amazing food, room and coffee shop but service at Sessions and elevator wait times leave a lot to be desired. The theming of the hotel is really cool and being there at Christmas was awesome with all the decorations

title: Not worth the price
text: During booking online, the room I selected (platinum suite) said that it had a separate bedroom and living space. The package I selected (Press Play on your Holiday) also guaranteed early check-in. When we checked in at 1, our room was not ready. When it finally was ready, we did not have a separate bedroom and living space. While the front desk staff apologized and tried to accommodate a switch to a room that did have the promised separate bedroom and living space, there were none available on our first night. This was a major issue for us, as we had specifically selected the Hard Rock NYC for this feature, since it was a special birthday trip for me, but we were bringing our teenage daughter. We needed the privacy separation, and we paid almost 3 thousand dollars for 2 nights for a room that was supposed to have this. We were able to switch rooms on the second night, but that brought with it a whole new set of problems. We were told our bags would be moved from our old room to our new room while we were out sightseeing. When we got back around 4pm, the new room was ready, but our bags were not there. We called down and waited 2 hours for our bags, at which point I had to call again, as we were going to be late for our broadway show. My husband even went day to the front desk to see if he could get the bags himself. We ended up having to attend the broadway show in our sightseeing clothes, rather than the outfits in our luggage specifically for the show. I was extremely disappointed in the overall experience. We have stayed at the Hard Rock in Orlando and the service was excellent. I understand it is a new hotel that is still working out kinks, but for the amount of money I spent on an upgraded room package, I wish we had just stayed at a Hilton for a quarter of the price as we initially planned.

title: Everything was just perfect
text:
The rooms are very comfortable, very clean.
The location of the hotel is also just perfect in the middle of time square
The staff was very friendly also
We enjoyed every minute at the hotel.
The bar was also very nice

title: Hard Rock Hotel New York
text:
Helpful and knowledgable staff, central location, clean rooms, excellent amenities! We enjoyed our 6 day stay thoroughly.  Live music in Sessions was quite enjoyable. A variety of food options available within and  close to the hotel.
The hotel is with in walking distance of key subway routes and a number of tourist attractions. Would recommend prepaid transportation to and from the airports as finding taxis in this area is quite difficult.

title: Horrible Experience
text:
Stayed in this hotel during marathon weekend since I wanted to be close to the finish line.  The night before the race, the fire alarm went off at 1AM and rang off and on for over an hour.  They kept coming on the loudspeaker telling us that it was a false alarm and to not worry about it, but it still kept ringing for over an hour.

We called down to the desk twice and begged them to make it stop and they did absolutely nothing for us and couldn't turn it off. 4 months of training down the drain because of incompetent hotel staff that can't turn off an alarm.  The hotel did nothing to apologize and did not give a crap that they caused us such distress for the biggest day of my running career. 

Otherwise, the rooms are drab and small, the service in the bar / restaurant is horrible and the food is terrible.  Do not stay here if you value your sleep and expect to be treated well.

title: Perfect Location - Excellent Hotel
text: I just spent a long weekend in New York and had the BEST experience at Hard Rock Hotel NY. The location was perfect for exploring. We were within a few blocks of everything we wanted to see - Times Square, Bryant Park, Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall and more! Our dinner at NYY (the steakhouse on property) was delicious, and we LOVED the rooftop bar with an outdoor deck overlooking Times Square. The staff was amazing - nice, attentive, and helpful. We will be sure to return on our next visit to New York.

title: Lovely hotel
text: Nice hotel with new feel. Room was small and felt cramped for 2 people with 1 suitcase and 1 backpack. The designer missed the mark by not installing towel bars in the restroom. There is no place to hang your towel in or out of the shower. I guess you could hang them on the hooks on the wall, but we used that for robes/after shower clothes.

title: Awesome experience
text:
Great location
Hotel was clean with great customer service. Truly enjoyed our time at the Hard Rock. Will def stay again. The views from our room where beautiful.  Ate at the steak NYY and enjoyed our meal. Christmas season at Hard Rock Hotel was truly amazing.

title: The high price doesn’t reflect the service
text: Staff are false unhelpful fake and are purely out to abstract has much money out of you has possible . Was charged 109 dollars for 1 30 dollar breakfast , then treated like an alien when pointed this out . Asked for late check out and was told to ask on the day at like the 11th hour , how can anyone plan with this information. Hotel had no atmosphere was unfriendly and completely out to rob you . The down stairs lobby is freezing and lifeless . The reception on 2nd floor is adjoined by the open plan restaurant totally weird . There are better places to stay for less cost .

title: Idéal pour les familles
text:
Idéalement placé, chambres très bien insonorisées. Nous avions une double queen pour 5 nuits avec nos 2 enfants.
Décoration très sympa, propreté parfaite. 
Machine à café et petit frigidaire dans la chambre ( + coin repas) bien pratique pour déjeuner le matin. 
Le personnel est gentil et réactif. 
Seul bémol, le wifi un peu lent dans les chambres.
Nous y retournerons volontiers.

title: Exceptional hotel
text: This hotel was fabulous location amazing. Rooms gorgeous with all you require.Food Devine and the cocktails are amazing. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. To ALL the staff thank you for making our stay exceptional happy holiday to you all at Hard Rock Hotel xx

title: Our stay at Hard Rock in Times Square New York
text:
Absolutely loved this hotel . Travelled with two teens 17 and 14 and they wanted to be in the middle of it all. We were  absolutely in the middle of everything ! However we also had the best nights sleep with comfortable beds and the rooms despite the location were quiet as ! The black out blinds helped also.
We had a city view on to Times Square, which the kids loved.
The rooms are so modern and so so clean. 
They are cleaned each day to perfection by the cleaning staff.
The staff are so friendly on front desk, level 2 bar and restaurant and also concierge. Concierge made our journey home stress free by organising our trip back to JFK.
Staff do everything to help you but if you don’t want anything they leave you to enjoy your time and don’t impose on you.
The breakfast on second floor is definitely worth having . 
I also HAVE to mention the NYY restaurant next door we had THE best meal in here in New York. I’m not kidding! The steak was top notch and so was the service .  Even if you don’t stay at this hotel you must visit this restaurant.
I would 100% stay here again. I have used the hard rock brand before and personally think you can not go wrong. 
Thank you for making our stay a delight!

title: Christmas time stay
text: The hotel is on a very congested street, but a good location for Radio City Music Hall and theaters are nearby. The hotel restaurant is excellent. The Rock Shop has excellent coffee and pastries for on the go or snacking. Just be aware that New York City is very very congested at this time of year. Would recommend an UBER account, taxies are not readily available.

title: New York vacation stay
text: We stayed at Hard Rock and found it to be flawless. I can’t fault any aspect from the friendliness of the staff to the quality of the rooms . We stayed on the 28th floor - the room was peaceful but so clean and so so comfortable. We had the best meal of our stay here also at the NYY steakhouse. We are quite discerning with our food and we visited Gallaghers steakhouse also during our trip. The food at NYY however beat all out experiences hands down. The restaurant was quiet but the food was top drawer. We loved staying here so much and thanks Hard Rock for making our experience so comfortable!

title: Amazing hotel with the friendliest staff!!!
text: My wife & I travelled from Ireland with our 4 kids. We all LOVED the hotel. The staff were so kind & welcoming. The hotel lobby is so gorgeous & all the memorabilia is amazing! The beds were super comfy, we all slept really well. The location is so handy for sightseeing things like Time Sq & The Rockerfeller Center.

title: Enjoyable holiday stay.
text: Spent a few days in NYC with family shopping and enjoying all the holidays have to offer in the city.  The Hard Rock is a perfect midtown location and a short walk to the theater district, 5th Avenue Shopping, and the lights of Rockefeller Center.  The hotel is new and modern which provided an enjoyable stay.  While small, the rooms on on par with most NYC hotels in regards to size.  Our room also had two queen beds which is hard to find in the City.   Maid service was wonderful and efficient and all staff we came into contact with were friendly and pleasant.  Even though the hotel seemed to be at capacity, we never heard noise from the hallway or other rooms.  My only complaint is that taxis weren’t easy to get in front of the hotel, and many times there was no doorman to be found to help hail a cab which has never been a problem at other hotels in the area.   The hotel did set up car service for our return trip to LaGuardia which was much appreciated. We will be back.

title: Xmas in NY
text: The hotel is in a great location. Close to Times Square and theatre district. The beds are so comfortable and room has a bit of a strange layout with entry into bathroom area from door;  compact and adequate. Staff were friendly.

title: Money Hungry Hotel - Double Dipping!!!!
text: I hate do do this, as I am not one to complain. But without being able to get in touch with someone I have no choice……..This hotels customer service and management is garbage and nonexistent. Try calling to get in touch with someone is nearly impossible. I was to stay on business back on 9/9/2022, I was forced to cancel my Stay 24 hours prior to arrival for unexpected circumstances. I did end up making my way to nyc and tried to call The hotel to rebook my reservation. At that point I was told that the hote was SOLD OUT, and I could not rebook. So not only did they charge me for one night cancellation fee, but also sold out the hotel. Sounds like double dipping to me……money Hungry hotel in the heart of NYC. Beware!!!!!

title: Avoid.
text: Very small rooms. No kettle to boil water, no tea provided. Fridge not cold. No exhaust fan in bathroom. Poorly built, drafty, doors slam and wake you up. Marijuana odors constantly coming in from hallway. Overpriced and underserviced. Staff disinterested and unhelpful. Bed was comfortable and location great, but there are much better options out there. For what they are charging, they can do much better.

title: Excellent Stay At The Hard Rock Hotel In Midtown NYC
text: All the services are 5 star. We dined at the Sessions and RT60 roof top bar. Food and services were outstanding. Great cocktails and food at both bars. We have to shout out to Santiago at the RT60 for making sure we were treated like rock stars. We dined there daily and rocked out to live DJ music at night. We tried several tapa's during our stay, and not a single one was disappointing. The chief who runs these kitchens has to be one of the best in New York City. Everything was so good, I really wanted to just lick my plate with every single meal! You will love the friendly people and energy of this place. We also enjoyed excellent service, coffee, and pastries at the Constant Grind coffee shop. Our 16 floor room was super quiet, clean and comfortable, with a very modern bathroom. Bottom line, if you want to stay at a clean, quiet, modern, well-managed hotel in midtown Manhattan, then the Hard Rock Hotel is the place for you. We will be back!

title: Holiday Vacation
text: Immaculate rooms, bars, restaurants and common areas. First class customer service. Perfect location in Times Square yet close proximity to 5th Avenue. We traveled with our teenagers. Family-friendly hotel. Common bathrooms are gender neutral. Stalls are enclosed with locks. This was a surprise but we adjusted with no issues. See you next winter holiday!

title: Holiday Season Get away!
text: Outstanding location, great staff and atmosphere.  Walking distance to all Time Square attractions and Rockefeller Center area. Great shopping, and just a lot of fun!  Loved the get away from everyday grind.

title: Amazing location, Friendly Staff, Clean and Stylish Rooms! Would Stay Again!
text: I stayed at the Hard Rock Hotel for 3 nights. From the moment you pull up staff are friendly and kindly direct and assist you. Our bags were immediately loaded from our car and delivered to our room. When we walked into the hotel it was breathtaking. Every detail was perfectly curated: the music, the Christmas decor, the museum like displays of clothing worn on stage by performers such as Beyonce and Jay-Z. The room contained two queen beds and was a great size with a view of Time Square out of our window. The concierge recommended a great Christmas bar and made our reservation for us. I would recommend this hotel to any of my friends and family. The service, design, cleanliness, and proximity to Time Square, Broadway and the subway is unbeatable.

title: Perfect
text: This was a beautiful hotel. We stayed only one night during the Holiday season and will definitely be back.   Located in the middle of everything.  The staff was very nice and helpful.  The hotel was clean and beautifully decorated for the Holidays.

title: Best in NY
text: I can't say enough about the staff at the Hard Rock. Every single contact made including housekeeping did a great job. We visited the NYY Steakhouse, Sessions and RT 60. All were worth it. A great central location to everything you may want to walk to.

title: 1st Trip to New York
text: Our first time in New York…. We were in New York for 4 days ….  Mark at gift shop/ cofffee kiosk was amazing and very helpful… Very beautiful hotel and the macaroons are delicious … a hidden gem !!! Thanks again Mark !

title: Girls trip to the BIG APPLE 🍎
text:
Staff friendly and caring 

Restaurant staff and management were outstanding.
Great drinks!  Food yum!
However, it would be great to have a charcuterie board to share after a long day of shopping and shows my cuckoos, my baby so cute

title: Highly Recommended
text: This was our first time in New York City and the location of this hotel is perfect. We were close enough to walk to many attractions, and the staff was very helpful whenever we needed directions or assistance. We'll definitely be back!

title: December 2922
text: Fantastic location, welcoming friendly staff and immaculate in all areas. We travelled as a family of four adults the room was a little on the small side however we were not disappointed as the standards were so high in both cleanliness and service

title: excelente
text: Todo perfecto y por encima de la expectativas, limpieza y amabilidad son una contaste, la ubicacion perfecta. Lo disfrutamos a pleno con toda mi familia, nos sentimos muy cuidados por la seguridad del hotel, ellos siempre atentos y profecionales

title: Balthazar Cafe Wonderfulness
text: Gabriel and Linett are the best servers at the cafe ever! Kind and concise service — they really are the best baristas around. Gabriel even did a little trick for me — sweetest ever. Loved the cappuccino and the top notch pastries

title: Best place to be, I’m going back in a month for my birthday
text: This hotel is absolutely a must visit. I spent 4 days there and to be absolutely honest I didn’t want to leave. My friend and I were at Sessions everyday, I highly recommend it. Their staff literally made my stay so enjoyable,specially Syed, Iman, Hakima and Carlos. They made me feel at home right the way. Amazing welcoming, service, drinks and entertainment. I just booked my January 2023 trip back there and I can’t wait to see them. They are the sweetest! I wouldn’t stay anywhere else in the city. Location is perfect, the staff is amazing! Defiantly  a FUN home away from home!

title: Its like you have entered an Oasis after leaving Times Square
text: Hard rock Times Square has a great location.   Located just between Times Square and Rockefeller Center.   Close to a lot but not as noisy and busy.   Very beautiful inside. Hip and fun.   Also. NIce bathrooms.

title: Holiday Midtown Fun
text: We loved staying at the HRH in Times Square. It was a perfect jumping off point for holiday activities in midtown--- you're within walking distance of Times Square, the tree at Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall, Bryant Park and so on. The rooms are a great size for midtown. We booked a suite---and appreciated the couch and sitting area, also. We were celebrating our wedding anniversary and there was a bottle of champagne waiting for us when we arrived...and the monogrammed pillowcases were an unexpected flourish. We had a blast. Nice job, HRH. We will be back.

title: A fantastic hotel and a fantastic service
text: This is a hotel we would certainly recommend booking. Thanks to Raul who took good care of us throughout our stay with lots of good information about New York and things worth seeing and doing. The beds, the room, the food, the bar at the top, the atmosphere and a lovely Christmas tree I will never forget.

title: Best New York stay
text: Wow this place is absolutely amazing !!! From the moment we checked in I was helped by Tony and I think by far one of the best check in experience ever the whole hotel is amazing the entrance the rooms are  spacious considering it is New York but it does not stop there Tony had continued to recommend places for me and my family to try out after our first night here 100% will come back.

title: Stain at hard rock I buy tea from mark in rockshop..
text:
Stain at hard rock I buy tea 
from mark in rockshop.. he is very helpful and nice person!)) I recommend this place.. I wish more workers like Mark!)) …..))))…. Thanks ………………………….why I need write so long reviews..?))))…….

title: We enjoyed every second
text: A christmas trip we never will forget. The Hard Rock Hotel was perfect. We loved the atmophere and the service (Raul in Sessions in special). Hich quality rooms and good food in all resturants. We hope to be back som time

title: Wonderful Hotel in NYC
text: Hard Rock Hotel was immaculate.  Rooms were sizeable and very comfortable.  Staff was very helpful and friendly.  Would give it a higher rating, if I could.  Christmas decorations were beautiful.  Perfect hotel for a Christmas trip.  There was nothing to complain about.  Staff was always prompt, whenever we had a request.

title: Good place
text:
Great location and friendly staff.
Easy to get around NYC from this location.  Comfortable room with complimentary coffee.  Only issue, 1st night stay was great but on the 2nd night there was a screaming baby which made it difficult to get any sleep.

title: Brilliant hotel
text: Excellent venue and friendly polite and helpful team. Room service was efficient. Quality of food was very good. Love the atmosphere created by acknowledging the rock stars. I recommend this to couples or anyone who wants a lovely quality hotel in NYC near to Time Square, Rockefeller Centre, Show theater  and shopping areas.

title: Great two night stay
text: Outstanding stay. From the beautiful lobby, the lighting, the stairs, to the room itself. We only stayed for two nights, but everything was perfect. Our fav part was the balcony, where we enjoyed our drinks over Midtown. There was also a poet on the second floor who wrote a great poem for my husband #futurelyrics. Oh, and the tree! Great stay, especially if you're into music like we were.

title: NY back again
text:
Back in NY for christmas time every year. 
New experience in this hotel. Very nice stay , very good rooms but for there’s no minibar inside rooms. Check in should be improved expecting more information and not only the verification of reservation! Super position and room staff.

title: Great place
text: Lovely place. The staff is extremely helpful and friendly. It is close to everything. The hotel is clean. The bar on the roof top was nice. The restaurant at the hotel was lovely as well. Overall great experience.

title: Fantastic Hotel!
text: Love this hotel! Great decor, top quality room and super clean, valet service was great, roof top bar was awesome, and staff was fantastic, especially Chester who went above and beyond to coordinate a car service and help us get flowers and a large cake down a busy street to get us to the SUV allowing us to get to an engagement party we were throwing on time. Highly recommend this hotel!

title: Wouldn’t Go Back
text: Rooms are tiny with a terrible lay out. Hotel is completely understaffed so the wait for everything is ridiculous. We got drinks at the restaurant 15 minutes AFTER the food arrived which was terrible and tasteless. We checked out a day early and waited over two hours to get our car from Valet before my husband walked down to the Valet garage and got our car himself. They blamed holiday traffic but he was back within 10 minutes with our car. This trip and this hotel was an epic fail. What a waste of $1500 on a two night stay. We left after one night.

title: Shopping in the Rock Shop
text: Mark in the rock shop was great. He helped me find all the pins that I wanted and was fun and friendly the whole time. I would definitely recommend to anyone going there to ask for Mark. Hope to see you guys again soon.

title: Very nice hotel with a good vibe
text: The Hard Rock has a good vibe throughout the hotel with good music throughout, rock music memorabilia etc. The staff was always friendly and helpful and the room very nice. RT60, the rooftop bar has a great atmosphere and great outdoor terraces weather permitting.

title: Great hotel with a wonderful staff.
text:
A gem of a hotel and a total surprise. Was not expecting such an attentive staff and well appointed rooms. Would stay again without reservation.  Highly recommend for anyone looking for a location in midtown, close to theatre. 
A

title: Best hotel in NYC!
text: I stayed here for a few days on a business trip and I cannot wait to go back. This hotel is absolutely gorgeous, the rooms are well appointed and have the most luxurious showers ever. The bar is a total vibe, and the coffee bar has the best baristas. Got my custom coffee order right every time! All the staff are friendly, helpful and welcoming. This hotel is giving LUXURY all the way, and trust me - I’m hard to please. Before finding this property I was becoming dissolutioned by how shabby, expensive, and unimpressive so many NYC hotels can be. I’ll definitely be back to Hard Rock. This is my new go to.

title: Our Christmas Getaway to NYC
text: We had a wonderful stay at the Hard Rock Cafe. From the time we arrived at the hotel to the time we left everyone was so helpful. I highly recommend staying at the Hard Rock we will definitely stay at the Hard Rock again. The location of the Hard Rock is perfect, very central to everything. You are definitely able to do a lot because of the location by just walking. The hotel was very clean and decorated beautiful for the Holidays.

title: Ok stay
text:
This hotel is ok. Excellent location and with it being so new it is still nice and clean. Surprised by all the positive reviews on the service. We stayed for 4 days and I don’t think the doormen spoke to us once. Not overly bothered by it but it was noticeable. 

I think this hotel caters more for families rather than couples. A lot of pretty bright lights but not a great deal of substance for the price behind it. $45 / night residence fee on top of the bill was extremely bizarre and still unsure what it’s for and how they get away with not advertising it. I read in another review that it’s for use of the coffee machine (of which we had none), use of the gym (of which we never even saw) and access to the Wi-Fi (which in any other hotel in the world would be included in the stay!?) 

Rooms are small but the bed was really comfy. Shower was lovely. RT60 was alright but nothing special. I can’t comment on the food as when I ordered a club sandwich they couldn’t do it as they had run out of chicken…… at 4pm!

I think if the hotel was classed as a 4 star hotel (which in my opinion it is) and priced accordingly I’d be giving it a much better review.

title: EXCELLENT STAY
text: Our stay at the Hard Rock Hotel NYC was AMAZING! The staff were all very friendly, knowledgeable, and accommodating. The hotel is beautiful and was clean. Our rooms were clean and comfortable. Only suggestion for improvement that I would make is that we have to call star service to request ice and it takes about 20 minutes or so to come and once they didn't show up. HUGE KUDOS to one of the bellmen, David, for running all the way down the street to 6th Ave and jumping into traffic with me when one of our kids called and said her car was dropping her off all the way down there. He got her and her luggage out of the car safely and carried it all the way back down to the hotel for us. We will definitely stay here again!!

title: Amazing
text:
What a hotel! We travelled from the UK and stayed here early December 2022 for 4 nights, had 2 kind rooms one on floor 9 and one on floor 10. 
J.C checked us in - he was efficient, attentive, welcoming and even provided us with complimentary drinks tickets for the NYY Steak House - although we never got to use them!  There was also a staff member who I believe was from the luggage / concierge department whose name I didn’t get but his favourite artist was 2Pac who we met a few times in the lift, again talkative, welcoming and helpful. Although, every staff member we came across was just as friendly - not something you often get in international hotels! 
The hotel it self is gorgeous, stylish, but most of all spotless! Our room was no different and house keeping did a basic sweep through daily which we were very appreciative of. The amenities provided in the rooms were just what we needed and the rooms were a very good size for a city hotel. Beautifully decorated for the Christmas festivities!
We spent an evening in RT60 - great vibe, again great staff, and we had fun, although when we arrived it was full of middle aged very drunk people dancing and falling over each other and others, this was quickly dealt with by security. The DJ was fantastic and read the room well, the bar tenders were attentive - and drinks were great. Prices were as expected in a NYC rooftop bar.
We couldn’t fit NYY steak house into our trip really. We did try to pop in at 10pm for a drink in the week but was turned away because they were just closing, which was fine, but the main hotel bar was also closing, both seemed quiet so it was understandable, so we went out elsewhere for a drink.
The coffee shop sells amazing pastries!!

Overall a 10/10 for service, the hotel itself and the general experience. We will definitely be back! Thank you!

title: Superb location & facilities with wonderful staff
text: Stay at this hotel for the location, fabulous public areas and great rooms together with wonderful staff! We selected the hotel based on its location and previous reviews. It lived up to all that had been written. The staff were great and in particular the concierge team were incredibly helpful and really contributed to making our visit a memorable one. High standards have been set and based on the last three days we are happy to recommend😁

title: Excellent hotel and great location
text: The hotel is modern, elegant and brand new. The entire hotel including the foyers are pop/rock themed, showcasing stars’ costumes, guitars, etc. everywhere which is very fun. The staff is super nice and very helpful—many hotels could learn from them. Check in and check out was super quick. The room was on the smaller side but the bathroom was relatively spacious and the bed was huge and comfortable. There’s a small fridge and a coffee machine in the room, as well as a big TV. A complementary yoga mat is available for guests while staying there which I found VERY useful as I do yoga every day. The location is excellent as literally everything that’s worth visiting in the midtown area is within walking distance, including tons of restaurants and bars. There are restaurants as well as rooftop within the hotel. We also received a complimentary small bottle of wine as well as a little fruit plate, which was a very thoughtful and lovely gesture. Would go back and highly recommend.

title: Wonderful hotel
text: We recently spent a week at this hotel and weren’t disappointed in any way from arriving to departing. The staff were all polite, friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean, comfortable and well appointed. We would highly recommend this hotel and would definitely return in the future.

title: A top notch experience!
text: The Hard Rock was amazing, a great experience and so central to NYC attractions and Time Square! The staff were so friendly and helped us with whatever we needed. NYY Steak downstairs had outstanding food, probably one of the nicest steaks I’ve ever tasted and the cocktails were delicious!!! We had breakfast in Sessions, the French toast and Bagels were gorgeous! All in all a faultless experience, thank you to the Hard Rock, we’ll definitely be back!

title: Weekend in NYC
text: The Hard Rock Hotel was a perfect location to stay during the holidays. Radio City Music Hall was right around the corner and Rockefeller Center all within easy walking distance.  Great place to stay.  The hotel has been renovated and looks brand new.  Rooms were very nice.

title: Beautiful
text: Beautiful hotel in a perfect location. Amenities can’t be beat… rooftop bar, sessions restaurant, coffee shop and NYY steak house all superb, you almost don’t need to leave the hotel at all. Bellmen helpful and courteous. Would hands down stay here again!

title: A great place to stay in Times Square
text: Beautifully designed brand new hotel with superb amenities family and pet friendly. We truly had a great experience and in walking distance to many landmarks and attractions. I would definitely recommend

title: Fantastic staff!
text: We traveled to NYC from KC for our very first time. The team at the Hard Rock amplified our stay!  The staff greeting us when we arrived, taking our luggage to the room, the staff that checked us in, the concierge, the staff in the restaurant and the roof top bar/lounge, all phenomenal!  "Cold Play" aka Michael I believe, was FANTASTIC! He truly made our trip so easy!  His knowledge about the city/resturants/places to go/ways to get there...I can not express enough gratitude to him!  A young man in the lounge/breakfast/bar area on 2nd floor, Raul, the most kind human on the planet! he was so helpful and generous with his time. Ethan in the roof top bar space, was outstanding! his professionalism and serving skills were top notch. The coffee shop was great as well. Rooms are small of course, its NYC, but they were nice and clean. The location was great for me to get to work and to get ot all the other areas of the city. overall great stay!

title: NYC with kids
text: I would highly recommend Hard Rock Hotel. I took my three girls ages 6, 8 and 10) for three nights and the location was excellent! We walked to Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall, Bryant Park for ice skating, Empire State Building and more. We thought it was clean and quiet in our room and the view was amazing!

title: Hard Rock New York
text: Great place to stay in the heart of Times Square. Central to all transport links and Broadway. Great vibe good food, friendly and attentive staff. You can even get a guitar to use for free in your room ( headphones supplied).

title: Exceptional service and stay
text: If in New York this is your must go to.  Beautiful hotel with wonderful service from ALL.  A central location especially to radio city which was our purpose for the travel.  Can’t wait to visit other Hard Rock properties.  Hands down they are not a disappointment.

title: Will stay again!
text: First time in NYC and the Hard Rock Hotel made it awesome!   They go above and beyond to make sure you have everything you need.  Rooms were perfect for the stay, location was where we needed it to be, and dining was amazing!

title: Rock shop and restaurant
text: Beautiful building inside and out. Staff was great and very helpful.  We stopped in for a shot glass at the Rock Shop, left planning our next trip to NY so we can stay here.  Great location, easy walking to time square and Rockefeller.

title: Space in Room Restricted
text: These rooms do not cater for families, two Queen beds in these rooms then be warned as they are limited for storage and space for you. Nowhere to store your luggage either. If you are looking for a central place in and around New York then this is ideal but be warned you are going to need deep pockets if staying here and would argue for the limited time you spend in a hotel then might find a better value for money Hotel elsewhere.  Watch out for the hidden taxes and pre authorised incidentals of $100 per night.

title: Perfect weekend stay!
text: Our stay was perfect. From the valet to the restaurant, the service we experienced was excellent. The food was delicious at sessions, especially the salads and chips and dip. Rob at the concierge was amazing, he took our bags down and put them in the car for us. We will be back!!!

title: Holiday week in New York. Nov 26-Dec 3 2022.
text: First time visiting with my wife and 19 year old son. Hotel was in a great location if your there to really get out and explore. Close walking distance to Times Square (500 Ft) Rockefeller Center (maybe a block) 5th Ave (1 block), Broadway (1 block). Great pizza place and bodega next door. Hotel was a little over 6 months old, New everything Great experience, would stay there again.

title: Hôtel à recommander
text: Nous avons séjourné quatre nuits avec notre fille, 27 ans, dans cet hôtel idéalement situé près de Times Square. Accueil très sympathique, chambre avec deux lits Queen, très confortable et spacieuse pour NYC, nous avons apprécié d’avoir un petit endroit où s’asseoir pour prendre le petit-déjeuner dans la chambre. C’était très pratique car dans la boutique au rez-de-chaussée, on peut acheter un excellent Tchai Tea et des croissants, muffins, etc.  La salle de bains était très agréable, il y avait assez de place pour nos affaires et il y avait également une machine à café. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié le Rooftop, le restaurant NYY et nous avons également pris un apéritif au 1er étage. Ce fut un excellent séjour ! Je précise que notre chambre était en hauteur et vraiment très très calme, ce que nous avons particulièrement apprécié.

title: Style over substance - and didn’t refund our money as promised!!
text:
This place looks beautiful and is clean and a perfect location but we had such an unpleasant welcome after 12 hours travelling and numerous issues with our room (broken shower and little hot water, lack of city view that we paid for, horrendous air con and TV didn’t work properly) and although we were moved rooms - we were told three times that a refund was processed for the upgrade that we paid for and no taxes due because the bad experience we’d had but the refund was never received and the taxes charged to our card anyway and nobody wants to speak to us about this. 

You pay for brand name and location here only - service, staff (for the most part) and rooms are a let down. 

The only positive we will call out is Neilyn (sp) in the restaurant at breakfast was fantastic and the doorman when we left for our taxi to the airport - other than that staff were unknowledgeable, told us things that weren’t accurate or rude. 

Not somewhere we’d recomMend and certainly not for the cost you pay.

title: Great experience
text: Great staff. Hotel was perfect!  We felt safe at hotel.  Bars were a plus. Great food annd service.  Everything was done right. Not a fan of TimesSquare area but this was a bit off the main which was much better

title: Exceptional!
text: Our stay was exceptional, it was a Mother/daughter 21st birthday trip. First of all, the location is perfectly situated between Times Square, Radio City and Rockafella Center. We booked a studio suite with a soaking tub. It was very spacious, posh, efficient, comfortable and practically soundproof!  When we arrived there was a wonderful surprise in the room waiting for my daughter, Birthday cupcakes with a nice handwritten card! The amenities are top notch throughout. Heated floors, toiletries, espresso, rain shower, huge soaking tub, live music, in room yoga, food, entertainment and fitness (big gym). The Rt60 rooftop bar was our favorite! Great view, cool vibe!   The level of service, detail and quality was better than what I’ve experienced at a Ritz Carlton or Four Seasons resort. The hospitality from front to back of the house was genuine, personable and efficient. They really go above and beyond daily. The hotel itself is immaculate. The theme and fine details throughout are just stunning. We look forward to returning and I highly recommend HR NYC to family, friends, couples-anyone! You won’t regret it!

title: Hotel Excelente
text: Hotel extremamente novo, super bem localizado. Fica literalmente no burburinho da brodway. Equipe super atenciosa, educada, prestativo. Limpeza do quarto impecável. Excelente custo-benefício. Indico a todos.

title: Hotel perfecto en NY
text: Hotel perfecto para el viaje a NY. Las habitaciones son grandes en comparación con otros hoteles, muy nuevas y limpias. Perfectamente ubicado ya que está a 1 minuto de Times Square y a pesar de eso la habitación está completamente insonorizada. Muy recomendable!

title: Best Christmastime Experience!
text: This hotel is next level! So many things to rave about but I must say that the customer service is a TEN. Everyone is incredibly friendly, welcoming, knowledgeable & helpful. Especially Gabriel in the coffee shop downstairs, he is so fun! He’s personable and even won a “best barista” award - have him tell you his story while he’s making your coffee! But truly, every single person from the front door guys to check in to the concierge, to room service has been 5 star customer service. They really nailed it when they did the hiring for this hotel staff. Additionally the decor and ambiance here at Christmastime is really a full immersion experience! Everything is 10/10! Highly recommend!

title: Perfect Oversized Hoodie From The Rock Shop
text: Popped into the beautiful hotel to take a look inside. Wandered into the giftshop area and greeted my Mark. Very sweet and answered all of my questions! I ended up picking up a blanket and an oversized hoodie. I specifically ask for a larger size. Mark helped me find the perfect-sized comfy hoodie. I gotta admit the hoodie is VERY comfy, I could live in it!

title: Perfect location for a NY holiday trip
text: My fiance and I stayed at the Hard Rock for Thanksgiving. The Hard Rock is perfectly located for all the holiday things! We were able to easily get to the parade, see all the Times Square things, quickly walk to great restaurants and Rockerfeller Center/Radio City Music Hall. The rooms are comfortable and cozy, yet very modern. Service was excellent. And all the cool celebrity outfits and memorabilia throughout the hotel makes it a fun experience! Also highly recommended RT60 for a drink. The views are incredible and the outdoor area is heated. They also have cute blankets. We will definitely be returning!

title: Watch out for Breakfast
text:

small box of corn flakes $8
