Несмотря на свое название за 4 дня проживания мы не увидели ни одного исполнителя. Внутри отеля красиво: небольшое лобби расположилось на первых 2-х этажах, потому регистрация проводится на 2-ом ярусе. Ремонт креативный, в ярких цветах, много предметов одежды и музыкальных инструментов знаменитостей. Завтрак предлагается на 2-ом этаже, где имеется небольшая терраса. Самое красивое место в отеле – это ресторан-кафе на последнем 34 этаже. Там очень вежливые и заботливые работники. В особенности хочу поблагодарить Инну, которая за короткое время после дождя организовала для моих гостей место под открытым небом. Номера маленькие, но чистые и с необходимыми гигиеническими принадлежностями (но не было зубной щетки и пасты). При этом Booking обещал комнаты по 29 м2, а отель представила комнаты по 24 м2, в отеле очень скудный завтрак, при заезде сняли со счета по 400 $ депозита за каждую комнату, прошло уже месяц, но наши 800 $ так и не вернулись.

title: Top Top Top! Jederzeit wieder!
text:
Es war nahezu alles perfekt! Die Mitarbeiter top, die Lage super, die Zimmer neu und sauber, tolle Bars.
Leider hatten wir einen Wasserschaden im Zimmer, aber die Reaktion optimal. Wäsche gereinigt, Upgrade auf eine Juniorsuite. 
Wir kommen definitv wieder!

title: great location & clean & very nice decoration
text: the location was amazing, rooftop was beautiful, hotel decoration was beautiful , as well the pieces that they collected. the room was very clean & new. we loved it and we ll definitely recommended to our friends

title: Amazing experience! I’ll never forget.
text: The hotel is awesome. The food is great there and the people who work at the restaurant are amazing. Especially Imane and Sandro. Both so pacient and kind. The rooms are clean, beautiful and have a good vibe.

title: If you like the smell of weed this is the Hotel for you!
text: The hotel is only a few months old with very small rooms. Bathrooms are even smaller. Handles in shower kept falling off the wall. TV was shoddy with pixels and just shutting off. Bell service was slow and elevators even slower. Really bad set up with entrance on ground floor and check in on 2nd floor with worse elevators ever. Restaurant food in lobby area had decent food with very slow service. Every time you came in and out of lobby extreme weed smells. Entrance was on side street of a main street and good luck getting a cab. Service all around was lacking.

title: Great Hotel with Great Music
text:
One block from the insanity of Times Square yet peaceful with beautiful interiors.
The details in bathrooms and bedrooms were outstanding. Rock themes are very NY focused and made the place look great from the memorabilia all the way to the soundwave pattern on carpets. Check out the curated video channels on the gigantic TVs, awesome.

title: Best location
text: My very first time in New York, and suddenly I was on the most iconic street Times Square, right in the corner just a few steps from the hotel you can find the Big bus, right in front of the m&m’s world, this bus is gonna take you to see all manhattan, down town and up town. I was there only 2 days but was an incredible location to get to see all Manhattan. INGA hostess of the roof top she made my stay, they had a privet event on the roof, and I was starving trying to have good food, she gave me a beautiful table with an amazing view, and she made it possible because at the end I booked the hotel for the restaurants, thanks INGA you are so nice! I had a blast!

title: Rock Shop
text:
We went to the Hard Rock Shop for a gift and the assistant, Marck was very attentive to us and very friendly.

Everything that happens in the city is magical, so I invite you all to come and discover all the places.

title: Best hotel in NYC
text: Darren, with Security, was in the lobby greeting every guest and wishing everyone a happy day. When he found out it was my wife’s birthday, he stepped away briefly and returned with a Hard Rock key ring so she would always remember her visit to your hotel. I hope he is recognized and valued for his great service to your hotel.

title: Big Name doesn’t mean greatness
text: For the price I paid for a room, I would’ve expected a microwave, a tv that worked. More room. A coffee maker that actually made a decent cup of coffee. The shower was nice as was the lighting. A long wait for the elevators even though there are 5 of them.

title: Awesome
text: From time of arrival, everyone in building was so nice. Check in was super easy and fast, once we got to room, they were super clean and actually spacious for being New York. Front Bell people were awesome and super nice, the roof top bar was awesome place to hang out at with a good view. Overall, this place was super awesome and clean and would definitely stay again. Oh and the pizza spot right next door was delicious.!!

title: Ottimo hotel ma personale scortese
text: L’hotel e’ veramente bello , ristorante e roof top bar eccellenti, peccato per il personale dedicato au servizi basici , alcuni sono significativamente scortesi e lesivi per l’elevato standard hard rock . I prezzi sono alti, seguono il recente  trend di Ny .

title: HR Hotel NYC
text: Don’t know what’s better the staff or the location blocks to the theater district, the restaurants of the Hell’s Kitchen neighborhood, Rockefeller plaza, fifth ave shopping, and Central Park.  2/3 of the subway lines run through the area so you can quickly get just about anywhere you want to go in the city. We had no problems going to Strawberry fields in Central Park, the to the WTC, then back to the hotel in one afternoon

title: NYC TRIP
text: Hard rock hotel has been nothing short of exceptional! Customer service has been top notch, hotel is beautiful, and I highly recommend it. I never felt unsafe around the area, they check to see if you have a room key in order to use the elevator which is nice cause you won’t get that much public traffic. They also have a great coffee shop on the first floor(rockshop). Overall if you’re planning on staying in or near Times Square I highly recommend staying at the hard rock hotel.

title: NYC TRIP 2022 -HARD ROCK HOTEL
text: I stayed at the Hard Rock for 6 nights and the hotel is beautiful. The staff provided excellent customer services and frequently anticipated our needs. My fiancé and I especially liked the Rock coffee shop. We had our daily coffee here due to quality and convenience. Mark in the coffee shop provided excellent customer service! The hotel is centrally located near Times Square. I would stay here again.

title: Vegas vibe
text: Hotel offers the Vegas vibe in the heart of Manhattan and the rooms offer great beds and decor. However, the suite was extremely small and overprice, be in no rush for the elevators and avoid the main restaurant on the 2nd floor if you are on a tight schedule as service is extremely slow.

title: Hard Rock Coffee at Rockshop
text: Hard Rock Cafe on ground floor of Hard Rock Hotel is amazing. Serving best coffee in New York. I feel like a star here becoz they make you feel like that. Don’t miss it. Go see Mark at the Rockshop - for your beverage. He is the master curator of amazing coffee here. Thanks Mark. You are the best.

title: Breakfast with family
text: The sessions food was delicious. Our server Pedro was so kind and helpful. There were many artifacts from very famous musicians including Frank Sinatra and James Brown. I would highly recommend coming here to eat, it was an amazing experience I will not forget.

title: Breakfast
text: Our server Pedro was the best.  Food was amazing!!!!!  My 20 year old daughter said “the chef needs a raise, this is so good”. Ha ha.  Music was great and all over atmosphere was nice.  Very enjoyable. Will definitely be back.

title: Great location!!
text: Beautiful hotel with great location. They have steak house on the fisrt floor, top roof restrant has great views. Breakdfasy was so delicious! We are definatelly comimng back in December. They also have a coffee shop on the 1st floor! Stuff is super nice!!

title: Hakima’s the best
text:
I’ve stayed at many hotels but I would say hands down that Hakima and the staff at the second floor bar were so welcoming, engaging, and fun.
They made my time there exceptional! Give them a raise!!!!

title: Best bar ever
text: My friends and I had the best time with Hakima at the bar. She was the best bartender ever!  It was a lovely venue too! Can’t recommend enough! The drinks are stiff and the food is delicious. I had the kale salad with salmon.

title: Enjoyment at the Hard Rock!!
text:
Last month I stayed at the famous & fresh Hard Rock Hotel NYC. Firsly I was welcomed by a lovely lady at the front desk, Amerissa. She helped me with my room and helped me with booking a cab + making dinner reservations. All in all this made me feel very welcome. 

The view of my room was spectaculair and so were the beds. I had a great night sleep in this busy city.

I will definitely come to visit again!

Thank you for making my stay so memorable!!

title: Great Location and Hotel
text: Second time we stayed at this hotel in 4 months.  Excellent hotel !  Great location, convenient to all the major attractions.  Concierge service was very helpful providing help with directions, holding luggage, and getting taxis and limos. Both times we eat at the Steakhouse within the hotel, NYY. Beautiful restaurant, the food is good but is very very salty.  Better to walk up a few blocks and go to Gallaghers Steakhouse.

title: Made my day!
text: I popped in to this coffee shop and was greeted by two of the kindest New Yorkers I’ve met thus far.  My iced oat milk latte was great, the atmosphere was great, the price was fair and they had oat milk too!  I’ll be frequenting this spot every day on my stay.  ❤️ Thank you Gabriel and Thamar for making my day!

title: Fantastic New Hotel
text: Excellent Location, Lovely new, clean rooms and all staff we encountered were brilliant.  A really memorable and great stay.  Would not hesitate to recommend the Hard Rock  - Sessions did lovely food and was really convenient if you need to eat in a hurry and "local".

title: Hotel Nuovo e moderno in posizione ottima
text:
Hotel splendido nuovo , pulito e comodo per ogni spostamento sia a piedi che in metro. Da evitare ,secondo il mio punto di vista , il ristorante steak house in quanto il prezzo è veramente elevato.
Il sevizio per il resto è impeccabile e il concierge Michael è sempre pronto ad aiutarti.

title: Extremely poor customer service
text:
We just don’t feel the price justified the service we received. 

Nobody on the hotel door greeting us when we arrived. We stood on the ground level for 5 minutes waiting to check in (after a long 18 hours travelling) to finally be told that we need to go to Level 2 for check in. When we checked in, the lady was pleasant enough but quite cold, no information given regarding the hotel, how to use the lifts, what floor we were on, restaurant or shop info etc. We also weren’t informed that a deposit was going to be charged to our card (which was fine, but we weren’t told, so when we enquired about it as an additional £200 was taken from our bank, we were made to feel like we should already and the response was quite condescending  and patronising). 

The room was nice, no complaints there.

We visited the lobby for a drink twice during our stay. The first time, a waitress was so incredibly helpful and approached us as soon as we sat down and took our drinks order. The second time, couldn’t have been more different. Two younger girls, spent the 30 minutes were there talking, laughing at the food reservation stand, completely ignoring all guests. We ended up ordering our drink at the bar and left.

The reason we won’t choose to stay again is the lack of customer service, and ‘Hard Rock’ spirit with the staff. Literally nobody spoke to us as we arrived, checked in, walked through the hotel multiple times daily - the staff seemed extremely uninterested and to be honest, inadequately trained, which gave the impression of being stuck up and unapproachable. The only staff member I can remember that did acknowledge us and help us arrange our airport transfer was Rob, aka Kanye West.

We travel from the UK to NYC regularly and have stayed at many different hotels and although the hotel was nice, I’d rate it worse for customer service and won’t visit again. The reason we stayed at the Hard Rock is because we stay at the Hard Rock Hotel in London often and love it!! The music, the staff, the food, the service - everything is incredible and is a quarter of the price per night.

At £400 a night, I’d expect to be acknowledged as we walked around the hotel and the shop - the service was that poor in the hotel shop that we walked to the Hard Rock shop and restaurant in Times Square and spent $500 on food and gifts there instead of the hotel.

Just a poor overall experience. We were so excited to stay as were big Hard Rock fans, but unfortunately it didn’t deliver and as nice as the rooms were, it’s definitely not enough to bring us back, especially when we have experienced better hotel customer service in other NYC hotels for much cheaper.

I actually also emailed concierge weeks before arrival to try and arrange something for my husband in the room upon arrival (obviously willing to pay an additional fee for the service) and I was told there was nothing that could be offered except a bottle of wine. When I replied stating neither of us drink wine and if an alternative could be provided, I received no reply despite emailing a further time. Definitely didn’t feel like our custom was appreciated.

title: A must stay!
text: This hotel is first classed all the way! The beds are beyond comfortable, the house cleaning staff is remarkable, everyone greets you when you walk in and when you leave for your day of adventure. I love this place so much!

title: Hard Rock Hotel Review
text: The hotel is beautiful. We plan on staying at many of the Hard Rock establishments internationally as the experience has superseded the reviews. The staff was attentive and friendly. The location is perfect for access to lower and upper Manhattan. The restaurants within the building including the rooftop patio were perfect at times when you're within the hotel. Staff member David was super efficient in handling the logistics of our baggage and cab rides. He has the perfect demeanor and presence that stands for exceptional comfort while arriving and departing from the hotel. Thank you, Hard Rock. See you again soon

title: Excellent service and beautiful hotel
text:
Everything about the hotel is welcoming. The design is modern and sleek. The service is friendly and welcoming plus accommodating. The rooms are clean and have everything you need to have a comfortable stay. Our room had a coffeemaker and mini fridge plus all the essentials. If we needed anything, we could call down to the front desk and it arrived at the door asap. 

David G in the lobby was extremely welcoming and accommodating. He made our trip feel like home at the hotel. Great service. 

It is a fresh and new hotel with a sweet bar and rooftop patio and the elevators have music. It is steps away from Times Square and the hotel is still quiet and dark at night. You could hardly tell we were in the heart of Manhattan. This experience made us more than impressed and encourages us to continue to stay at the hard rock hotels in other cities and countries. Thank you!

title: Great location and clean/comfortable stay
text: We had an amazing stay at the Hard Rock. Close to everything, and the staff and amenities were great. We used the valet service which was quick and efficient. Our room was kept immaculate over the four days we were there.

title: NYY Steakhouse @ Hard Rock Hotel - AMAZING!!
text: Had the best dining experience at NYY Steakhouse on our last stay in NY. Everyone at NYY Steakhouse was welcoming and courteous.. all of the staff including Jonathan the manager made our dining experience excellent!! I highly recommend this restaurant!!

Fabulous place to stay and dine. Great location and top notch service!!! You’ll love the ambiance, decor and attention to detail!!! We had a fantastic experience, and highly recommend this hotel to anyone wanting to visit New York City.

title: Wonderful Dinner! Imane is great!!
text: We just landed and arrived at our hotel tired and hungry. Went down to the bar for something quick and easy, food and service was wonderful. Our server Imane was absolutely wonderful! The burger and salmon were just amazing!!! Highly recommend our menu choices.

title: Don’t make the mistake of staying here!  Bad elevators, tiny bathroom, and indifferent  management!
text:
First, this is not a 5 star hotel. It is a 2 star that happens to be new.  Would never stay here again and tell anyone to avoid.
You read that the room is small, and that doesn’t bother me usually. But this room is not well designed. The bathroom is tiny, as in you can almost brush your teeth while you are on the toilet. And from the shower also. There  is no way to put the bath mat under the shower door. Water gets everywhere. And there is no room by the sink for toiletries. The satellite signal for the TV was intermittent. Would go out every minute or so. I despise the mirrored wall - who wants to look at themselves in an almost floor-to ceiling mirror while in bed. Not me. The air conditioning worked decently at least. Every few minutes I would hear a loud noise from the window that was either door slamming  above me or some knocking sound. It would startle me, and I’m a sound sleeper usually. The lighting system is confusing - as is how to operate the shower. Not labeled well, but once figured out they do work.  They should offer someone to show you to the room and explain those. But probably why they don’t do that is because of the terrible elevators. They require a room key, which I appreciate. But you have to let the doors close before you swipe the key and then the reader didn’t always work.  I cannot tell you how many times people missed their floors because of it. And at times the elevator waits were long. One elevator was different than others and had rear access. We couldn’t figure that one out at all…and someone from housekeeping had to show us how to use the R side. And then to top all of this off one the hotel has RT60, a rooftop bar, which is one of the reasons I booked. The first night we had access on the room elevator to 34th floor and just checked out the space. No one there greeted- would have ordered a drink but no server approached.  It was loud and kind of late so just went back to room. Then, after getting back from show, wanted a nightcap. Made a reservation on Open Table for 11PM to make sure would have a spot. Could not get elevator to work. A gentleman and I got off thinking maybe it was just that one, but no. Would let me go to 36th floor but not 34th. Called the number on reservation and someone at hotel answered. Said had to go down to first floor before being let up. Had no idea. Well as luck would have it, when I was heading down from 36th floor, someone was getting on from 34th floor. So I got off and tried to go to bar area. And right away the guy says you don’t have a stamp- you have to go downstairs. At this point had had enough. Went down to 2nd floor to complain to front desk manager. She really was indifferent, even though my first  comment was I would never want to stay here again. I only told her about the elevator and RT60 situation, and she explained that on Saturdays they have different rules in place for RT60. And I said someone should explain that on check in.  She said yeah maybe so. 
As much money as I paid for this room I am completely and utterly dismayed at this hotel. It is indeed new. But that’s it. It’s in a good location. But so are a lot of other better hotels certainly with nicer management.  Do not splurge on this hotel like I did or you’ll regret it.

title: 21st Celebrations
text:
Thank you HR for a fantastic four night stay. We had a wonderful time in NYC and the Hard Rock made it perfect.
The room was great, very comfy, clean and welcoming. Thank you for the complimentary prosecco on arrival to celebrate my daughter turning 21, it was a wonderful surprise and very thoughtful.
The rooftop bar was amazing and the cocktails delicious. We were made very welcome by the staff at RT60, they made our visit very special. All the hotel staff were very friendly and keen to ensure we enjoyed our visit. We ate in Sessions and breakfast was great.
We have previously stayed in Hard Rock Hotels in London, Amsterdam and Orlando and this hotel was equally fantastic.
Next time we get the chance to return to NYC, we will definitely stay at the Hard Rock, it is amazing.

title: Hostess Raul
text: Raul has a beautiful personality with outstanding customer service. The Hard Rock hotel is very beautiful with a great atmosphere. Everything you can do is inside the hotel. I will definitely visit again.

title: Amazing stay!
text: Amazing service from the team, there’s some real stars at this hotel, including Jay Jay, Raul, Zack and David (serving us in the hard rock shop). They’re all so welcoming and friendly making our stay feel so special. Thank you for making our trip memorable, we will definitely be back!

title: New York! New York!
text: HARD ROCK HOTEL IS THE PERFECT PLACE TO STAY… It’s clean and close to everything… the staff are friendly and very accommodating. There is no place like HRH in New York City…I want to bring my family back again to New York City….

title: Mother / Daughter Trip!
text:
1 night stay in New York and we chose Hard Rock Hotel for our mother/daughter trip.
The location was fantastic and the hotel itself is top notch.  Highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking to stay in the heart of New York City!

title: Amazing location, cool hotel and great staff!
text: Amazing location, great price and cool hotel.  That good we had two stays in the month of August and will def be back.  The staff were amazing, all really helpful and nothing is too much trouble.  David G the bellman was super helpful with a car and all the luggage we had.  High recommend it for a stay in NYC.

title: Great stay!
text:
Great location, friendly staff, awesome food & drinks.  I was welcomed and checked in by Sally so friendly and made it such a hassle free for me during my stay and of course as well with the bellman David so polite and very helpful! Thank you so much guys! 
Love the location and hotel is so amazing and so stylish! good food great place to stay definitely will be back!

title: Very nice and new addition to Midtown hotels
text: This is one of the best in its class that I have found so far. The hotel lobby feels grand and classy. The room though small as in other hotels in NYC, is nicely designed. Room is well sound proofed. The location is excellent. Right in the middle of action, but located on a rather quiet street. There is a convenience store right next door. Also a nice and sleek lobby lounge and a chic rooftop. Will come back next time I am in NYC.

title: Bien , belle adresse
text:
Très belle hôtel , neuf , service bien accueil un peu impersonnel , les chambres sont top,  il rien petite mais très classe et fonctionnelle , propre et insonorisée., très bien situé .
Petit déjeuner peux être prix à l’hôtel et c’est très bien même le service , le bar et classe et le service très correcte .
NE VOULANT PAS GÂCHER LA COTATION DE L HÔTEL J AI MIs 5 , mais alors pour le ROOF TOP QUI EST TRÈS BEAU , la dame a l’accueil de ce 31/8 était hautaine , elle nous a placé à l’intérieur alors qu’à l’extérieur c’était vide ( photo à l’appui ) et pourtant nous avons demandé a 3 reprises ( pas très chic pour les clients comme moi de l’hôtel avec 2 chambres ) le service déplorable , les champagne à carte servi chaud un aberration , vraiment à revoir ds un hôtel aussi classe !!!!

title: Geweldig hotel, schitterende locatie, fantastische service!
text:
Wat me echt opviel in dit hotel was de klantenservice. Van de begroeting aan de deur, de algehele ontvangst tot aan de bediening in het restaurant. Al het personeel is zo behulpzaam en vriendelijk. Niets is hen te veel, ronduit fantastisch. 

Locatie is gewoon perfect, Time Square, Broadway, 42th Street en nog veel meer Midtown Manhattan op steenworp afstand. Echt alle bezienswaardigheden op loopafstand. Prachtig itzicht vanaf het terras en de bar daar. Muziek, lekker eten, geweldig ontbijt en super lekkere drankjes. Heerlijke sfeer, overal in het hotel. 

De ambiance en decoratie van het nieuwe Hardrock Hotel NY is stunning! Dit hotel is een aanrader als je midden in New York wilt verblijven.

Kamers, bedden, douche, eten, service..... Wij komen zeker terug als we weer in New York zijn.  Bedankt team van Hardrock Hotel NY, voor de onvergetelijke ervaring!

title: Wonderful Stay and Delicious Food and Beverage!
text:
The new Hard Rock Hotel New York is beautiful and brand new right in Times Square with friendly staff and amazing dining onsite.  Joel welcomed me to the hotel and started my stay upbeat. The other doorman, Richard, was also friendly and helpful.  
The theme of the hotel is fun and cohesive throughout the lobby, to the guest corridors and into the guest rooms. The room was beautifully appointed with cobalt blue cabinets with gold accents in the bedroom and the marble bathroom.  

We had dinner NYY Steakhouse and it was phenomenal. Our server, Jon, was knowledgeable, warm and engaging.  All the food especially the Kobe was outrageously good!  One of the best meals I've had in a long time.   

We had breakfast at Session’s in the lobby which is fun and upbeat. Our server Pedro was helpful and friendly.  

All in a fantastic stay and highly recommend!

title: Fantastic stay at Hard Rock Hotel New York
text:
This is certainly a hidden gem in heart of Times Square! A very kids friendly hotel. From the moment we walked into the hotel we felt very welcome. A shout out to Jasna, who walked by while we were waiting for our room to be ready, she was very engaging and telling my son how cool his car was, and she went above and beyond to check if our room was ready.

David, who brought our luggage up to our room, super friendly, and gave us a quick intro where all the amenities are. 

Oh my, we requested the Fender guitar, although none of us play, but just holding it, taking pictures with it, felt like ROCK STAR!!

We had dinner at NYY Steak restaurant, the Chef went above and beyond to make a special meatball for my 7 years old kids, they finished them under 5 minutes, it was that GOOD! My husband and I had the most yummy, melt in your mouth wagu steak, we were in heaven! I ordered scallop and it was perfectly cooked.

We stayed in a room with 2 beds, it was very comfortable for a family of 4, my kids were soaking in the bathtub and didn't want to get out!

We were there for only 1 night, we wish we could stay longer, this is definitely one of the highlights of our trip!

title: Great sandwiches
text:
Very underrated, understated, forgotten gem. You’ve got to try the sandwiches out. I had the chicken park and game changer!  Who would have known.

The next time I’m in town or in the area I’m definitely going to stop by here!

title: Such a great discovery!
text: It’s a new hotel in midtown and my new go to place for all my special occasions. Rooftop bar was little unorganized but still great place to spend your time with your friends. I love atmosphere in the lobby. Girl who checked us in was very friendly and informative. I wanna say her name is Britney. Breakfast was pricey and slow, but staff was nice. Valet David helped us with directions and car services. I’m local and will definitely be back soon. Kudos to you all.

title: Awesome location awesome team
text: I stayed here for my birthday celebration with my family and it couldn’t be better than that. I found very nicely handwritten birthday card and cupcakes and balloons in my room. Nice touch! We were greeted by David at the door. Such a wonderful person. We had a great start because of him and the nice lady who checked us in. I think her name is Sally. We started early our day so got same pastries and delicious lavazza coffee. Staff are very friendly there too. Rooftop was just icing on the cake. After long day outside getting couple drinks make you energized for next day. Great birthday trip. Thank you Hard Rock team. Well done 👍🏻

title: Eng. Abdullah Alfaris
text:
Excellent job Gabriel and Thamar nice to know you hope to come back again to have a coffee … 🙏☕️ Well done well done love the way they dell’s with me 🌹
Lovely place and atmosphere 
Should back again for sure

title: Nice hotel
text: We picked this hotel because of the reviews.  Room is a bit on the small side but this is New York.  Staff was extremely friendly and helpful, from the valet who greeted us when we arrived, to the front desk, to the room service, to the beds and pillows.  If you like the Hard Rock franchise, you’ll love this hotel.  Tip, the Brussel Sprouts in the 2nd floor restaurant are fantastic.  The hotel opened in April 2022 so everything is brand new.

title: Rockin' experience in mid town
text: My stay at the newly opened Hard Rock Hotel in Times Square was fantastic. from the clean and comfortable room and upbeat ambiance to the extremally friendly staff. if you are making a trip to NYC you will not be disappointed if you choose to stay at the Hard Rock Hotel.

title: Family friendly stay in NYC
text: Phenomenal experience. Family friendly hotel with a diverse range of restaurants for dining or just having a casual drink. We dined in NYY steak, get the seafood tower, a great shareable option. The steaks were of course a home run (get it? :-) My second time here, I will be back!

title: Great staff and location
text: Room is small, quality is good, HR standard, staff is great, Mark from the store is of great help and specially efficient. Room service staff is also great. Good food amazing smell LMAO and location is gold, a walking distance from great spots

title: New Hotel in Times Square - Clean Rooms and Friendly Staff
text:
My partner and I stayed at the Hotel this past weekend and had a great time.

Rooms
The size and layout of the room was just the right size and comfortable for a couple. We stayed in a King Room. Loved the rain shower in the bathroom! The finishings in the hotel are high-end and detailed. Overall, well designed!

Food and Beverage
First, I want to highlight afternoon drinks at RT60. A rooftop bar during a late afternoon summer in NYC was wonderful. The cocktails were refreshing and well balanced. Grab a snack here if you're hungry before dinner. Grab breakfast at Sessions before checking out! 

Service
Overall service was great. I wanted to highlight Kyle from Sessions and Audra from RT60! Kyle's service was friendly and professional. I appreciate how he took the time to get to know us. Audra is a top-notch bartender! She made the perfect espresso martini for me.

title: Fantastic!
text: Great experience, exceeded expectations. Hotel was clean, modern and service was exceptional. Enjoyed visiting the Cafe Shop in lobby area where Gabriel, Veronica and other staff were super attentive, friendly and extremely pleasant despite crafting fantastic coffee. Overall fantastic service and would visit again 100%

title: 6 jours à NY en famille
text:
Nous avons passé 6 jours dans cet hôtel en août 2022, en famille (2 adultes et 2 enfants). 
Sa déco est magnifique et soignée. L'hôtel est propre et très bien situé à Time Square. Les chambres sont spacieuses pour NY, avec une literie très confortable. Le personnel est très sympathique et à l'écoute de ses hôtes.  
Joli roof tip bar accessible avec les enfants jusqu'à 18h.
Gym bien équipée. 
Un séjour inoubliable pour les grands et les petits!

title: Charming & Rock
text:
Beautiful hotel, very near to Times Square!
Beautiful and quiet room. 5 elevators. Stunning view in the Rooftop bar RT60. Courteous staff.   Charming place where live New York life
Unforgettable days!!!

title: Can’t wait to go back!
text: We had such a wonderful time here at Hard Rock! Brand new hotel right by Times Square. Everything is new, clean and beautifully decorated. My husband is a huge John Lennon fan and they have his suit right by the front desk and handwritten lyrics. He was thrilled! He’s also a huge Yankee fan so we had to try NYY steak. Absolutely delicious! Bit pricey but they have kobe beef. Amazing! Worth every penny. Their staff is very friendly and pleasant but David the bellman is the best. We can’t wait to go back next year!

title: Great Time
text:
Hard Rock Rocks
I’m was in NYC for my family trip after a long and challenging year. I was little hesitant to book this hotel since it’s new and I thought there would be a lot of things that are not in place yet. It was complete opposite. Everyone was so professional and friendly. I love the interaction with the guys at the door. All of them was amazing but David is extremely professional. Julivia at the front desk was very welcoming too. Our rooms were on the high floor and very well designed. Little small but it’s New York. Cleaning team did a great job too. We left with the good memories and definitely be back to this hotel for our future stays.

title: Best hotel
text: Loved this place. Everyone is very friendly and attentive. I dont remember all the names but Tiffany and Chester were very friendly and welcoming. We are planning to come back for Christmas and definitely will stay here again. Thumbs up!!!

title: Öfg
text:
You guys Rock!!!
I travel a lot and I have to say I don’t like staying in New York for several reasons. One of the reason us New York attitude from the staff. Until I stay at the Hard Rock New York. Everyone is very warm and approachable. I didn’t feel like I was bothering when I interacted with them. Especially David and Chester at the door are very friendly and helpful. They definitely know how to make you feel special. I had the best coffee at the cafe in the ground level and the barista was very nice. Good job Hard Rock New York.

title: The best hotel in Times Square!
text:
Awesome stay at the Hard Rock! Here with my friends for a bachelorette’s party and the staff is just amazing! Special shout out to Chester, 
David Garcia from the bell team and the whole front desk! First and last impressions truly last! They are very friendly, welcoming and made us feel so special. Rooms are small but that’s what NYC is known for. I didn’t plan to stay since I’m a local but their beds are so comfy, marbled bathroom and they have Lavazza coffee! How do I say no to that! RT60 needs to be known by all asap cause that place has great potential! We had so much fun & they really took good care of us. Nicely decorated with great DJs. I rarely hang out midtown cause it felt too touristy & overhyped but I will definitely go back to RT60 anytime in a heartbeat.  So glad we picked this hotel!

title: 5 stelle non pervenute, ma ottima posizione
text:
Hotel a 5 stelle….. ho i miei dubbi. Totale assenza di amenities ( no spazzolino, no dentifricio, no ciabatte, no cotone, no cottonfioc); camera molto piccola; pessima insonorizzazione; orrenda porta doppia comunicante con la stanza accanto. 
Di cinque stelle vedo molto poco, compreso il servizio -completamente anonimo-.
L assenza del turndown service serale inoltre è davvero un punto negativo visto il prezzo pagato ( piu di 400 usd a notte)

title: Rock Shop - Best Sandwiches
text: After a long hectic day, I was looking to get a nice meal and iced coffee. I stumbled past the rock shop that not only had the best coffee but also the sandwiches were incredible. Thanks to Gabriel, my experience sitting down at the shop and eating there was absolutely satisfying. I asked for mustard and hot sauce and even though they didn't have some behind the counter at the moment, he ran upstairs in the hotel / restaurant and got me what I asked for. The little things matter and Gab definitely knows how to be there for his customers. I work two blocks away and I will definitely be regular here now.

title: Top notch
text:
Nice, new rooms. Great fitness facility. Friendly and helpful staff. 
Showers were weak but it’s like that at all American hotels. 
Highly recommended if you plan to spend a good amount of time mid-town.

title: The coffee shop
text: Stopped by in a whim for coffee and met the friendliest people in the city. Gabe, Veronica and Mark are amazing in the coffee shop, it was nice to be in NYC and actually encounter some friendly people!

title: Great Coffee in the Rock Shop!!
text: Everyone in this city is so cranky, EXCEPT the workers at the rock shop. Coffee was delicious and staff was amazing. Gabe, Veronica and Mark were just the best.  We will be back for sure. We also loved the macaroons!!!

title: Great location
text:
Beautiful room and view, friendly and accommodating staff, and excellent location and close to times square. Thank you to Julivia for being super friendly and helpful!
 I highly recommend it. The staff was extraordinary—great customer service!

title: Luxe Hotel Close to Rockefeller Center
text: I stayed in a regular king room - convenient amenities included the steamer in the closet and the mini fridge so I could store a few snacks. Also appreciated the large marble shower. Loved the accessibility to Rockefeller Center (here for work). The made-to-order green juice was my favorite way to start each day. If there were more vegan/gluten-free items on the breakfast menu I would have had breakfast in the restaurant, too. Will return!

title: The Best Place to stay in NYC
text: There is a new hotel in NYC -  The Hard Rock Hotel.  It is NOT like the Hard Rock Cafe Quite the opposite It's a "calm" atmosphere, and very nice and reasonably priced hotel.  It's brand new, the rooms are great and like all NYC the rooms are not big but very well laid out and has all the amenities. The staff is friendly and excellent service.   The bar and restaurant and lobby area is so nice and the food is very good.  The location is great for the theatre and shopping.  One can walk everywhere from the hotel.  The hotel has a car service or will get a cab for their guests.  The roof top bar is a great place for a nite cap.  It is not loud or a party hotel.  It's a sophisticated crowd and family friendly.  The hotel lobby and bar and outside dinning area is just so nice.  We loved it and We will be back.

title: Hard rock hotel concert get a way
text:
Place was very nice and the staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful!  Very clean and great vibe.   Room was clean and a super comfortable bed!  

Only thing they can do better is have a sign to tell you check in desk is on second floor   

I would 100% stay at this hotel again

title: Perfect Hotel. Rob made our holiday!
text: We stayed 7 nights at the Hard Rock New York. We were attending the Blondie concert at Pier 17 (brilliant!) and, being a massive Blondie fan I wanted to visit some of the important parts of the band’s history, including CBGB. It’s now a quality men’s clothes shop, with a lot of rock memorabilia adorning the walls. On checking in at the Hard Rock, I saw the Blondie disc on the wall. There is so much wonderful memorabilia around the place. We visited the shop in the foyer where I was pleased to see a CBGB book, which I promptly bought. I got talking to Rob while he rang in my purchases. I mentioned that we were attending the gig and he said that they had the original CBGB awning downstairs, not currently on display. He said he could arrange for us to see it! I was so happy when he took us down, and we got some pictures with it. It made this wonderful holiday absolutely perfect. Thank you so much Rob! All of the staff at the hotel are brilliant, polite, friendly and professional. Special thanks also to our Breakfast reception staff member (I know he likes Tina Turner!). A stunning hotel, with great staff and tonnes of music memorabilia in a perfect location. Thanks everyone, from Jeff and Suzie, August 2022 x

title: Wonderful stay
text: Excellent experience! Being steps away from Time Square is amazing! The staff is so helpful and nice for anything you need. The rooftop bar has amazing views and the drinks are so good! I loved having a coffee shop in the hotel so I can start my morning off right! Gabriel was an awesome barista and definitely makes a fantastic latte!

title: Beautiful hotel.  Perfect location.
text:
First time to New York and we couldn’t have chosen a better hotel.   Perfect location and staff was amazing.  One block from Times Square and 2 from
Rockefeller Plaza.   Definitely stay here on our next trip.

title: Fabulous stay!
text: I loved our stay at the Hard Rock NYC.  The rooms are gorgeous with every modern convenience.  We went to RT60 and Sessions - both wonderful.  Don't hesitate to stay at this extremely beautiful, modern, clean, fabulous hotel with a great staff who are friendly and helpful!

title: 4 nights fun visit
text:
Loved this hotel ! The staff were exceptionally nice and accommodating . We had a classic king room on the 6th floor . There was no view which we didn’t mind at all because the room was so quiet and we slept great ! Beautifully designed room and had everything we needed . Great location to Broadway !
Would definitely stay again !

title: Great stay in NYC
text: New hotel in New York - Great rooms with everything you need. Not to mention very clean which is always nice. Would recommend this place to anyone to anyone. Great coffee in the shop downstairs with friendly staff.

title: This place rocks!
text: I had a excellent experience at Hard Rock Hotel. From top to bottom, my experience was first class. Specifically on my second day I found Sessions restaurant on the second floor. Neilyn was my server and she was outstanding! Polite, confident, witty and pleasure to work with. If the world was filled with Neilyn’s I can’t imagine how happy everyone would be. HRH is lucky to have her on their team.

title: Very good position for visiting Manhattan NYC
text:
I can recommend this hotel especially for the position, very comfortable to visit NYC.
Room was very clean. Excellent Wi-Fi. However it is just 4 stars has it has to improve since it’s a 5 stars  hotel: you would expect to find slippers and most of all that elevators work properly. Very often TV signal dropped off.

title: Awesome hotel and location
text: Leisure perfect location, beautiful views and awesome service. Special arrangements for my daughter's bday...they went above and beyond once I told them. Special thanks to concierge Michael, security Darren that gave her a card on her bday...so Special! New hotel, great room.

title: Great spot must book
text: The facility was absolutely fantastic every area you went to was truly amazing the roof top bar was everything you could have hope for in New York. All the staff at the Hard rock were so friendly & helpful

title: Parfait
text: Hôtel parfaitement situé. Très beau, très propre, bel accueil, pour un prix très acceptable considérant l’emplacement et que nous étions en famille. Chambr confortable.Service valet apprécié! Nous y retournerons si nous retournons à New York.

title: Highly recommend!
text:
We came to see Harry @ MSG. Location was a little further north from things we had planned, but I chose Hard Rock because it was new and I knew it would be clean. Other places had inconsistent reviews. Hard Rock didn’t and after spending the weekend there, I can see why. 

Everything was immaculate from the sidewalk on up. If you’ve been to Times Square, you know the streets are pretty garbage-filled. Not the case here. 

I loved seeing the memorabilia from Alicia Keyes, Bon Jovi, Kiss, and Lady Gaga. 

The elevators were easily accessible and little to no waiting time. 

The lobby looked the same any time we entered or left. The windows and doors were always clean and not marked with fingerprints. Their attention to detail to those high-touch surfaces was appreciated!  Other businesses in the area should take notice.

The room itself was very clean. Bathroom was modern. The bed was very comfortable. The A/C was nice and cold, which was appreciated after a hot and steamy day walking the city. 

All of the staff were friendly and helpful. They were able to answer any/all questions and were conversational. They were all well groomed and their uniforms were crisp. 

Rates were a little bit higher than I had wanted to spend, but in the end it was worth it. We had a fantastic time and have/will recommend to anyone!

title: Beautiful hotel in the heart of everything
text:
We enjoyed our stay at the hotel. It was a beautiful hotel and all of the staff were so kind and welcoming. We checked in late at night and Tony was very gracious.  Check out went smoothly Tiffany was very kind to go over all of the charges. 
The wait staff at the restaurant are also very welcoming and accomodating. 
The room itself was beautiful and we loved the options for showering with the rainshower or the handheld shower. The bathroom amenities were the best scented I have ever had at a hotel. The room was just right for 2 people. 
The view was lacking but that’s ok as it’s to be expected if staying in Times Square. The location is perfect and walking distance to everything we wanted to do from the theaters, Rockefeller center and Empire State Building. We caught Uber to see the Statue of Liberty and one World Trade Center. 
There was a mishap at 3 am with the alarms going off due to someone smoking in the building. It totally interrupted our sleep but I’m glad to hear that the smoke alarms are working.

title: Hard Rock Hotel NYC gets 5 Stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
text:
Came down from Boston for a weekend stay.
Great Location! Valet service was excellent.
VERY CLEAN rooms. Enjoyed the balcony room
on the 5th floor! Hotel / Wait Staff /
Employees were ALL amazing. A special shout
out to Raul, who greeted us at the restaurant/bar
on the 2nd floor upon arrival. He was extremely
courteous, polite, inviting, friendly, and
professional all weekend. He left a lasting
impression and should be recognized by
management for setting the bar extremely high
for the standards in which all hotel staff should
follow. Concierge was very efficient and
accommodating. (Thank you for the bowl of fruit
and lovely card attached that was brought up to
the room shortly after our arrival!) Top notch
service across the board. Drinks / Food were
fabulous. The Roof top bar provided a really nice
atmosphere to just kick back and have a cocktail
or two either before or after venturing out for the
evening. No complaints whatsoever. Would
highly recommend and will definitely be back
SOON!
Exceptional collaborative effort by the entire HR
NY Team!
~Maggie B.

title: AMAZING
text: Once we stepped foot into this hotel, we were immersed into another world. We were pleasantly surprised with the ambiance of the Hotel, restaurants, rooms and rooftop. The views were spectacular. We booked the King room. It was spacious and absolutely stunning. Heated floors in the bathroom, spacious steam shower, marble walls, gold fixtures - WOW! Staff were welcoming and accommodating. Food was delicious. Drinks were outstanding. No complaints at all. And the price for the room was reasonable. YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED.

title: Wonderful stay at the Hard Rock
text: A wonderful new hotel right on Times Square. The design of the lobby and common areas is top. The rooms are not huge but big enough that 4 people did not feel too cramped. The room design and layout was wonderful. The bathroom is well laid out with a very large shower. The breakfast was very tasty - not exactly cheap but this is NYC.

title: Great hotel and amazing staff
text:
We are very happy with the hotel.the hotel was clean staff was amazing hotel was very clean and easy to get around.
The roof to patio was super cook. I highly recommend this hotel you won’t be disappointed.

title: 5 Star all the way.
text: We stayed overnight to celebrate my boyfriends birthday and it was absolutely fantastic.  Julia and the entire front office team were amazing.  Robert and Veronica in retail were so helpful and accommodating as well.  I can't wait to go back as well as send a ton of business their way.

title: Best in town
text: We had 5 nights stay with 2 rooms. We had a great time. David at the door was so friendly and helpful. He always recognized whenever we walked in and out. He made us feel like home. Everyone was very friendly too. Our rooms were clean. We spent most of the time outside but we also enjoyed rooftop. We definitely will be back here. You guys Rock!!!

title: Good vibes & good food in NYC
text:
The hotel is stylish, modern and energizing thanks to the ever-present music.
Breakfast is very rich and tasty, but we had several problems with the personnel at Sessions. Many have been impolite and the service was extremely slow.

The room was nice, with cheerful music all the time, but too small for 3 people (should be for 4 since it had 2 queen beds). Especially the bathroom is not acceptable to be so small in a 5* hotel.

Food is extremely good, both breakfast and dinner.

The fitness center is well equipped for an hotel, the only disappointment was that if there are people running on the treadmills the floor wobbles and it is very annoying.

Overall we enjoyed our stay and Hard Rock brightened it up with good music, vibes and food!

title: Hotel Incrível
text: Hotel super moderno, com excelente localização praticamente na esquina da Times Square, funcionários educados e receptivos, limpeza maravilhosa, quarto lindo, cama tão aconchegante que era difícil acordar, chuveiro com ducha incrível caindo do teto e nas costas. Só um ponto deixa a desejar que é a falta do café da manhã incluído na diária e com um preço alto pra pagar no hotel. Mesmo tendo várias opções próximas, com o dólar alto do jeito que está seria um diferencial pra hóspedes especialmente brasileiros acostumados com café da manhã no hotel.

title: Great experience!
text: Highly recommend this prime property! Excellent service from dropping off the vehicle at valet to picking up the vehicle at check out. Friendly staff at the front desk, common area was clean, room was superb!

title: Great stay, top notch service.
text:
I stayed over at the Hard Rock, NYC for 3 weeks in June-Jul. It was one of the best hotels I've stayed in.

Room: I've never been to a room this clear, I could literally not find any dust around the room. The room service was great as well, making sure amenities are refilled every day. Love the scent they spray every time they've finished cleaning my room. I don't remember the names of those who cleaned my rooms but it was nice meeting someone who spoke my language :)

Restaurants: The food and drinks were amazing, I pretty much ate most of my meals in the hotel. Jonathan from the lounge bar is amazing with his cocktails and he knows his cocktails well. The lounge restaurant Sessions had amazing burgers and salmon, one of the best burgers I've ever had. Thank you, Cheynne who works there going the extra mile to ensure I had a great dining experience. The rooftop bar was great as well, thanks Inga for the amazing cocktail recommendations. Last but not the least, at the NYY steak house, Ashley, the receptionist, Jonathan, the manager, Elton, and the other bartender (I forgot his name :')) all made sure I had a great dining experience. Some of the best steaks I've ever had.

Service: Miguel and Adi were always helpful whenever I was looking for a cab/waiting for my uber and went the extra mile to help me with my luggage. 

From office: Lorenzo, Ryan (concierge for helping me book the rooftop bar), and everyone from the front office were super helpful as well. (I forgot other names but everyone made sure I had an amazing experience)

Facilities: The gym was really nice and new and I had a great time working out there.

Definitely a great hotel and will become one of my go-to hotels whenever I'm in the city. I'm sure I've missed a lot of names but I love how every staff is super positive and passionate about ensuring guests feel at home.

Best,
Guest of room 2803

title: Family trip
text: Had a fantastic family trip here for 5 days,  my whole experience was great. Staff was polite,  rooms were very clean,  location to everything was perfect,  my only negative is the rooms are a little small for a family of 4,  two teen kids,  two adults,  but we didn't spend much time in the room.

title: We were treated like royalty!
text:
We chose this hotel for location but we will stay again because of the service! From check in to check out everything was warm professionalism. Chester helped us outside and was always so friendly and kind. 

Another highlight was the amazing housekeeping—I’ve never experienced such a clean hotel room. 

Our room (2112) was comfortable and room service was always delivered promptly and star service was aways friendly and helpful. We asked for an extra blanket and it also arrive promptly. 

If you have never been to NYC I highly recommend this hotel. Employees are happy to assist guests in finding places to go and eat. I can’t say enough about the stellar customer service.

title: Love it!!!!
text: My husband and I were visiting to attend the Rock the Bells concert in Queens but we also wanted to enjoy Times Square. This hotel is close to everything. Food, entertainment, and shopping is within walking distance. The hotel is beautiful but my room was kind of small but hey it's New York:) The staff in the hotel was so nice and helpful. I ate breakfast at Sessions during my stay and the breakfast was ok. Check out was smooth, I didn't have to go to the desk. I love that the option of checking out via text message is an option.

title: Séjour génial à New York
text:
À 100m de Times Square, un hôtel idéal pour sorties, shopping et théâtre.
Service impeccable.
Chambres lumineuses et spacieuses.
Petit déjeuner top avec possibilité de le prendre en terrasse.
La cerise sur le gâteau: un rooftop avec une ambiance géniale.
Une seule envie: y revenir!

title: Amazing experience
text: We (family of 3, 2 adults, one 14-year old) stayed at the Hard Rock Hotel for our 10-days trip to NYC. From the moment we entered the hotel we knew that we have come to a very unique place. The staff was very kind and helpful, the room was spacious and comfortable and the breakfast was superb. The location of the hotel is perfect. Times Square is just around the corner and subway stations are within a 1-2 minutes walking distance.

title: Everything was perfect!
text: El hotel es nuevo, por lo que está en perfecto estado. Todo funciona muy bien, el personal es muy amable siempre. Las habitaciones muy limpias y ordenadas. Espero que se mantenga así el hotel con El Paso de los años.

title: Feels like home
text: It’s our anniversary and a quick getaway from our kids. So glad we found this hotel! Brand new hotel so everything is clean and the interior is beautiful. Lots of memorabilia - typical Hard Rock. We were greeted by David the bellman. Such an awesome guy. Very friendly and helpful. Front desk is busy but Amerissa the manager welcomed us. Check-in was smooth and enjoyable. She’s such a sweetheart! The next day we got a bottle of champagne with a card from her and the front office team. That really made our day! Beautiful gesture. The room is small but functional. Bed is so comfortable! Shower is amazing. Wish it’s bigger but that’s NY hotel for you. Not really a big deal since we’re outside all day. RT60 has a cool vibe.  Service is a bit slow though but the view from the outdoor spot is unbeatable. Overall, what a lovely stay! Everyone we met were so nice! It feels like home. Will definitely come back. Next time with the whole family.

title: Best hot chocolate, excellent service, really nice people
text: Mark and David at the Rock shop (on the first floor) really made my evening! I went down to get some hot chocolate, and they happened to be out of one of the ingredients, but they offered to try and make it another way and gave me a sample - it was absolutely amazing (I ended up ordering 2 to go). They were also really kind and fun, and I had a great time speaking to them.

title: Wonderful Service at NYC Hard Rock Hotel
text:
We have just completed our stay at the Hard Rock Hotel NYC, thank you so much to the wonderful team for their  attentive service and making our milestone anniversary holiday a special one to remember, the complimentary bubbles and chocolate were a beautiful touch - thank you so much.

But a extra special thank you to Tiffany who is a truly wonderful asset to the front of house team. From the point we arrived to the day we left she always ensure that our needs were met and our stay a comfortable one. Her attention to detail exemplary and most of all excellence service with a smile. Thank you so much Tiffany!

From the Obhrai family

title: Objective review of the Hard Rock Hotel NYC
text:
We are ex-New Yorkers who visit the city once a year.  This time we stayed at the Hard Rock Hotel.  In the past we have stayed at the Grand Hyatt next to Grand Central Station (when it was called the Grand Hyatt) and the Marriot Marquis on Times Square itself.  We arrived at the Hard Rock on Thursday and stayed till Monday morning.  Valet parking was convenient and easy, albeit expensive. We booked the Superior King room, one level up from the classic King.  We paid almost $400/day. The Property looks great.  The room was flawless, after all this is a newly opened hotel.  The service was excellent.  Every person at the hotel was friendly and helpful.  The room was small. As we didn’t know what we were going to wear, me and my wife brought 2 large suitcases (30 inches a piece). There were only 2 usable draws for clothes, each measuring about 18” x 18” x 7”, and that’s being generous. All measurements are estimates. The top drawer of the dresser is a safe. There is an 18 x 18 x 2-inch drawer next to the sink. My wife used it for makeup and other things.  We had to hang a lot of our clothes on hangars. There was no place to store the suitcases out of sight.  The bellhop offered to store the suitcases somewhere but we kept the spare clothes in our suitcases so we kept the suitcases in our room against the wall on each side of the large TV. The front desk offered to bring up a clothes rack, but there is really no room to put it.  It would just increase the clutter. 
The bed was comfortable.  The shower was great.  The shower and toilet are behind a sliding door that doesn’t lock but also has a 1 to 2 mm of open space when the door is closed; so, the sliding door does not close completely.  This is not a malfunction.  This is how the door was designed.  The sink and closet are opposite the bathroom.  The drawers are in the closet as is a full-size mirror on the closet door.  There is another sliding door that separates the sleeping area from the sink, closet, and the toilet/shower room. The air conditioning was tentative.  It was in the 90s F with heavy humidity during our stay.  To save on energy the AC automatically is reduced when there is no one in the room.  It struggled to catch up after we got into the room.  We reported the AC issues to the front desk.  Someone came immediately (The hotel is very helpful), but the engineer couldn’t override the system. We tolerated it.  I imagine that management (and our children) would comment that the energy saving aspect of the air conditioning was in the best interests of the planet.  On our last day, the AC seemed to work better, but the temperature had dropped into the low 80s.
 Our room was on the 8th floor facing south on to 48th street. We have a window facing what looks like a new apartment building whose interior is still under construction.  We could partially see the lights and signs of Times Square.   But the primary view out our window was one of hundreds of unfinished unoccupied apartments. There is a pull-down blackout screen that effectively blocked out all light.
 The fridge is really just a cooler with one 12 x 12 inch shelf (about 10 inches high)  It does not have a freezer.   Not sure if the King deluxe (one level up from what we had), comes with a larger fridge.  
Session’s restaurant was adequate.  The service, was excellent.   Our room came with a $90 credit towards breakfast.  Breakfast was expensive. We went over 90$ every morning by $16 to 30$, and that’s just for the 2 of us.  There is a 18% service charge and that does not include gratuities.  The gratuity is against the $106 breakfast, not the $16 that we paid over our $90 allotment.   We did not go to the Hotels premier restaurant. The Rooftop bar was dramatic.  Our room included 2 free cocktails. The views are terrific.  We visited the work out area but did not use.  It is well equipped.  There is no pool.
The location of the hotel is great.  The shows were 1 to 3 blocks away. Times square is a half a block away. Central Park is walking distance.  Rockefeller center is 2 blocks away.  
We always do a lot of walking when we visit.  We walked to the South Street Seaport (5 miles).  But subways, Uber, Taxis, human powered carriages, bicycles are easy to get.  We also visited The Aquarium at Coney Island which was 35 minutes away by Uber. (over an hour using the subway).  If we stay here again, we will try to get a bigger room.  The rooms at the Marriot Marquis are bigger with more storage for less money.  We found the service at The Hard Rock was its strong suit.  The service was better than the other 2 hotels we have stayed at in New York City.  That counts for a lot. 
I spoke with someone at the Hotel on our last day about the shortage of drawer space.  The person said that the Hotel was designed for people who were going to stay briefly to visit Times Square and who, not in these words, were traveling light.  This person said that none of the upgraded rooms, although providing more living space, provided more storage space. 
Despite all that is mentioned above, we had a great time.  We were made to feel welcome.  Not sure if we will stay here again, but if we do we will take less stuff with us.

title: Great stay at the Hard Rock Hotel
text: Hotel was fabulous and spotless.  Couldn't believe how clean everything was kept.  Great modern feel and excellent location just off Time Square.  Great bars to grab a drink or two and food at the restaurants was fantastic.  Best part of the experience was the staff - from the doormen, to the bartenders, concierge and cleaning staff - everyone was beyond friendly and helpful and made my first trip to the Big Apple truly memorable.

title: One week New York
text: Really enjoyed our week long stay at Hard Rock. Great central location and close to subways. Plenty of food options close by - for big breakfasts and dinner. Room was good - Queen beds were probably smaller than UK queens but fine for us and kids were fine sharing.  Didn’t really use many hotel facilities - we were close to everything we needed.

title: Hard Rock NYC
text: Great hotel to stay at if you’re planning a Time Square vacation. Hotel is newly built, very clean and modern and located in the heart of Time Square in the theater district. Great bar and club located within the hotel. Wish I stayed longer, but I’ll definitely stay here again when in NYC. I highly recommend the Hard Rock Hotel. The staff is friendly and very welcoming.

title: Underwhelming and expensive
text:
Our stay (family of 3 with a child) started with a 45-minute wait in the lobby because the room was "ready, but the manager had to inspect it first" - this was around 4 pm. Concierge staff was rude and hasty: they didn't even check on us or inform us of any progress for almost an hour.

The room was very clean and nicely furnished, although pretty small. Even though small size is fairly standard in NYC; the lack of wall hooks, shelves and such, made the absence of storage space even more noticeable.  I also didn't like the fact you can't turn individual lights on or off at will, and can instead only pick among a handful of room "presets".

At check-in, I was clearly told my credit card deposit would have been fully refunded in the absence of damage to the room. At check-out, it was confirmed to me that there was no additional charge. Only upon my return home, I realised my card was actually charged $200+. At no point I was told I was going to be charged any "resort fee" or similar, and - crucially - I was not provided any invoice for this charge.

title: Tolles neues Hotel
text:
Service und Sauberkeit sind top !,
Das brandneue Hotel hat tolle Bäder in weißem Marmor und Messing ! Wir hatten ein Studio mit tollem Ausblick auf den timesquare im 26. Stockwerk. Die rooftopbar im 34. Stockwerk ist phantastisch. 
Wenn man nicht auswärts frühstückt, sollte man das Frühstück mitbuchen, da die Preise sonst doch erheblich sind. Die Barpreise sind für New Yorker Verhältnisse normal (Cocktails um die 17 Dollar, aber sehr lecker). Nicht weit weg (49th Ecke Broadway) hat Juniorˋs eine Filiale, in der es den besten Cheesecake weltweit gibt. 
Ein einziger Nachteil der Lage ist der viele Müll in den Straßen in diesem Teil von NY ! Das kann HRH leider sicher nicht beeinflussen !
Übrigens: wenn sich jemand auf COVID testen lassen muss, ist es sinnvoll die Preise an den Zelten oder Arztpraxen zu vergleichen. Diese variieren von 55 - 175 Dollar je Antigen Schnelltest !

title: Beautiful Hotel
text:
This hotel is absolutely beautiful. It is in a great location. 2 minutes to Time Square and 10 minutes to Central Park. The Hard Rock Rock Shop employees were amazing. Constant Grind employee was so nice. I wish I would have gotten their names. Miguel at Valet was so nice. I hope you and your wife enjoy Maldives. We definitely will be back. Your Florida friends! 
Thank You Again Hard Rock for a great stay.
Sandy

title: Best choice
text: I highly recommend this place, it is clean and very close to everything in Manhattan area. The service, personal and everyone in the hotel are very helpful my first time in this place but definitely not the last one.

title: Nice place
text: The service was very good. We spent four days here and it was excellent from arrival to departure, the room was clean and comfortable also the hotel was very close to several city attractions. All in all it is a very great hotel.

title: New and in a great location
text: Hotel is new and clean and close to time square. You can walk to almost anywhere from time square to the theater district. Rooms are spacious and modern. Staff was great and there is a coffee shop in the lobby.

title: The most magical experience! The Man Mike
text:
This is Michael the man behind the beautiful magic!!
 He orchestrated all Of My now “fiancés”visions. All the phone calls from “Mike” I thought were work related! He had the whole hotel buzzing about us!!!!  Little
Did we know we were the first proposal at the Hard Rock Hotel NYC!!!every detail Mike did will never be forgotten! So thoughtful and putting so much time into making this the magical night of my life! I left there feeling like family! We were celebrated and treating simply incredible!!!!!!
Thank you from the very bottom of our heart!!!!!!!!!!

title: August stay
text: Brilliant hotel. Great rooms, amazing beds and tech in the rooms. The usual hard rock memorabilia and a perfect location. Made to feel so welcome. I am picky and couldn’t fault the hotel. Would definitely recommend

title: Treated Like Royalty - Or Even Rock Stars...
text:
I'd coveted this hotel for a while before I booked it. We were on a tight budget, as we were travelling for a month. I couldn't justify the room rate but then spotted a deal on one of the booking sites, which with a bit of a stretch made it affordable. I usually book directly with hotels rather than use booking sites so I wasn't sure what to expect.

We arrived in New York at 8am on a red eye from Las Vegas. We were exhausted and the heat in New York this week was almost unbearable. Although check-in wasn't until the afternoon, we were able to leave our bags with the valet.

After breakfast we wandered around for a while but we were just too hot and too tired to enjoy ourselves. I decided to return to the hotel and see if we could have an early check-in. I spoke with Brittany at the front desk who explained that while it wasn't yet time for guests to check out and there were few rooms of the type we had requested, she would do her absolute best. True to her word, as soon as a room became available she allocated it to us.

Later that day the hotel sent us a beautiful bottle of prosecco, some cakes and a handwritten card as I had mentioned we were celebrating both a wedding anniversary and 18th birthday.

The hotel is very very stylish and cool. The rooms were a decent size for New York. It was spotlessly clean.

Staff were friendly but unobtrusive. For example when we declined housekeeping, the staff member asked if we would like any clean towels or more coffee. Security was evident at the entrance, yet we never felt uncomfortable as we were always greeted with a 'have a nice day' or 'welcome back'

Overall, I can't recommend this hotel enough. We will definitely be back, minus the teenagers...

title: Magnificent Hotel in the Midtown area
text: This beautiful hotel is located in midtown Manhattan. They offer exceptional spaces for leisure and business travel and are also steps from Broadway theaters. After an eventful day of sightseeing, relax and recharge in spacious hotel accommodations with views of Broadway, Times Square, and Manhattan.   There are lots of memorabilia throughout the hotel with many artist to mention.  The hotel rooms was very clean and the beds were comfortable so we slept as a rock. The staff was very welcoming and knowledgeable.  The outlets were amazing.  We had breakfast in Sessions, dinner at NYY Steak and went to the roof top bar (RT-60) for drink after.  If you are looking for a hotel that treats you as family then the Hard Rock Hotel should be the next place you plan you trip when visiting NYC

title: Beautiful new hotel in Midtown
text: Fabulous new hotel. We booked a Superior King Balcony.  Perfect room. Perfect location.  Great employees. I would definitely return and recommend to others. We did not partake of the food and beverage services available with the exception of a drink at the rooftop bar RT60.  The drinks were very pricey but then again we were in NYC where everything is overpriced.

title: Superbe expérience
text:
Une très belle semaine passée dans ce fabuleux hôtel en famille en plein milieu de Times Square. Les chambres sont très confortables, la literie au top, ma TV très grande, la vue superbe et l’insonorisation entre les chambre nickel.
Le design de l’hôtel est très sympa et la musique excellente.
Le personnel est au petits soins.
Merci 🙏🏻

title: Great Location and Service
text: Awesome hotel room is small but very comfortable great location extremely clean great service will definitely come back to the same hotel. Perfect location for Broadway shows. Rooftop bar was beautiful staff was very nice.

title: Full of R&R spirits
text: Nice exhibition of legendary artist's guitars, memorable room amenities and room TV programs. Beautiful night watch from a room window. Foods of SESSION were too delicious. Full of Rock'n Roll spirits enjoyed, thank you!

title: Amazing Hotel
text: We highly recommend this hotel if you're wanting to stay in NYC. We wanted to a quick weekend getaway to celebrate our honeymoon. En route one of our flights was cancelled due to weather and we were not able to arrive at our original check in date. The hotel staff were very accommodating and stayed in contact with us via text message to assure us our booking was safe. Once we arrived the hotel staff were friendly and outgoing and made our honeymoon weekend feel extra special. Our room was a little smaller than we first anticipated but was great otherwise.  We had a great time at this hotel.

title: Wonderful hotel experience
text: Beautiful hotel with friendly staff and amazing customer service. David and Mark at the lobby coffee shop were wonderful. The front desk was able to accommodate our large group and arrange our rooms to be next to each other.

title: Hard Rock New York - a great new hotel
text: Booked 2 rooms for 4 nights in this newly opened hotel. The location is very central, we could see Times Sq. The hotel itself has a real buzz when you arrive & service was impeccable.The rooms are a good size & the space is well designed. Hotel facilities are excellent including a roof top bar. There is loads to see with merchandise everywhere & each floor is themed with a rock star. A great hotel for family & business.

title: Hard Rock Hotel NYC ROCKS!
text: Gorgeous new hotel, clean and comfy rooms.  Excellent food at NYY Steak, Sessions, and RT60 on the rooftop. Excellent location right near Broadway theatre and Times Square.  Amazing staff.  Don't think twice; book it!

title: Beautiful, clean, and comfortable!
text:
We took a girls trip and absolutely LOVED this hotel! There was 4 of us in the Queen room. Wish we could’ve stayed longer!

Pros:
-Beautiful and sparkling clean
-Enough room for us without feeling like we’re on top of each other
-Super comfy beds
-So quiet! Never heard street noise or any other guests the entire time. We were on the 12th floor
-Plenty of closet space and hangers with 2 full length mirrors on the doors
-Super friendly staff. Don’t remember all their names but Chris at check in and Chester were both great. 
-Rooftop bar had beautiful views and the seating area was very comfortable. Drinks were good!
-Location was perfect. Right by Times Square without all the noise. 

Cons:
-Our bathroom had a tub instead of the walk in shower that I saw pictured. Not an issue but we just had trouble figuring out the 3 handles and the shower head wouldn’t angle down. 
-No instructions on how or where to get ice. Again no big deal but something that would be helpful to have on the Q&A card in the room. 
-Service on the rooftop bar was pretty slow so we only got one drink but we enjoyed it. 
-View from our room wasn’t anything great but having a table and chairs and blackout curtains was a huge plus. 

Would definitely recommend staying here and hope we can come back soon! Thanks Hard Rock!

title: Hard Rock NYC Rocks!
text:
Stylish, very modern, very clean, super friendly staff, very close to everything. This place is in the heart of Times Square, it is a little pricey if you decide to eat at the hotel, we did not eat at the hotel because there are tons of restaurants in this area. 
The roof top bar was amazing, super comfy and the staff as nice as usual.
We truly enjoyed our stay at the Hard Rock Hotel, the only down about this area is that as soon as you exit the hotel to the right of it,  the street is always full of trash bags and it stinks very bad, the smell is horrible, you will not believe there are tables and chairs with people eating literally next to the trash, so nasty.

title: Perfect location!
text:
A great hotel at a perfect location! Book a room with a private balcony, i'ts really worth the extra cost! 
Great staff, exellent breakfast, clean rooms. Great cocktails at the rooftop RT60. Love All Serve All - Hard Rock👍😁

title: Super Hotel alles neu und sauber
text:
Tolle Lage und sehr schöne Zimmer. Alles neu und super sauber. Sehr freundliche Stuff. Leider sind gegenüber Bauarbeiten, Tag und Nacht. (Eine Kreissäge wurde um 2.30 Nachts benutzt)Wir waren im 14 Stock und der Lärm fühlte sich an als ob wir das Fenster auf hatten. Ich kann nicht verstehen das es so schlecht isoliert ist. 
Wen das nicht stört ist hier bestens aufgehoben. Wir würden wieder kommen wenn die Baustelle vorbei ist.

title: Excellent new hotel at Times Square
text: Hard Rock Hotel is an excellent new property which opened recently at Times Square. Nice and clean rooms, friendly staff, great design. Walking distance or easy access to Broadway and all major attractions

title: Great place to stay
text: The hotel is new and extremely clean. The rooms are comfortable and the staff is extremely polite and accommodating.  It’s right off of Times Square which makes it a great place to stay. You won’t be disappointed staying here, I would definitely be back.

title: beautiful new premises, mediocre service, little atmosphere in the bars/restaurants
text: The location and premises are very new and stylish, realy nice rooms. Service is not working very well, maybe beacuse it's a new hotel, regardless vie e-mail or on site. The restaurant, rooftop bar and lobby are empty in the evenings.

title: Definitivt ett hotell att återvända till
text: Hotellet ligger nära Times square jag och promenadavstånd till många sevärdheter. Även tunnelbana i närheten för att ta dig till battery park. Men annars tar det ca 15 min att promenera till central park samt till Macys. Hotellet har bra service och hjälpsamma anställda som hjälper en med det man behöver och hälsar på en varje dag. Rummen är fina, bekväma och jämt städade och rena när man kommer tillbaka till rummen.

title: Hard Rock Hotel Manhattan
text: Hotel is new and beautiful but expensive.  Rooms are fine for 2 but don’t bring a family.  NYY Steakhouse should be avoided.  Many better options like Capital Grill, Ruth’s Chris and Del Frisco just a few blocks away.

title: Vacation with family
text: Had a wonderful time and really enjoyed the cleanliness, safety , friendliness,  and location of the hotel. The food was good and the room was perfect. The hotel is right in the middle of Time Square surrounded by restaurants and stores.  What more could you ask for.

title: Excellent service rock shop
text: David and Mark from the rock shop in the hard rock hotel gave an excellent service to our family. They were very welcoming and gave us some milk for the baby even if it wasn’t on the menu of the rock shop. Thank you :)

title: Superclean and friendly committed staff
text:
We had a 2 day stay in New York and took this hotel because it was conveniently located conpared to Central Park. Staff was really friendly and helpfull. 
Rooms were clean and really trendy. Corridors had hints to Rockstars. We had no issues with noise from outside, nor from within the hotel. Air quality was good and room temperature was easy to adjust. Bathroom was tiny, but functional.

title: One of the best hotels I’ve ever stayed at.
text: I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting NYC. The staff is very friendly and welcoming. The hotel is really clean, and the best part is the location, which is very close to Times Square, and other sites to see that are walking distance.

title: Perfect !
text:
A new hotel in Times Square area.
Perfect in terms of position, cleanliness, breakfast and staff. Room (26th floor) is modern, quiet and comfortable. 
Concierge advice was very good.
Highly recommended.

title: Clean, fantastic and fun!
text: Beautiful and clean hotel in the heart of Times Square.  Rooms are large for NYC and very clean.  Staff was very friendly and helpful!  Sally at the front desk and Rob in bell services will be remembered for their assistance and great personality.  The rooftop lounge is gorgeous and a must see view at night! Bartenders are a lot of fun and pour great drinks.  We will definitely be back any time we are in NY!

title: Amazing Stay! Excellent service
text: Just save yourself time in looking for hotels for your NYC trip and just book this hotel, this is the best hotel in NYC hands down!
