From the beautiful rooms and amazing rooftop to the guest services. I had an amazing stay and would definitely come back. I would like to acknowledge and mention the young lady working in the front desk named Sally who has been such a wonderful help in fulfilling my expectations for the hotel and going above and beyond for the guests. Hard Rock hotels always tends to amaze me and go above my expectations.

title: Gorgeous and spotless. Don’t stay anywhere else near Times Square.
text: Gorgeous and spotless hotel. Unparalleled luxury in the middle of Times Square. Rooms are beautifully designed and well thought out with a barn door to block off the bathroom and entryway and keep the sleeping area cool and quiet. If you want to be in center of things, this place is perfect. Walking distance to Times Square, Broadway, Central Park.

title: Hidden costs
text: We thought maybe this hotel would be cheesy, but it's fantastic. The finishes are lovely, it's sparkling clean, the service is nothing short of fantastic, the rooms are beautifully furnished with luxe details and the lighting in the rooms is so good it's noticeable! I want the lighting designer to come and work on my home lighting! The room was pretty large for New York. There was only one issue and that is that somehow I was not apprised before booking of the resort fee of $40 per night which we were only charged upon checkout. I actually looked for a fee like this and none was shown. Even with that unexpected fee though, it was well worth the price. It's so conveniently located, you just can't go wrong.

title: Sales Retreat
text: Visit to NY for a sales Conference. Wonderful stay at the NY Hard Rock Hotel. Very clean, bed was like sleeping on clouds. Rooftop bar nice ambiance and vibe. Definitely recommend this property for business or a weekend get away.

title: Lovely cafe / shop
text: Visited the hotel with my dad who is an avid hard rock fan, we were impressed with the varied merchandise (very different from that in the cafes!) and by the lovely staff, Gabriel and Mark, who were incredibly helpful!

title: Summer Adventures!
text: So much fun!  Great staff, amazing rooms!  Great location!!! The rooms were comfortable.  My grandson and niece had an amazing time!  They said this is there hotel for sure.  My grandson said it was his Vibe.  Mind you he is 7!!

title: Increíble estadia!
text: Excelentes instalaciones, servicios, atención y ubicación, tiene un buen roof top con eventos y buenísimas comidas. Está ubicado encima de times square pero en un sitio más tranquilo, a pasos de todo lo más interesante de NY

title: Catfished on room size !
text:
Hotel is overpriced for the size of the room. Ridiculously small that room was offered on the site for 4 persons. Bathroom door is see through no privacy. 
You call for items to be sent up to your room and it doesn’t come at all . 
Rooms are tiny, pictures online and seeing in person you feel like you were “catfished”.
Room service ending at 11pm is a joke .

title: Excellent choice
text: My fiancé and I wanted to spend few days in NYC for my birthday. We were surprised to find beautiful balloons in our room. Very nice touch!!! Chris was very friendly when he checked us in. Thank you. We will be back!

title: Excellent hotel with rooftop bonus!
text: This is a new hotel and it shows. Spotlessly clean, large rooms, beautifully decorated and the whole vibe is friendly but luxurious. Gorgeous room and great bathroom and amenities - all the communal areas have great celebrity outfits etc to look at and the staff are just lovely. There is a rooftop on 34th floor- we had brunch there - fab views and the cocktails and food were delish. Real hidden gem as not sure how many people know about it. Definitely would recommend. Times Square isn’t my fave area but it’s super central and easy to get about and this hotel makes it worth staying there

title: Great experience at the rock shop!
text: I had the most delicious cinnamon bun like pastry here! Def worth it, would recommend. One of their employees Ian, gave me a tour of the hotel, pointed out the pieces of clothing on display from Gaga and RiRi, showed me up the beautiful stairs! They have live music in the lobbies fridays, it was so soothing. Will def stay here next time I’m in NY.

title: Worth it!!!
text: We traveled to NY after long and painful 2 years with pandemic. We stayed for a week and everyone we interacted was amazing. Rooms are small but functional. We are well aware that rooms are small in NY so we were prepared for small size. It’s very nicely decorated and memorabilia pieces are ver nice addition. We were greeted by staff every time we return from our long walks especially David is so friendly. We will be back and recommend to all our friends.

title: Amazing!! 5 stars!
text:
The hotel is amazing!! The staff and amenities are superb! From the amazing decor to the perfect location, the stay was perfect. 
The rock shop staff has amazing coffee and staff. David, Mark and Gabriel were so nice and accommodated all of our coffee requests. Highly recommend everything here!

title: Sad flights!
text: Disappointed in the service, we had to cancel last minute because of flight nightmare! They charged me the whole nights room charge PLUS TAX. We are planning on returning in the future, but maybe not here. Left a bad taste in my mouth, as a new hotel, and usual hard rock service I expected better!

title: Beautiful Hotel
text:
A week stay in June 2022 for business and I must say, the hotel is beautiful. This place far surpasses many of the high-end hotels in Times Square. Upon arrival, we were met by a pleasant gentleman named Miguel who grabbed our bags and escorted us to the second-floor lobby. In the beautiful lobby/lounge we were met by 3 pleasant concierges who asked us what music we were into and what we would like to hear in our room. There was a quick check-in process and then escorted to our room again by Miguel who asked if we needed anything which he got and took to our room and we went to find lunch.

The room was small but it was beautiful. You could see they put a lot of thought into the elegance of each room. The restaurant/lobby bar was another beautiful area with great food and drinks. We got the breakfast package which included daily eats which were amazing, especially the french toast. We didn't make it to the gym, but we did head up to the rooftop lounge, again another beautiful area with great music and drinks. The staff and security at the rooftop and second-floor lounge were always pleasant. Upon check out, we were met by Miguel who offered to upgrade our transportation back to the airport when he saw our crappy Uber pull up. The woman(executive) in the Youtube video at this location seems to be very passionate about creating a space of elegance for the hotel patrons and she far surpassed that idea. Hard Rock may want to send her to HR Punta Cana to whip that place in shape because they need it. Thank Miguel and the team at Hard Rock Times Square.

title: NYC Weekend
text: Great location.  Cool Hotel. Good staff.  Nice rooms small but comfortable. Valet was excellent and very helpful.   I would definitely stay again.   Bar was nice didn't try the restaurant though.  Staff very friendly

title: The ideal luxury hotel.
text: Gorgeous rooms with every luxury detail you could imagine, including heated bathroom floors. The staff are very friendly and our experience was five-star. The coffee corner in the room was top Italian machinery and display. Every detail was thought of. The location is superb. Just ten minutes walking to Central Park and the glamorous shops on Madison and 57th. It really doesn’t get much better.

title: Night out at the NYY
text: Wonderful experience. This space is beautiful and the staff are very accommodating. Thanks Gabe from the Rock Shop for the recommendation. The happy hour was incredible and the food was unreal. I highly recommend the Bone Marrow and Tuna Tartar appetizers. For drinks, we opted for the Hickory Old Fashion and Tokyo After Dark. You won’t regret.

title: Best Birthday Ever!
text: We loved the Hard Rock Hotel! Our suite was amazing, the staff was so friendly and helpful. Whatever we needed they were happy to assist, it was 5 star service all the way. Julivia at the front desk was fantastic - so welcoming. The location can't be beat! I totally recommend this hotel.

title: Good in theory, but skip it
text:
Not worth the money or the time…
The rooms and bathroom are a good size, but the walls are thin so you can hear the doors slamming and people talking constantly. Hotel is clean. 
If you’re looking for a welcoming, friendly staff experience then go else where.  Everything is very transactional there. 
Also no extra HRC perks (unless maybe if you book directly through they website only)
Not family friendly environment

title: Amazing experience
text: Our experience with is hotel was amazing! Brittany at the front desk was so accommodating and such a pleasure to work with. The roof top bar was so beautiful with a view of time square one side and of the city skyline on the other. Joal help us with transportation and he was awesome ! Victor our driver was the icing on the  cake . Great birthday celebration!

title: Location location location
text: If you want to stay in the heart of Mid Manhattan this is the place for you.  My daughter and I just got back from an early birthday trip and had an amazing time.  It being our time in New York City I was a little nervous but the entire staff was awesome especially the security & door men. Ronnie even arranged transportation for us at 6 in the morning to take us to the airport.  Thank you Hard Rock Hotel for a great trip!!!

title: Quick visit to the City
text: Would highly recommend the Hard Rock Hotel in NYC. Great location, nice clean rooms, a bit small but very comfortably laid out. Fun experience at their RT60 night club with cool drinks and good hors d'oeurvres

title: Incredible hotel, incredible location and best team members!
text: Whatever you are visiting NYC for you have to stay at this hotel. From the team, to the outlets to the memorabilia its incredible. Very tasteful use of memorabilia makes it fun and memorable. Dont let the name fool you - this hotel is a credible hotel for business and pleasure. Book a room with a balcony - there is nothing like it in NYC!

title: Great Hotel Service location
text:
Great hotel very clean great location right off time square . Service was awesome. Everything from
The breakfast experience to the room was very clean. I would definitely stay here again on my next trip

title: Fantastic!
text: Wonderful hotel staff. Top notch location. Took care of every detail from check in to check out. Clean, comfortable rooms. Got great sleep. Gym was excellent. Concierge was very helpful with suggestions. Will come back for sure.

title: Not really worth it
text: This HardRock was subpar compared to the other locations. No ice machines- you have to call room service for ice and an iron.  For the money spent, was not worth it. I'd try other locations before I stay at this hotel again.

title: The beds are amazing
text: If it’s comfort you’re looking for this hotel is for you. You won’t want to get out of bed. And the staff at this hotel are super friendly. The hotel is in pristine condition. I love the rooftop bar. Very chic and there is a terrace you can sit outside. We did not want to leave.

title: Hidden Gem
text: I was hesitant to book here but i wanted to give a shot. My experience was absolutely amazing. We were greeted by very friendly door staff and the girl who checked us in was very nice to upgrade us. The guys at the coffee shop was very friendly and the coffee was delicious. Rooms are a bit small but it's ok compare to the others in NYC. it's a hidden gem in the heart of the city. We will be back.

title: Hotel bom
text: O Hotel é bem localizado para quem gosta de agito, fica colado na Broadway, mas é silencioso. Não classificaria como 5 estrelas pois o serviço é ok, eles não repõe sabonete, shampoo etc. Os funcionários da porta também não são os mais simpáticos e o quarto é bem pequeno.

title: Awesome hotel!
text: I’m super biased because I live Hard Rocks, but this hotel is beautiful, new, and staffed with great people. Jonathan at Sessions was awesome! Looking forward to trying RT60 tonight. Thank you all for the lovely stay.

title: Bad experience
text: false advertisements, service people was rude!! Big disappointment!! The room had a bad smell to it, dirty and small. Overall I can’t find myself to ever stay here again. And we’re big spenders!! I was totally annoyed.

title: Service was slow
text: Used lunch and breakfast at the restaurant and the service was extremely slow even though the number of guests was low. Rooms are great, front desk, parking and luggage storing very helpful. One adult with two teenagers

title: AMAZING - ONCE IN A LIFETIME!
text: Our whole experience was a complete surprise as our mum had booked this for us.  When we arrived we actually couldn’t believe it - the actual HRH, she couldn’t have found us a more special hotel for our surprise!  The reception team were very friendly, warm and welcoming.  The decor is stunning and unusual, it gleamed and sparkled everywhere.  Housekeeping is extremely attentive and any requirements are seen to immediately.  The extra little touches in the rooms and hotels (like the embroidered guitars on the pillows) are such a unique part.  There are other extras like this including famous rock star portraits on doors!   The managing staff are very approachable, helpful and kind too, nothing was too much trouble.  Everything was excellent and just perfect.  We did feel like rock stars.  The location is superb, very close to theatres,  just steps from Times Square and very easy access to all tourist attractions.  If we ever were able to return to NYC in the future  it would be more than a dream to be able to stay here again. A magical 7 days. A huge and grateful ‘ thank you ‘ to you all!

title: Fantastic
text: The Hardrock has hit NYC. Staff went out of their way to make the stay memorable.  Great location in Times Square with a fantastic scenic bar. We will stay here again. Shout out to David G for being an impeccable host.

title: Anniversary
text: My fiancé and I came here for our 4th year anniversary and the staff and location are amazing!!! We spoke with the wonderful Tiffany at the reception and she was amazing and helped us out a lot and was very knowledgeable, kind, as well as sent up a bottle of champagne after asking about our trip showing she truly cares about guests! Excellent location next to everything you want to see and very updated gorgeous rooms. 10/10 will stay here again! Big shout out to you Tiffany for making us feel welcome and special!

title: Superb
text: Excellent location for Broadway shows.The rooftop is my all time favourite.What a view.Steakhouse not to be missed.Also Staff really friendly.Best concierge service ever. Room is a bit small but the great bathroom and bath mad up for that.Would highly recommend.

title: Just about perfect
text: Great location, awesome staff, cool atmosphere and very clean. Did a mother/daughter trip and packed in as much as we could. Hotel is walking distance to everything in Times Square. We were always greeted coming and going staff always present right outside the hotel and as soon as we walked in. Our room was perfect and very clean.

title: Fantastic stay! Great customer service
text: What a fabulous hotel! The hotel and amenities are excellent.  Room service was quick, nothing was too much trouble. Great location!  All the staff were exceptional, the bell staff, the concierge desk, front desk, the guys who helped recommend restaurants and places to go. The Rock shop staff Gabriel and Rob were a ray of sunshine., they made a great coffee.. Can’t wait to visit again. Will be recommending it to friends and family.

title: Hard Rock Shop
text: OUTSTANDING hospitality, wonderful staff,  had  a lot of fun,  love you guys! This great T-shirt always makes me think of you !! I will not forget you and this beautiful place, when I'm back in Germany ! Thank you !!!

title: Excellent
text:
Très bien situé, personnel attentif et disponible.
Hôtel très moderne,très belle chambre, très grand lit,salle de bain avec un grande douche.
Nous recommandons vivement cet hôtel.
Nous reviendrons sans hésitation.
Merci à tout le personnel.

title: Stay at hard rock hotel in New York City
text:
I stayed at the Hard Rock Hotel near Times Square in New York City recently in July.
First of all the location was absolutely excellent as all theatres and all other places were very close at hand and easily reachable.
Secondly the service we received from the staff was very courteous, honest and helpful which made life a bit more organised as to the planning.
I would like to mention a few names of staff who gave excellent and pertinent suggestions although this was my 5th visit to New York, which made the stay more enjoyable.
To name: Michael and Abby at the concierge desk
Julivia at the front desk on reception
Generally the hotel is v clean and well maintained though the breakfast area could be opened out for a buffet in the future.
I hope to return to it some day in the near future.
Thank you to the above wonderful staff.

title: Beautiful new option in Times Square
text:
EXCELLENT VISIT**PERFECT!! The hotel is sooo clean. The staff sooo friendly.   The ground floor coffee shop is perfect in am.  Sessions is great for breakfast and lunch.  RT 60 is a beautiful rooftop (go on Mondays for tacos!)
Couldn’t have been better!!

title: Excellent Service
text: Love how nice everyone is here, especially at the coffee shop both David and Rob were lovely, great conversations and greeted us immediately. The other young ladies that work there as well are also very sweet. Coffee is delicious!

title: Hard rock
text: The hotel was super clean, the guy on the first floor when you walked in was cheery and happy and it was an overall great experience. The bathroom had nice option of rain shower or shower head. Also, it has two queen beds (instead of two fulls) which were needed since we had 2 adults and 2 teens sharing the room.

title: Amazing Trip
text:
The staff is amazing! Lizette and Veronica in the store where informative and welcoming! And they make a great chai tea latte!! The service at the hotel is 5 stars! The rooms are decorated very contemporary! The hotel, as all Hard Rocks have a cool vibe!!

Excellent stay! I highly recommend! The location is perfect. It’s close to Time Square and a short walk to Central Park.

title: Great Place to Stay
text: The hotel is conveniently located to Times Square. The staff was professional and customer service oriented. I recommend this hotel to anyone wanting an experience. The Roof Top bar is amazing along with a variety of music by live DJ.

title: Best NYC Hotel experience
text: I did not expect this excellent level of service! I was upgraded to a superior room for free with a beautiful view to Times Square. The room was excellent! Room service was smooth. The cleaning staff were awesome. I was also given a late check out, without extra charge which I really appreciated! Thank you! I'll definitely be back!

title: New and Clean in Times Square
text:
The Hard Rock Hotel was in a great location if you are going to see a Broadway show. It is right off of Times Square, and we only walked about 2 blocks to see The Lion King.  

The Hotel was very clean, and brand new.  The room was clean, and had great amenities.  The staff was fabulous. Very friendly and helpful!

title: Great location for a new hotel
text: Very convenient to shows at the upper end of Times Square.  Rooms were quiet and clean.  I didn't take advantage of the guitar or turn tables that could be sent up to the room, but it was fun to watch the Hard Rock music videos channel.

title: Coffee/Snacks
text: I recommend anyone who visits New York City to come visit The Hard Rock Hotel. They just recently open not to long ago. Me and my friends came in to grab a cup of coffee and some amazing snacks. Such a great location with easy access to the subway, restaurant and shopping stores. They also have great customer service and hospitality. They roof top is my all time favorite great view of Time Square and the drinks are amazing. The Hard Rock Hotel is lucky to have David as an employee. His service was amazing and was very friendly, professional, and accommodating! Definitely will recommend people to come. Thank you!!

title: Cobrança abusiva e sem retorno do hotel
text: Estive por 4 noites no hotel e na saída me cobraram por serviços que não utilizei. Uma cobrança a mais no meu cartão de 470 dólares e não estornam, não resolvem. Não deem o cartão de vocês neste hotel, é perigoso! Pedi o recibo de todas as despesas e não me deram, já liguei para o hotel 4 vezes e não tive nenhum retorno. Sequer a nota de serviço me foi entregue. 479 dólares. Já estou acionando meu advogado nos EUA para resolver

title: Veronica is a Great Hostess!
text: I been to the coffee shop a couple of times and Veronica has been EXCELLENT in her service and friendly attitude.  Great service and hospitality.  The Hard Rock Hotel is lucky to have Veronica as an employee.

title: Hard Rock Coffee Shop
text: Stopped by to grab a coffee and snacks while walking Time Square and I’m so glad I did! Robert and David were amazing! Great service and amazing coffee! Also went above and beyond to make my son feel extra special on his birthday!

title: Rock shop
text:
Went for a couple of times for coffee and other stuff, It’s a pretty charming place and the staff is so friendly and helpful. I even made some friends there like Gabriel. 
Btw I recommend you guys to be there, its a pretty good place.
